m_rhs.f90
Go to the documentation of this file.

26 
33 
46 MODULE m_rhs
47 
48 
49  ! Dependencies =============================================================
50  USE m_derived_types !< definitions of the derived types
51 
52  USE m_global_parameters !< definitions of the global parameters
53 
54  USE m_mpi_proxy !< message passing interface (mpi) module proxy
55 
56  USE m_variables_conversion !< state variables type conversion procedures
57 
58  USE m_weno !< weighted and essentially non-oscillatory (weno)
59  !! schemes for spatial reconstruction of variables
60 
61  USE m_riemann_solvers !< exact and approximate riemann problem solvers
62 
63  USE m_cbc !< characteristic boundary conditions (cbc)
64 
65  USE m_bubbles !< bubble dynamic routines
66  ! ==========================================================================
67 
68 
69  IMPLICIT NONE
70 
71  PRIVATE; PUBLIC :: s_initialize_rhs_module, &
72  s_compute_rhs , &
73  s_pressure_relaxation_procedure, &
74  s_populate_variables_buffers, &
75  s_finalize_rhs_module, &
76  s_get_crv, &
77  s_get_viscous
78 
79 
80  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: q_cons_qp
84 
85  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: q_prim_qp
89 
95  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: ql_cons_ndqp
96  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: qr_cons_ndqp
98 
103  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: ql_prim_ndqp
104  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: qr_prim_ndqp
106 
113  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dq_prim_dx_qp
114  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dq_prim_dy_qp
115  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dq_prim_dz_qp
116  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: gm_vel_qp
118 
124  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dql_prim_dx_ndqp
125  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dql_prim_dy_ndqp
126  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dql_prim_dz_ndqp
127  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dqr_prim_dx_ndqp
128  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dqr_prim_dy_ndqp
129  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dqr_prim_dz_ndqp
131 
132  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: gm_alpha_qp
136 
140  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: gm_alphal_ndqp
141  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: gm_alphar_ndqp
143 
148  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: un_alphal_x_ndqp
149  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: un_alphal_y_ndqp
150  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: un_alphal_z_ndqp
151  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: un_alphar_x_ndqp
152  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: un_alphar_y_ndqp
153  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: un_alphar_z_ndqp
155 
156  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: kappa_vf
161 
166  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: kappal_ndqp
167  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: kappar_ndqp
169 
176  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: flux_ndqp
177  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: flux_src_ndqp
178  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: flux_gsrc_ndqp
180 
184  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dgm_alpha_dx_qp
185  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dgm_alpha_dy_qp
186  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: dgm_alpha_dz_qp
187  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: un_alpha_x_qp
188  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: un_alpha_y_qp
189  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: un_alpha_z_qp
190 
191 
192  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: laplacian_vf
193  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: alt_kappa_vf
195 
196  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: reg_src_vf
198 
199 
202  REAL(KIND(0d0)), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: we_mtm_src
203  REAL(KIND(0d0)), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: we_nrg_src
204  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: tau_we_vf
205  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:) :: tau_re_vf
207 
210  REAL(KIND(0d0)), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: flux_lim_func
211  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: lo_flux_ndqp
212  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: lo_flux_src_ndqp
213  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp
214  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: hi_flux_ndqp
215  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: hi_flux_src_ndqp
216  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp
218 
223  TYPE(bounds_info) :: ieta,iksi,itau
225 
230  TYPE(bounds_info) :: ichi,ipsi
232 
233  TYPE(bounds_info) :: iv
234 
237  TYPE(bounds_info) :: ix,iy,iz
239 
242  REAL(KIND(0d0)), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: bub_adv_src
243  REAL(KIND(0d0)), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:,:) :: bub_r_src, bub_v_src, bub_p_src, bub_m_src
244  TYPE(scalar_field) :: divu
246 
247 
248 
251  REAL(KIND(0d0)), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: mono_mass_src, mono_e_src
252  REAL(KIND(0d0)), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:,:) :: mono_mom_src
254 
257  TYPE(vector_field), ALLOCATABLE, DIMENSION(:,:,:) :: myflux_vf, myflux_src_vf
258  TYPE(scalar_field) :: alf_sum
260 
261  character(50) :: file_path
262 
263  CONTAINS
264 
268  SUBROUTINE s_initialize_rhs_module() ! ---------------------------------
269 
270  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l
271 
272 
273  ! Configuring Cell-Interior Quadrature Points ======================
274  ieta%beg = 0; iksi%beg = 0; itau%beg = 0
275 
276  IF(commute_err) THEN
277  ieta%beg = -1; IF(n > 0) iksi%beg = -1; IF(p > 0) itau%beg = -1
278  END IF
279 
280  ieta%end = -ieta%beg; iksi%end = -iksi%beg; itau%end = -itau%beg
281  ! ==================================================================
282 
283 
284  ! Configuring Cell-Boundary Quadrature Points ======================
285  ichi%beg = 0; ipsi%beg = 0
286 
287  IF(split_err) THEN
288  ichi%beg = -1; IF(p > 0) ipsi%beg = -1
289  END IF
290 
291  ichi%end = -ichi%beg; ipsi%end = -ipsi%beg
292  ! ==================================================================
293 
294 
295  ! Configuring Coordinate Direction Indexes =========================
296  ix%beg = -buff_size; iy%beg = 0; iz%beg = 0
297 
298  IF(n > 0) iy%beg = -buff_size; IF(p > 0) iz%beg = -buff_size
299 
300  ix%end = m - ix%beg; iy%end = n - iy%beg; iz%end = p - iz%beg
301  ! ==================================================================
302 
303  IF (we_size > 0 .AND. we_rhs_flux) THEN
304  ALLOCATE(tau_we_vf(1:sys_size))
305  DO i = 1, num_dims
306  ALLOCATE(tau_we_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end, &
307  iy%beg:iy%end, &
308  iz%beg:iz%end ))
309  END DO
310  ALLOCATE(tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end, &
311  iy%beg:iy%end, &
312  iz%beg:iz%end ))
313  END IF
314 
315  IF (any(re_size > 0) .AND. cyl_coord) THEN
316  ALLOCATE(tau_re_vf(1:sys_size))
317  DO i = 1, num_dims
318  ALLOCATE(tau_re_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end, &
319  iy%beg:iy%end, &
320  iz%beg:iz%end ))
321  END DO
322  ALLOCATE(tau_re_vf(e_idx)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end, &
323  iy%beg:iy%end, &
324  iz%beg:iz%end ))
325  END IF
326 
327  ! Allocation/Association of q_cons_qp and q_prim_qp ================
328  ALLOCATE(q_cons_qp( ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
329  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
330  itau%beg:itau%end ))
331  ALLOCATE(q_prim_qp( ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
332  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
333  itau%beg:itau%end ))
334 
335  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end
336  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end
337  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end
338 
339  ALLOCATE(q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
340  ALLOCATE(q_prim_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
341 
342  IF(i /= 0 .AND. abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
343 
344  DO l = 1, sys_size
345  ALLOCATE(q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( ix%beg:ix%end, &
346  iy%beg:iy%end, &
347  iz%beg:iz%end ))
348  q_prim_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
349  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
350  END DO
351 
352  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
353  ALLOCATE(q_prim_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( ix%beg:ix%end, &
354  iy%beg:iy%end, &
355  iz%beg:iz%end ))
356  END DO
357  IF (model_eqns == 3) THEN
358  DO l = internalenergies_idx%beg, internalenergies_idx%end
359  ALLOCATE(q_prim_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( ix%beg:ix%end, &
360  iy%beg:iy%end, &
361  iz%beg:iz%end ))
362  END DO
363  END IF
364 
365  IF (bubbles) THEN
366  DO l = bub_idx%beg,sys_size
367  ALLOCATE(q_prim_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( ix%beg:ix%end, &
368  iy%beg:iy%end, &
369  iz%beg:iz%end ))
370  END DO
371  END IF
372  END IF
373 
374  END DO
375  END DO
376  END DO
377  ! ==================================================================
378 
379 
380  ! Allocation/Association of qK_cons_ndqp and qK_prim_ndqp ==========
381  ALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
382  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
383  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
384  ALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
385  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
386  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
387  ALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
388  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
389  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
390  ALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
391  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
392  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
393 
394  ALLOCATE(myflux_vf( 1 :num_dims, &
395  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
396  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
397  ALLOCATE(myflux_src_vf( 1 :num_dims, &
398  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
399  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
400 
401  ALLOCATE( alf_sum%sf( &
402  ix%beg:ix%end, &
403  iy%beg:iy%end, &
404  iz%beg:iz%end ))
405 
406  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
407  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
408  DO i = 1, num_dims
409 
410  ALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
411  ALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
412  ALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
413  ALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
414 
415  ALLOCATE(myflux_vf(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
416  ALLOCATE(myflux_src_vf(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
417 
418 
419  IF(abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
420  DO l = 1,sys_size
421  ALLOCATE(myflux_vf(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
422  ix%beg:ix%end, &
423  iy%beg:iy%end, &
424  iz%beg:iz%end ))
425  ALLOCATE(myflux_src_vf(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
426  ix%beg:ix%end, &
427  iy%beg:iy%end, &
428  iz%beg:iz%end ))
429  END DO
430 
431  IF(i == 1) THEN
432 
433  DO l = 1, cont_idx%end
434  ALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
435  ix%beg:ix%end, &
436  iy%beg:iy%end, &
437  iz%beg:iz%end ))
438  ALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
439  ix%beg:ix%end, &
440  iy%beg:iy%end, &
441  iz%beg:iz%end ))
442  END DO
443 
444  IF(weno_vars == 1) THEN
445  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
446  ALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
447  ix%beg:ix%end, &
448  iy%beg:iy%end, &
449  iz%beg:iz%end ))
450  ALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
451  ix%beg:ix%end, &
452  iy%beg:iy%end, &
453  iz%beg:iz%end ))
454  END DO
455  END IF
456 
457  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
458  ALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
459  ix%beg:ix%end, &
460  iy%beg:iy%end, &
461  iz%beg:iz%end ))
462  ALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
463  ix%beg:ix%end, &
464  iy%beg:iy%end, &
465  iz%beg:iz%end ))
466  END DO
467  IF (model_eqns == 3) THEN
468  DO l = internalenergies_idx%beg, internalenergies_idx%end
469  ALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
470  ix%beg:ix%end, &
471  iy%beg:iy%end, &
472  iz%beg:iz%end ))
473  ALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
474  ix%beg:ix%end, &
475  iy%beg:iy%end, &
476  iz%beg:iz%end ))
477  END DO
478  END IF
479 
480  DO l = adv_idx%beg, sys_size
481  ALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
482  ix%beg:ix%end, &
483  iy%beg:iy%end, &
484  iz%beg:iz%end ))
485  ALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
486  ix%beg:ix%end, &
487  iy%beg:iy%end, &
488  iz%beg:iz%end ))
489  END DO
490 
491  IF (bubbles) THEN
492  DO l = bub_idx%beg, sys_size
493  ALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
494  ix%beg:ix%end, &
495  iy%beg:iy%end, &
496  iz%beg:iz%end ))
497  ALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
498  ix%beg:ix%end, &
499  iy%beg:iy%end, &
500  iz%beg:iz%end ))
501  END DO
502  END IF
503 
504  ELSE
505 
506  DO l = 1, sys_size
507  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
508  ql_cons_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
509  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
510  qr_cons_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
511  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
512  ql_prim_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
513  qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
514  qr_prim_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
515  END DO
516 
517  IF( (char_decomp .NEQV. .true.) &
518  .AND. &
519  any(re_size > 0) ) THEN
520  IF(weno_vars == 1) THEN
521  DO l = 1, mom_idx%end
522  ALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
523  ix%beg:ix%end, &
524  iy%beg:iy%end, &
525  iz%beg:iz%end ))
526  ALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
527  ix%beg:ix%end, &
528  iy%beg:iy%end, &
529  iz%beg:iz%end ))
530  END DO
531  ELSE
532  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
533  ALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
534  ix%beg:ix%end, &
535  iy%beg:iy%end, &
536  iz%beg:iz%end ))
537  ALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
538  ix%beg:ix%end, &
539  iy%beg:iy%end, &
540  iz%beg:iz%end ))
541  END DO
542  IF (model_eqns == 3) THEN
543  DO l = internalenergies_idx%beg, internalenergies_idx%end
544  ALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
545  ix%beg:ix%end, &
546  iy%beg:iy%end, &
547  iz%beg:iz%end ))
548  ALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
549  ix%beg:ix%end, &
550  iy%beg:iy%end, &
551  iz%beg:iz%end ))
552  END DO
553  END IF
554  END IF
555  END IF
556 
557  DO l = 1, crv_size
558  ALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
559  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
560  ix%beg:ix%end, &
561  iy%beg:iy%end, &
562  iz%beg:iz%end ))
563  ALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
564  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
565  ix%beg:ix%end, &
566  iy%beg:iy%end, &
567  iz%beg:iz%end ))
568  END DO
569 
570  END IF
571 
572  DO l = 1, cont_idx%end
573  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
574  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
575  qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
576  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
577  END DO
578 
579  !DO l = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
580  ! qL_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
581  ! qL_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
582  ! qR_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
583  ! qR_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
584  !END DO
585 
586  IF (adv_alphan ) THEN
587  DO l = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
588  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
589  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
590  qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
591  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
592  END DO
593  ELSE
594  DO l = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end+1
595  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
596  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
597  qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
598  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
599  END DO
600  END IF
601 
602  END IF
603 
604  END DO
605  END DO
606  END DO
607  ! END: Allocation/Association of qK_cons_ndqp and qK_prim_ndqp =====
608 
609 
610  ! Allocation of dq_prim_ds_qp ======================================
611  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0 .OR. tvd_rhs_flux) THEN
612 
613  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dx_qp( ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
614  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
615  itau%beg:itau%end ))
616  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dy_qp( ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
617  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
618  itau%beg:itau%end ))
619  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dz_qp( ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
620  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
621  itau%beg:itau%end ))
622  ALLOCATE( gm_vel_qp( ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
623  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
624  itau%beg:itau%end ))
625 
626  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end
627  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end
628  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end
629 
630  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
631  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
632  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
633  ALLOCATE( gm_vel_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
634 
635  IF(all((/i,j,k/) == 0) .AND. any(re_size > 0)) THEN
636 
637  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
638  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
639  ix%beg:ix%end, &
640  iy%beg:iy%end, &
641  iz%beg:iz%end ))
642  ALLOCATE( gm_vel_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
643  ix%beg:ix%end, &
644  iy%beg:iy%end, &
645  iz%beg:iz%end ))
646  END DO
647 
648  IF(n > 0) THEN
649 
650  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
651  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
652  ix%beg:ix%end, &
653  iy%beg:iy%end, &
654  iz%beg:iz%end ))
655  END DO
656 
657  IF(p > 0) THEN
658  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
659  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
660  ix%beg:ix%end, &
661  iy%beg:iy%end, &
662  iz%beg:iz%end ))
663  END DO
664  END IF
665 
666  END IF
667 
668  END IF
669 
670  IF( (i /= 0 .AND. abs(j) >= abs(k)) &
671  .OR. &
672  all((/i,j,k/) == 0) ) THEN
673 
674  DO l = 1, crv_size
675  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf( &
676  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
677  ix%beg:ix%end, &
678  iy%beg:iy%end, &
679  iz%beg:iz%end ))
680  IF (n > 0) THEN
681  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf( &
682  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
683  ix%beg:ix%end, &
684  iy%beg:iy%end, &
685  iz%beg:iz%end ))
686  END IF
687  END DO
688 
689  IF(p > 0) THEN
690  DO l = 1, crv_size
691  ALLOCATE(dq_prim_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf( &
692  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
693  ix%beg:ix%end, &
694  iy%beg:iy%end, &
695  iz%beg:iz%end ))
696  END DO
697  END IF
698 
699  END IF
700 
701  END DO
702  END DO
703  END DO
704 
705  END IF
706  ! END: Allocation of dq_prim_ds_qp =================================
707 
708 
709  ! Allocation/Association of dqK_prim_ds_ndqp =======================
710  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dx_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
711  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
712  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
713  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dy_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
714  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
715  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
716  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dz_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
717  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
718  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
719  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dx_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
720  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
721  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
722  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dy_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
723  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
724  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
725  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dz_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
726  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
727  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
728 
729  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0) THEN
730  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
731  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
732  DO i = 1, num_dims
733 
734  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
735  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
736  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
737  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
738  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
739  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
740 
741  IF(abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
742 
743  IF(any(re_size > 0)) THEN
744 
745  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
746  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
747  ix%beg:ix%end, &
748  iy%beg:iy%end, &
749  iz%beg:iz%end ))
750  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
751  ix%beg:ix%end, &
752  iy%beg:iy%end, &
753  iz%beg:iz%end ))
754  END DO
755 
756  IF(n > 0) THEN
757  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
758  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
759  ix%beg:ix%end, &
760  iy%beg:iy%end, &
761  iz%beg:iz%end ))
762  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
763  ix%beg:ix%end, &
764  iy%beg:iy%end, &
765  iz%beg:iz%end ))
766  END DO
767  END IF
768 
769  IF(p > 0) THEN
770  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
771  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
772  ix%beg:ix%end, &
773  iy%beg:iy%end, &
774  iz%beg:iz%end ))
775  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
776  ix%beg:ix%end, &
777  iy%beg:iy%end, &
778  iz%beg:iz%end ))
779  END DO
780  END IF
781 
782  END IF
783 
784  DO l = 1, crv_size
785  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
786  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
787  ix%beg:ix%end, &
788  iy%beg:iy%end, &
789  iz%beg:iz%end ))
790  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
791  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
792  ix%beg:ix%end, &
793  iy%beg:iy%end, &
794  iz%beg:iz%end ))
795  IF (n > 0) THEN
796  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
797  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
798  ix%beg:ix%end, &
799  iy%beg:iy%end, &
800  iz%beg:iz%end ))
801  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
802  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
803  ix%beg:ix%end, &
804  iy%beg:iy%end, &
805  iz%beg:iz%end ))
806  IF (p > 0) THEN
807  ALLOCATE(dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
808  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
809  ix%beg:ix%end, &
810  iy%beg:iy%end, &
811  iz%beg:iz%end ))
812  ALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
813  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf( &
814  ix%beg:ix%end, &
815  iy%beg:iy%end, &
816  iz%beg:iz%end ))
817  END IF
818  END IF
819  END DO
820 
821  END IF
822 
823  END DO
824  END DO
825  END DO
826  END IF
827  ! END: Allocation/Association of dqK_prim_ds_ndqp ==================
828 
829 
830  ! Allocation of gm_alpha_qp ========================================
831  ALLOCATE(gm_alpha_qp( ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
832  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
833  itau%beg:itau%end ))
834 
835  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
836  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end
837  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end
838  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end
839 
840  ALLOCATE(gm_alpha_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
841 
842  IF(any(sum(abs((/i,j,k/))) == (/0,num_dims/))) THEN
843  DO l = 1, crv_size
844  ALLOCATE(gm_alpha_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
845  ix%beg:ix%end, &
846  iy%beg:iy%end, &
847  iz%beg:iz%end ))
848  END DO
849  END IF
850 
851  END DO
852  END DO
853  END DO
854  END IF
855  ! ==================================================================
856 
857 
858  ! Allocation of gm_alphaK_ndqp =====================================
859  ALLOCATE(gm_alphal_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
860  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
861  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
862  ALLOCATE(gm_alphar_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
863  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
864  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
865 
866  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
867  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
868  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
869  DO i = 1, num_dims
870 
871  ALLOCATE(gm_alphal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
872  ALLOCATE(gm_alphar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
873 
874  IF (abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
875  DO l = 1, crv_size
876  ALLOCATE(gm_alphal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
877  crv_idx(l))%sf( &
878  ix%beg:ix%end, &
879  iy%beg:iy%end, &
880  iz%beg:iz%end ))
881  ALLOCATE(gm_alphar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
882  crv_idx(l))%sf( &
883  ix%beg:ix%end, &
884  iy%beg:iy%end, &
885  iz%beg:iz%end ))
886  END DO
887  END IF
888 
889  END DO
890  END DO
891  END DO
892  END IF
893  ! ==================================================================
894 
895 
896  ! Allocation of un_alphaK_s_ndqp ===================================
897  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
898 
899  ALLOCATE(un_alphal_x_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
900  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
901  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
902  ALLOCATE(un_alphal_y_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
903  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
904  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
905  ALLOCATE(un_alphal_z_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
906  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
907  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
908  ALLOCATE(un_alphar_x_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
909  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
910  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
911  ALLOCATE(un_alphar_y_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
912  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
913  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
914  ALLOCATE(un_alphar_z_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
915  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
916  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
917 
918  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
919  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
920 
921  DO i = 1, num_dims
922  ALLOCATE(un_alphal_x_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
923  ALLOCATE(un_alphal_y_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
924  ALLOCATE(un_alphal_z_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
925  ALLOCATE(un_alphar_x_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
926  ALLOCATE(un_alphar_y_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
927  ALLOCATE(un_alphar_z_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
928  END DO
929 
930  IF (abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
931 
932  DO l = 1, crv_size
933  ALLOCATE(un_alphal_x_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
934  ix%beg:ix%end, &
935  iy%beg:iy%end, &
936  iz%beg:iz%end ))
937  ALLOCATE(un_alphar_x_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
938  ix%beg:ix%end, &
939  iy%beg:iy%end, &
940  iz%beg:iz%end ))
941  IF (n > 0) THEN
942  ALLOCATE(un_alphal_y_ndqp(2,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
943  ix%beg:ix%end, &
944  iy%beg:iy%end, &
945  iz%beg:iz%end ))
946  ALLOCATE(un_alphar_y_ndqp(2,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
947  ix%beg:ix%end, &
948  iy%beg:iy%end, &
949  iz%beg:iz%end ))
950  IF (p > 0) THEN
951  ALLOCATE(un_alphal_z_ndqp(3,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
952  ix%beg:ix%end, &
953  iy%beg:iy%end, &
954  iz%beg:iz%end ))
955  ALLOCATE(un_alphar_z_ndqp(3,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
956  ix%beg:ix%end, &
957  iy%beg:iy%end, &
958  iz%beg:iz%end ))
959  END IF
960  END IF
961  END DO
962  END IF
963 
964  END DO
965  END DO
966 
967  END IF
968  ! END: Allocation of un_alphaK_s_ndqp ==============================
969 
970 
971  ! Allocation of kappa_vf ===========================================
972  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
973 
974  ALLOCATE(kappa_vf(1:num_fluids))
975 
976  DO i = 1, crv_size
977  ALLOCATE(kappa_vf(crv_idx(i))%sf( ix%beg:ix%end, &
978  iy%beg:iy%end, &
979  iz%beg:iz%end ))
980  END DO
981 
982  END IF
983  ! ==================================================================
984 
985 
986  ! Allocation/Association of kappaK_ndqp ============================
987  ALLOCATE(kappal_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
988  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
989  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
990  ALLOCATE(kappar_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
991  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
992  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
993 
994  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
995  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
996  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
997  DO i = 1, num_dims
998 
999  ALLOCATE(kappal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
1000  ALLOCATE(kappar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
1001 
1002  IF(abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
1003  IF(i == 1) THEN
1004  DO l = 1, crv_size
1005  ALLOCATE(kappal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
1006  crv_idx(l))%sf( &
1007  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1008  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1009  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1010  ALLOCATE(kappar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
1011  crv_idx(l))%sf( &
1012  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1013  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1014  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1015  END DO
1016  ELSE
1017  DO l = 1, crv_size
1018  kappal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf => &
1019  kappal_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf
1020  kappar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf => &
1021  kappar_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf
1022  END DO
1023  END IF
1024  END IF
1025 
1026  END DO
1027  END DO
1028  END DO
1029  END IF
1030  ! ==================================================================
1031 
1032 
1033  IF (alt_crv) THEN
1034  ! Allocation of dgm_alpha_ds_qp & un_alpha_s_qp ================
1035  ALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dx_qp(ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
1036  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
1037  itau%beg:itau%end ))
1038  ALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dy_qp(ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
1039  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
1040  itau%beg:itau%end ))
1041  ALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dz_qp(ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
1042  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
1043  itau%beg:itau%end ))
1044  ALLOCATE(un_alpha_x_qp(ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
1045  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
1046  itau%beg:itau%end ))
1047  ALLOCATE(un_alpha_y_qp(ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
1048  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
1049  itau%beg:itau%end ))
1050  ALLOCATE(un_alpha_z_qp(ieta%beg:ieta%end, &
1051  iksi%beg:iksi%end, &
1052  itau%beg:itau%end ))
1053 
1054  IF (we_size > 0) THEN
1055  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end
1056  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end
1057  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end
1058  ALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
1059  ALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
1060  ALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
1061  ALLOCATE(un_alpha_x_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
1062  ALLOCATE(un_alpha_y_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
1063  ALLOCATE(un_alpha_z_qp(i,j,k)%vf(1:num_fluids))
1064 
1065  IF (any(sum(abs((/i,j,k/))) == (/0,num_dims/))) THEN
1066  DO l = 1, crv_size
1067  ALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
1068  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1069  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1070  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1071  ALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
1072  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1073  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1074  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1075  ALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
1076  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1077  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1078  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1079  ALLOCATE(un_alpha_x_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
1080  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1081  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1082  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1083  ALLOCATE(un_alpha_y_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
1084  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1085  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1086  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1087  ALLOCATE(un_alpha_z_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf( &
1088  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1089  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1090  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1091  END DO
1092  END IF
1093 
1094  END DO
1095  END DO
1096  END DO
1097  END IF
1098  END IF
1099  ! ==============================================================
1100 
1101 
1102  ! Allocation of laplacian_vf and alt_kappa_vf
1103  IF (we_size > 0) THEN
1104  IF (alt_crv) THEN
1105  ALLOCATE(laplacian_vf(1:num_fluids))
1106  ALLOCATE(alt_kappa_vf(1:num_fluids))
1107 
1108  DO i = 1, crv_size
1109  ALLOCATE(laplacian_vf(crv_idx(i))%sf( ix%beg:ix%end, &
1110  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1111  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1112  ALLOCATE(alt_kappa_vf(crv_idx(i))%sf( ix%beg:ix%end, &
1113  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1114  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1115  END DO
1116  END IF
1117 
1118  IF (we_src) THEN
1119  ALLOCATE(we_mtm_src(0:m,0:n,0:p))
1120  ALLOCATE(we_nrg_src(0:m,0:n,0:p))
1121  END IF
1122 
1123  END IF
1124 
1125  ! Allocation of regularization terms
1126  IF (regularization) THEN
1127  ALLOCATE(reg_src_vf(1:sys_size))
1128  DO i = 1, sys_size
1129  ALLOCATE(reg_src_vf(i)%sf(0:m,0:n,0:p))
1130  END DO
1131  END IF
1132 
1133  IF (bubbles) THEN
1134  ALLOCATE( bub_adv_src(0:m,0:n,0:p) )
1135  ALLOCATE( bub_r_src(1:nb,0:m,0:n,0:p) )
1136  ALLOCATE( bub_v_src(1:nb,0:m,0:n,0:p) )
1137  ALLOCATE( bub_p_src(1:nb,0:m,0:n,0:p) )
1138  ALLOCATE( bub_m_src(1:nb,0:m,0:n,0:p) )
1139  END IF
1140 
1141  IF (monopole) THEN
1142  ALLOCATE( mono_mass_src(0:m,0:n,0:p) )
1143  ALLOCATE( mono_mom_src(1:num_dims,0:m,0:n,0:p) )
1144  ALLOCATE( mono_e_src(0:m,0:n,0:p) )
1145  END IF
1146 
1147  ALLOCATE( divu%sf( &
1148  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1149  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1150  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1151 
1152  ! Configuring Coordinate Direction Indexes =========================
1153  ix%beg = -1; IF(n > 0) iy%beg = -1; IF(p > 0) iz%beg = -1
1154 
1155  ix%end = m; iy%end = n; iz%end = p
1156  ! ==================================================================
1157 
1158  ! Allocation/Association of flux_ndqp, flux_src_ndqp, and flux_gsrc_ndqp ===
1159  ALLOCATE( flux_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
1160  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
1161  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
1162  ALLOCATE(flux_src_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
1163  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
1164  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
1165  ALLOCATE(flux_gsrc_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
1166  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
1167  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
1168 
1169  ! Allocation of variables for flux limiter
1170  IF (tvd_rhs_flux) THEN
1171  ALLOCATE(flux_lim_func(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
1172 
1173  ALLOCATE( lo_flux_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
1174  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
1175  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
1176  ALLOCATE(lo_flux_src_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
1177  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
1178  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
1179  ALLOCATE(lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
1180  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
1181  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
1182  ALLOCATE( hi_flux_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
1183  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
1184  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
1185  ALLOCATE(hi_flux_src_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
1186  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
1187  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
1188  ALLOCATE(hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp( 1 :num_dims, &
1189  ichi%beg:ichi%end, &
1190  ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ))
1191  END IF
1192 
1193  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
1194  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
1195  DO i = 1, num_dims
1196 
1197  ALLOCATE( flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
1198  ALLOCATE(flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
1199  ALLOCATE(flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
1200 
1201  IF(abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
1202  IF(i == 1) THEN
1203 
1204  DO l = 1, sys_size
1205  ALLOCATE(flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1206  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1207  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1208  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1209  ALLOCATE(flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1210  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1211  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1212  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1213  END DO
1214 
1215  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0) THEN
1216  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
1217  ALLOCATE(flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1218  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1219  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1220  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1221  END DO
1222  END IF
1223 
1224  ALLOCATE(flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf( &
1225  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1226  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1227  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1228  IF(riemann_solver == 1) THEN
1229  DO l = adv_idx%beg+1, adv_idx%end
1230  ALLOCATE(flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1231  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1232  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1233  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1234  END DO
1235  ELSE
1236  !IF ( (num_fluids > 1) .AND. (bubbles .NEQV. .TRUE.)) THEN
1237  DO l = adv_idx%beg+1, adv_idx%end
1238  flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1239  flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf
1240  END DO
1241  !END IF
1242  END IF
1243 
1244  ELSE
1245 
1246  DO l = 1, sys_size
1247  flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1248  flux_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1249  flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1250  flux_src_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1251  flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1252  flux_gsrc_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1253  END DO
1254 
1255  END IF
1256  END IF
1257 
1258  END DO
1259  END DO
1260  END DO
1261 
1262  IF (tvd_rhs_flux) THEN
1263  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
1264  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
1265  DO i = 1, num_dims
1266 
1267  ALLOCATE( lo_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
1268  ALLOCATE(lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
1269  ALLOCATE(lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
1270  ALLOCATE( hi_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
1271  ALLOCATE(hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
1272  ALLOCATE(hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(1:sys_size))
1273 
1274  IF (abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
1275  IF (i == 1) THEN
1276  DO l = 1, sys_size
1277  ALLOCATE(lo_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1278  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1279  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1280  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1281  ALLOCATE(hi_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1282  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1283  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1284  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1285  ALLOCATE(lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1286  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1287  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1288  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1289  ALLOCATE(hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1290  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1291  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1292  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1293  END DO
1294 
1295  IF (any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0) THEN
1296  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
1297  ALLOCATE(lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1298  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1299  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1300  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1301  ALLOCATE(hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1302  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1303  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1304  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1305  END DO
1306  END IF
1307 
1308  ALLOCATE(lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf( &
1309  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1310  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1311  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1312  ALLOCATE(hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf( &
1313  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1314  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1315  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1316  IF (riemann_solver == 1) THEN
1317  DO l = adv_idx%beg+1, adv_idx%end
1318  ALLOCATE(lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1319  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1320  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1321  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1322  ALLOCATE(hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf( &
1323  ix%beg:ix%end, &
1324  iy%beg:iy%end, &
1325  iz%beg:iz%end ))
1326  END DO
1327  ELSE
1328  DO l = adv_idx%beg+1, adv_idx%end
1329  lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1330  lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf
1331  hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1332  hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf
1333  END DO
1334  END IF
1335  ELSE
1336  DO l = 1, sys_size
1337  lo_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1338  lo_flux_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1339  hi_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1340  hi_flux_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1341  lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1342  lo_flux_src_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1343  hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1344  hi_flux_src_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1345  lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1346  lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1347  hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf => &
1348  hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1349  END DO
1350  END IF
1351  END IF
1352  END DO
1353  END DO
1354  END DO
1355  END IF
1356  ! END: Allocation/Association of flux_ndqp, flux_src_ndqp, and flux_gsrc_ndqp ===
1357 
1358 
1359  ! Associating procedural pointer to the subroutine that will be
1360  ! utilized to calculate the solution of a given Riemann problem
1361  IF(riemann_solver == 1) THEN
1362  s_riemann_solver => s_hll_riemann_solver
1363  ELSEIF(riemann_solver == 2) THEN
1364  s_riemann_solver => s_hllc_riemann_solver
1365  ELSE
1366  s_riemann_solver => s_exact_riemann_solver
1367  END IF
1368 
1369  ! Associating the procedural pointer to the appropriate subroutine
1370  ! that will be utilized in the conversion to the mixture variables
1371  IF (model_eqns == 1) THEN ! Gamma/pi_inf model
1372  s_convert_to_mixture_variables => &
1373  s_convert_mixture_to_mixture_variables
1374  ELSE IF (bubbles) THEN ! Volume fraction for bubbles
1375  s_convert_to_mixture_variables => &
1376  s_convert_species_to_mixture_variables_bubbles
1377  ELSE ! Volume fraction model
1378  s_convert_to_mixture_variables => &
1379  s_convert_species_to_mixture_variables
1380  END IF
1381 
1382  END SUBROUTINE s_initialize_rhs_module ! -------------------------------
1383 
1384 
1385 
1395  SUBROUTINE s_compute_rhs(q_cons_vf, q_prim_vf, rhs_vf, t_step) ! -------
1396 
1397  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: q_cons_vf
1398  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: q_prim_vf
1399  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: rhs_vf
1400  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: t_step
1401 
1402  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: top, bottom
1403 
1404  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(0:m,0:n,0:p) :: blkmod1, blkmod2, alpha1, alpha2, Kterm
1406 
1407  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l,r
1408 
1409 
1410  ! Configuring Coordinate Direction Indexes =========================
1411  ix%beg = -buff_size; iy%beg = 0; iz%beg = 0
1412 
1413  IF(n > 0) iy%beg = -buff_size; IF(p > 0) iz%beg = -buff_size
1414 
1415  ix%end = m - ix%beg; iy%end = n - iy%beg; iz%end = p - iz%beg
1416  ! ==================================================================
1417 
1418 
1419  ! Association/Population of Working Variables ======================
1420  DO i = 1, sys_size
1421  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf => q_cons_vf(i)%sf
1422  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf => q_prim_vf(i)%sf
1423  END DO
1424 
1425  CALL s_populate_conservative_variables_buffers()
1426 
1427  IF((model_eqns == 2 .OR. model_eqns == 3) .AND. (adv_alphan .NEQV. .true.)) THEN
1428  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(sys_size)%sf = 1d0
1429 
1430  DO i = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
1431  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(sys_size)%sf = &
1432  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(sys_size)%sf - &
1433  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf
1434  END DO
1435  END IF
1436 
1437  IF (mpp_lim .AND. bubbles) THEN
1438  !adjust volume fractions, according to modeled gas void fraction
1439  alf_sum%sf = 0d0
1440  DO i = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end - 1
1441  alf_sum%sf = alf_sum%sf + q_cons_vf(i)%sf
1442  END DO
1443 
1444  DO i = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end-1
1445  q_cons_vf(i)%sf = q_cons_vf(i)%sf * (1.d0 - q_cons_vf(alf_idx)%sf) &
1446  / alf_sum%sf
1447  END DO
1448  END IF
1449 
1450  ! ==================================================================
1451 
1452 
1453  ! Computing Volume Fraction Gradients and Curvatures ===============
1454  IF (we_size > 0 .AND. lsq_deriv) THEN
1455  IF (p > 0) THEN
1456  CALL s_compute_lsq_gradient_curvature( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1457  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1458  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1459  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1460  gm_alpha_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1461  kappa_vf)
1462  ELSE
1463  CALL s_compute_lsq_gradient_curvature( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1464  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1465  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1466  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1467  gm_alpha_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1468  kappa_vf)
1469  END IF
1470  END IF
1471 
1472  IF (crv_size > 0) CALL s_get_crv(q_cons_vf,q_prim_vf,rhs_vf)
1473 
1474  ! Converting Conservative to Primitive Variables ===================
1475  iv%beg = 1; iv%end = adv_idx%end
1476 
1477  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(q_cons_qp)
1478 
1479  IF( (model_eqns == 2 .OR. model_eqns == 3) &
1480  .AND. &
1481  (adv_alphan .NEQV. .true.) &
1482  .AND. &
1483  commute_err ) THEN
1484  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end, 2
1485  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end, 2
1486  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end, 2
1487 
1488  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%end)%sf = 1d0
1489 
1490  DO l = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
1491  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%end)%sf = &
1492  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%end)%sf - &
1493  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1494  END DO
1495 
1496  END DO
1497  END DO
1498  END DO
1499  END IF
1500 
1501  !convert conservative variables to primative
1502  ! (except first and last, \alpha \rho and \alpha)
1503  !we do this, though there is no actual loop, just (0,0,0)
1504  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end, 2
1505  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end, 2
1506  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end, 2
1507  CALL s_convert_conservative_to_primitive_variables( &
1508  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1509  q_prim_qp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1510  gm_alpha_qp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1511  ix,iy,iz )
1512  END DO
1513  END DO
1514  END DO
1515 
1516  iv%beg = mom_idx%beg; iv%end = e_idx
1517 
1518  CALL s_average_cell_interior_values(q_prim_qp)
1519 
1520  IF(t_step == t_step_stop) RETURN
1521  ! ==================================================================
1522 
1523  ! Computing Velocity Gradients =====================================
1524  IF (any(re_size > 0)) CALL s_get_viscous(q_cons_vf,q_prim_vf,rhs_vf)
1525 
1526 
1527  ! Dimensional Splitting Loop =======================================
1528  DO i = 1, num_dims
1529 
1530  ! Configuring Coordinate Direction Indexes ======================
1531  ix%beg = -buff_size; iy%beg = 0; iz%beg = 0
1532 
1533  IF(n > 0) iy%beg = -buff_size; IF(p > 0) iz%beg = -buff_size
1534 
1535  ix%end = m - ix%beg; iy%end = n - iy%beg; iz%end = p - iz%beg
1536  ! ===============================================================
1537 
1538  ! Reconstructing Primitive/Conservative Variables ===============
1539  IF(char_decomp .OR. (all(re_size == 0) .AND. we_size == 0)) THEN
1540 
1541  iv%beg = 1;
1542  IF (adv_alphan) THEN
1543  iv%end = adv_idx%end
1544  IF (bubbles) iv%end = sys_size
1545  ELSE
1546  iv%end = adv_idx%end+1
1547  END IF
1548 
1549  !reconstruct either primative or conservative vars
1550  IF(weno_vars == 1) THEN
1551  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1552  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1553  ql_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1554  qr_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1555  weno_vars, i )
1556  ELSE
1557  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1558  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1559  ql_prim_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1560  qr_prim_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1561  weno_vars, i )
1562  END IF
1563 
1564  ELSE
1565  ! ===============================================================
1566 
1567  ! Reconstructing Continuity Variables ===========================
1568  IF(weno_vars == 2 .OR. all(re_size == 0)) THEN
1569 
1570  iv%beg = cont_idx%beg; iv%end = cont_idx%end
1571 
1572  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1573  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1574  ql_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1575  qr_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1576  dflt_int, i )
1577 
1578  END IF
1579  ! ===============================================================
1580 
1581  ! Reconstructing Momentum/Velocity Variables ====================
1582  IF(all(re_size == 0)) THEN
1583 
1584  iv%beg = mom_idx%beg; iv%end = mom_idx%end
1585 
1586  IF(weno_vars == 1) THEN
1587  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1588  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1589  ql_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1590  qr_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1591  dflt_int, i )
1592  ELSE
1593  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1594  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1595  ql_prim_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1596  qr_prim_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1597  dflt_int, i )
1598  END IF
1599 
1600  END IF
1601  ! ===============================================================
1602 
1603  ! Reconstructing Partial or Mixture Energy/Pressure Variables ===
1604  iv%beg = e_idx; iv%end = iv%beg
1605 
1606  IF(weno_vars == 1) THEN
1607  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1608  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1609  ql_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1610  qr_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1611  dflt_int, i )
1612  ELSE
1613  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1614  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1615  ql_prim_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1616  qr_prim_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1617  dflt_int, i )
1618  END IF
1619  ! ===============================================================
1620 
1621  ! Reconstructing Volume Fraction Variables ======================
1622  IF(we_size == 0) THEN
1623 
1624  iv%beg = adv_idx%beg; iv%end = adv_idx%end
1625 
1626  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1627  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1628  ql_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1629  qr_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1630  dflt_int, i )
1631 
1632  ELSE
1633 
1634  DO l = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
1635  IF(all(crv_idx /= l - e_idx)) THEN
1636 
1637  iv%beg = l; iv%end = iv%beg
1638 
1639  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1640  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1641  ql_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1642  qr_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1643  dflt_int, i )
1644 
1645  END IF
1646  END DO
1647 
1648  END IF
1649  ! ===============================================================
1650 
1651  END IF
1652 
1653  IF((model_eqns == 2 .OR. model_eqns == 3) .AND. (adv_alphan .NEQV. .true.)) THEN
1654  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end, 2
1655  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end, 2
1656 
1657  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(sys_size)%sf = 1d0
1658  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(sys_size)%sf = 1d0
1659 
1660  DO l = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
1661 
1662  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(sys_size)%sf = &
1663  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(sys_size)%sf - &
1664  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1665 
1666  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(sys_size)%sf = &
1667  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(sys_size)%sf - &
1668  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
1669  END DO
1670 
1671  END DO
1672  END DO
1673  END IF
1674  ! END: Reconstructing Volume Fraction Variables =================
1675 
1676  ! Converting Conservative to Primitive Variables ================
1677  IF(weno_vars == 1) THEN
1678  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end, 2
1679  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end, 2
1680  CALL s_convert_conservative_to_primitive_variables( &
1681  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1682  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1683  gm_alphal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1684  ix,iy,iz )
1685  CALL s_convert_conservative_to_primitive_variables( &
1686  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1687  qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1688  gm_alphar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1689  ix,iy,iz )
1690  END DO
1691  END DO
1692  END IF
1693  ! ===============================================================
1694 
1695  ! Reconstructing First-Order Spatial Derivatives of Velocity ====
1696  IF(any(re_size > 0)) THEN
1697 
1698  iv%beg = mom_idx%beg; iv%end = mom_idx%end
1699 
1700  IF (weno_re_flux) THEN
1701 
1702  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1703  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1704  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1705  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1706  dflt_int, i )
1707 
1708  IF(n > 0) THEN
1709 
1710  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1711  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1712  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1713  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1714  dflt_int, i )
1715  IF(p > 0) THEN
1716  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1717  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1718  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1719  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1720  dflt_int, i )
1721  END IF
1722 
1723  END IF
1724 
1725  END IF
1726 
1727  END IF
1728  ! ===============================================================
1729 
1730  ! Reconstructing Curvatures =====================================
1731  DO l = 1, crv_size
1732 
1733  iv%beg = crv_idx(l); iv%end = iv%beg
1734 
1735  IF (alt_crv .NEQV. .true.) THEN
1736  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1737  kappa_vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1738  kappal_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1739  kappar_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1740  dflt_int, i )
1741  ELSE
1742  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
1743  alt_kappa_vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
1744  kappal_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1745  kappar_ndqp(i,:,:), &
1746  dflt_int, i )
1747  END IF
1748 
1749  END DO
1750  ! ===============================================================
1751 
1752  ! Configuring Coordinate Direction Indexes ======================
1753  IF(i == 1) THEN
1754  ix%beg = -1; iy%beg = 0; iz%beg = 0
1755  ELSEIF(i == 2) THEN
1756  ix%beg = 0; iy%beg = -1; iz%beg = 0
1757  ELSE
1758  ix%beg = 0; iy%beg = 0; iz%beg = -1
1759  END IF
1760 
1761  ix%end = m; iy%end = n; iz%end = p
1762  ! ===============================================================
1763 
1764  IF (tvd_rhs_flux) THEN
1765  ! Compute Riemann solver flux and source flux
1766  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end, 2
1767  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end, 2
1768  CALL s_riemann_solver( qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1769  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1770  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1771  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1772  gm_alphar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1773  kappar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1774  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1775  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1776  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1777  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1778  gm_alphal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1779  kappal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1780  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1781  hi_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1782  hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1783  hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1784  i, ix,iy,iz )
1785  END DO
1786  END DO
1787 
1788  DO l = itau%beg, itau%end, 2
1789  DO k = iksi%beg, iksi%end, 2
1790  DO j = ieta%beg, ieta%end, 2
1791  CALL s_riemann_solver( q_prim_qp(j,k,l)%vf, &
1792  dq_prim_dx_qp(j,k,l)%vf, &
1793  dq_prim_dy_qp(j,k,l)%vf, &
1794  dq_prim_dz_qp(j,k,l)%vf, &
1795  gm_alpha_qp(j,k,l)%vf, &
1796  kappa_vf, &
1797  q_prim_qp(j,k,l)%vf, &
1798  dq_prim_dx_qp(j,k,l)%vf, &
1799  dq_prim_dy_qp(j,k,l)%vf, &
1800  dq_prim_dz_qp(j,k,l)%vf, &
1801  gm_alpha_qp(j,k,l)%vf, &
1802  kappa_vf, &
1803  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1804  lo_flux_ndqp(i,k,l)%vf, &
1805  lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,k,l)%vf, &
1806  lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,k,l)%vf, &
1807  i, ix,iy,iz )
1808  END DO
1809  END DO
1810  END DO
1811  ELSE
1812  ! Computing Riemann Solver Flux and Source Flux =================
1813  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end, 2
1814  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end, 2
1815  CALL s_riemann_solver( qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1816  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1817  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1818  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1819  gm_alphar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1820  kappar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1821  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1822  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1823  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1824  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1825  gm_alphal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1826  kappal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1827  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
1828  flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1829  flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1830  flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, &
1831  i, ix,iy,iz )
1832  END DO
1833  END DO
1834 
1835  iv%beg = 1; iv%end = adv_idx%end
1836 
1837  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(flux_ndqp(i,:,:))
1838 
1839  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0) THEN
1840  iv%beg = mom_idx%beg
1841  ELSE
1842  iv%beg = adv_idx%beg
1843  END IF
1844 
1845  IF(riemann_solver /= 1) iv%end = adv_idx%beg
1846 
1847  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(flux_src_ndqp(i,:,:))
1848  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,:,:))
1849  ! ===============================================================
1850  END IF
1851 
1852 
1853  IF (alt_soundspeed .OR. regularization) THEN
1854  DO j = 0, m
1855  DO k = 0, n
1856  DO l = 0, p
1857  blkmod1(j,k,l) = ((fluid_pp(1)%gamma+1d0)*q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) + &
1858  fluid_pp(1)%pi_inf)/fluid_pp(1)%gamma
1859  blkmod2(j,k,l) = ((fluid_pp(2)%gamma+1d0)*q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) + &
1860  fluid_pp(2)%pi_inf)/fluid_pp(2)%gamma
1861  alpha1(j,k,l) = q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l)
1862 
1863  IF (bubbles) THEN
1864  alpha2(j,k,l) = q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(alf_idx-1)%sf(j,k,l)
1865  ELSE
1866  alpha2(j,k,l) = q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%end)%sf(j,k,l)
1867  END IF
1868 
1869  kterm(j,k,l) = alpha1(j,k,l)*alpha2(j,k,l)*(blkmod2(j,k,l)-blkmod1(j,k,l)) / &
1870  (alpha1(j,k,l)*blkmod2(j,k,l) + alpha2(j,k,l)*blkmod1(j,k,l))
1871  END DO
1872  END DO
1873  END DO
1874  END IF
1875 
1876  ! RHS Contribution in x-direction ===============================
1877  IF(i == 1) THEN
1878 
1879  ! Compute upwind slope and flux limiter function value if TVD
1880  ! flux limiter is chosen
1881  IF (tvd_rhs_flux) CALL s_get_tvd_flux(q_cons_vf, q_prim_vf, rhs_vf,i)
1882 
1883  ! Applying characteristic boundary conditions
1884  IF(bc_x%beg <= -5) THEN
1885  CALL s_cbc( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, &
1886  flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, i, -1, ix,iy,iz )
1887  END IF
1888 
1889  IF(bc_x%end <= -5) THEN
1890  CALL s_cbc( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, &
1891  flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, i, 1, ix,iy,iz )
1892  END IF
1893 
1894  ! Applying the Riemann fluxes
1895  DO j = 1, sys_size
1896  DO k = 0, m
1897  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) = 1d0/dx(k) * &
1898  ( flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p) &
1899  - flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf( k ,0:n,0:p) )
1900  END DO
1901  END DO
1902 
1903  ! Applying source terms to the RHS of the advection equations
1904  IF(riemann_solver == 1) THEN
1905  DO j = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
1906  DO k = 0, m
1907  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) = &
1908  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) + 1d0/dx(k) * &
1909  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(k,0:n,0:p) * &
1910  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p) &
1911  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf( k ,0:n,0:p) )
1912  END DO
1913  END DO
1914  ELSE
1915  DO j = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
1916  IF (alt_soundspeed .OR. regularization) THEN
1917  IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == adv_idx%end) .AND. (bubbles .NEQV. .true.)) THEN
1918  !adv_idx%end, -k div(u)
1919  DO k = 0, m
1920  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) = &
1921  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) + 1d0/dx(k) * &
1922  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k,0:n,0:p) - kterm(k,:,:)) * &
1923  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf( k ,0:n,0:p) &
1924  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p) )
1925  END DO
1926  ELSE IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == adv_idx%beg) .AND. (bubbles .NEQV. .true.)) THEN
1927  !adv_idx%beg, +k div(u)
1928  DO k = 0, m
1929  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) = &
1930  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) + 1d0/dx(k) * &
1931  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k,0:n,0:p) + kterm(k,:,:)) * &
1932  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf( k ,0:n,0:p) &
1933  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p) )
1934  END DO
1935  ELSE IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == adv_idx%beg) .AND. bubbles) THEN
1936  !liquid part, +k div(u)
1937  DO k = 0, m
1938  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) = &
1939  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) + 1d0/dx(k) * &
1940  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k,0:n,0:p) + kterm(k,:,:)) * &
1941  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf( k ,0:n,0:p) &
1942  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p) )
1943  END DO
1944  ELSE IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == alf_idx-1) .AND. bubbles) THEN
1945  !resolved gas, -k div(u)
1946  DO k = 0, m
1947  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) = &
1948  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) + 1d0/dx(k) * &
1949  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k,0:n,0:p) - kterm(k,:,:)) * &
1950  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf( k ,0:n,0:p) &
1951  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p) )
1952  END DO
1953  ELSE IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == alf_idx) .AND. bubbles) THEN
1954  !bubble part, no k div(u)
1955  DO k = 0, m
1956  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) = &
1957  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) + 1d0/dx(k) * &
1958  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k,0:n,0:p) * &
1959  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf( k ,0:n,0:p) &
1960  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p) )
1961  END DO
1962  END IF
1963  ELSE
1964  !no k \div u, just adds other part of the transport equation
1965  DO k = 0, m
1966  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) = &
1967  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) + 1d0/dx(k) * &
1968  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k,0:n,0:p) * &
1969  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf( k ,0:n,0:p) &
1970  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p) )
1971  END DO
1972  END IF
1973  END DO
1974  END IF
1975 
1976  IF (bubbles) THEN
1977  CALL s_get_divergence(i,q_prim_vf,divu)
1978  CALL s_compute_bubble_source(i,q_prim_vf,q_cons_vf,divu, &
1979  bub_adv_src, bub_r_src, bub_v_src, bub_p_src, bub_m_src)
1980 
1981  rhs_vf( alf_idx )%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf( alf_idx )%sf(:,:,:) + bub_adv_src(:,:,:)
1982  IF ( num_fluids >1 ) rhs_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(:,:,:) - bub_adv_src(:,:,:)
1983 
1984  DO k = 1,nb
1985  rhs_vf(bub_idx%rs(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%rs(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_r_src(k,:,:,:)
1986  rhs_vf(bub_idx%vs(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%vs(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_v_src(k,:,:,:)
1987  IF (polytropic .NEQV. .true.) THEN
1988  rhs_vf(bub_idx%ps(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%ps(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_p_src(k,:,:,:)
1989  rhs_vf(bub_idx%ms(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%ms(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_m_src(k,:,:,:)
1990  END IF
1991  END DO
1992  END IF
1993 
1994  IF (monopole) THEN
1995  mono_mass_src = 0d0; mono_mom_src = 0d0; mono_e_src = 0d0;
1996  DO j = 1,num_mono
1997  CALL s_get_monopole(i,q_prim_vf,t_step,mono(j))
1998  END DO
1999  DO k = cont_idx%beg,cont_idx%end
2000  rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) + mono_mass_src(:,:,:)
2001  END DO
2002  DO k = mom_idx%beg,mom_idx%end
2003  rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) + mono_mom_src(k-cont_idx%end,:,:,:)
2004  END DO
2005  rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) + mono_e_src(:,:,:)
2006  END IF
2007 
2008  ! Applying source terms to the RHS of the internal energy equations
2009  IF(model_eqns == 3) THEN
2010  DO j = 1, num_fluids
2011  DO k = 0, m
2012  rhs_vf(j+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(k,:,:) = &
2013  rhs_vf(j+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(k,:,:) - 1d0/dx(k) * &
2014  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(k,0:n,0:p) * &
2015  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(e_idx)%sf(k,0:n,0:p) * &
2016  (flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf( k ,0:n,0:p) - &
2017  flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p))
2018  END DO
2019  END DO
2020  END IF
2021 
2022  ! Applying the viscous and capillary source fluxes from the Riemann solver
2023  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. (we_size > 0 .AND. we_riemann_flux)) THEN
2024  DO j = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
2025  DO k = 0, m
2026  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) = &
2027  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) + 1d0/dx(k) * &
2028  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p) &
2029  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf( k ,0:n,0:p) )
2030  END DO
2031  END DO
2032  END IF
2033 
2034  ! Applying the capillary stress tensor calculated outside the Riemann solver
2035  IF (we_size > 0 .AND. we_rhs_flux) THEN
2036  IF (p > 0) THEN
2037  CALL s_compute_capillary_stress_tensor(i, q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
2038  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2039  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2040  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2041  gm_alpha_qp(0,0,0)%vf)
2042  ELSE
2043  CALL s_compute_capillary_stress_tensor(i, q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
2044  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2045  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2046  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2047  gm_alpha_qp(0,0,0)%vf)
2048  END IF
2049  ! Divergence of capillary stress tensor computed using finite differences
2050  DO j = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
2051  DO k = 0, m
2052  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) = &
2053  rhs_vf(j)%sf(k,:,:) - 1d0/(x_cc(k+1) - x_cc(k-1)) * &
2054  ( tau_we_vf(j)%sf(k+1,0:n,0:p) &
2055  - tau_we_vf(j)%sf(k-1,0:n,0:p) )
2056  END DO
2057  END DO
2058  END IF
2059 
2060  ! Applying capillary source terms in momentum and energy equations
2061  IF (we_size > 0 .AND. we_src) THEN
2062  CALL s_compute_capillary_source(i,q_prim_vf)
2063  rhs_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(:,:,:) + we_mtm_src(:,:,:)
2064  rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) + we_nrg_src(:,:,:)
2065  END IF
2066 
2067 
2068 
2069  ! ===============================================================
2070 
2071  ! RHS Contribution in y-direction ===============================
2072  ELSEIF(i == 2) THEN
2073  ! Compute upwind slope and flux limiter function value if TVD
2074  ! flux limiter is chosen
2075 
2076  IF (tvd_rhs_flux) CALL s_get_tvd_flux(q_cons_vf, q_prim_vf, rhs_vf,i)
2077 
2078  ! Applying characteristic boundary conditions
2079  IF(bc_y%beg <= -5 .AND. bc_y%beg /= -13) THEN
2080  CALL s_cbc( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, &
2081  flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, i, -1, ix,iy,iz )
2082  END IF
2083 
2084  IF(bc_y%end <= -5) THEN
2085  CALL s_cbc( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, &
2086  flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, i, 1, ix,iy,iz )
2087  END IF
2088 
2089  ! Applying the Riemann fluxes
2090  DO j = 1, sys_size
2091  DO k = 0, n
2092  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2093  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + 1d0/dy(k) * &
2094  ( flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) &
2095  - flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) )
2096  END DO
2097  END DO
2098 
2099  ! Applying source terms to the RHS of the advection equations
2100  IF(riemann_solver == 1) THEN
2101  DO j = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
2102  DO k = 0, n
2103  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2104  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + 1d0/dy(k) * &
2105  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) * &
2106  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) &
2107  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) )
2108  END DO
2109  END DO
2110  ELSE
2111  DO j = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
2112  DO k = 0, n
2113  IF (alt_soundspeed .OR. regularization) THEN
2114  IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == adv_idx%beg) .AND. bubbles) THEN
2115  !liquid part, +k div(u)
2116  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2117  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + 1d0/dy(k) * &
2118  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) + kterm(:,k,:)) * &
2119  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) &
2120  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) )
2121  ELSE IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == alf_idx-1) .AND. bubbles) THEN
2122  !resolved gas, -k div(u)
2123  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2124  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + 1d0/dy(k) * &
2125  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) - kterm(:,k,:)) * &
2126  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) &
2127  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) )
2128  ELSE IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == alf_idx) .AND. bubbles) THEN
2129  !bubble part, no k div(u)
2130  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2131  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + 1d0/dy(k) * &
2132  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) * &
2133  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) &
2134  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) )
2135  ELSE IF (adv_alphan .AND. (j == adv_idx%end)) THEN
2136  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2137  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + 1d0/dy(k) * &
2138  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) - kterm(:,k,:)) * &
2139  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) &
2140  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) )
2141  IF (cyl_coord) THEN
2142  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2143  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) - kterm(:,k,:)/2d0/y_cc(k) * &
2144  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) &
2145  + flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) )
2146  END IF
2147  ELSE
2148  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2149  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + 1d0/dy(k) * &
2150  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) + kterm(:,k,:)) * &
2151  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) &
2152  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) )
2153  IF (cyl_coord) THEN
2154  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2155  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + kterm(:,k,:)/2d0/y_cc(k) * &
2156  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) &
2157  + flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) )
2158  END IF
2159  END IF
2160  ELSE
2161  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2162  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + 1d0/dy(k) * &
2163  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) * &
2164  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) &
2165  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) )
2166  END IF
2167  END DO
2168  END DO
2169  END IF
2170 
2171  IF (bubbles) THEN
2172  CALL s_get_divergence(i,q_prim_vf,divu)
2173  CALL s_compute_bubble_source(i,q_prim_vf,q_cons_vf,divu, &
2174  bub_adv_src, bub_r_src, bub_v_src, bub_p_src, bub_m_src)
2175 
2176  rhs_vf( alf_idx )%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf( alf_idx )%sf(:,:,:) + bub_adv_src(:,:,:)
2177  IF ( num_fluids > 1) rhs_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(:,:,:) - bub_adv_src(:,:,:)
2178 
2179  DO k = 1,nb
2180  rhs_vf(bub_idx%rs(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%rs(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_r_src(k,:,:,:)
2181  rhs_vf(bub_idx%vs(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%vs(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_v_src(k,:,:,:)
2182  IF (polytropic .NEQV. .true.) THEN
2183  rhs_vf(bub_idx%ps(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%ps(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_p_src(k,:,:,:)
2184  rhs_vf(bub_idx%ms(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%ms(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_m_src(k,:,:,:)
2185  END IF
2186  END DO
2187  END IF
2188 
2189  IF (monopole) THEN
2190  mono_mass_src = 0d0; mono_mom_src = 0d0; mono_e_src = 0d0;
2191 
2192  DO j = 1,num_mono
2193  CALL s_get_monopole(i,q_prim_vf,t_step,mono(j))
2194  END DO
2195 
2196  DO k = cont_idx%beg,cont_idx%end
2197  rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) + mono_mass_src(:,:,:)
2198  END DO
2199 
2200  DO k = mom_idx%beg,mom_idx%end
2201  rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) + mono_mom_src(k-cont_idx%end,:,:,:)
2202  END DO
2203  rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) + mono_e_src(:,:,:)
2204  END IF
2205 
2206  ! Applying source terms to the RHS of the internal energy equations
2207  IF(model_eqns == 3) THEN
2208  DO j = 1, num_fluids
2209  DO k = 0, n
2210  rhs_vf(j+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2211  rhs_vf(j+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(:,k,:) - 1d0/dy(k) * &
2212  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) * &
2213  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(e_idx)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) * &
2214  (flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) - &
2215  flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p))
2216  END DO
2217  END DO
2218 
2219  ! Applying the additional geometrical inviscid Riemann
2220  ! source fluxes for the internal energy equations
2221  ! using the average of velocities at cell boundaries
2222  IF(cyl_coord) THEN
2223  DO j = 1, num_fluids
2224  DO k = 0, n
2225  rhs_vf(j+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2226  rhs_vf(j+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(:,k,:) - 5d-1/y_cc(k) * &
2227  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) * &
2228  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(e_idx)%sf(0:m,k,0:p) * &
2229  (flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) + &
2230  flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p))
2231  END DO
2232  END DO
2233  END IF
2234  END IF
2235 
2236  ! Applying the geometrical inviscid Riemann source fluxes calculated as average
2237  ! of values at cell boundaries
2238  IF(cyl_coord) THEN
2239  DO j = 1, sys_size
2240  DO k = 0, n
2241  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2242  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) - 5d-1/y_cc(k) * &
2243  ( flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) &
2244  + flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) )
2245  END DO
2246  END DO
2247  END IF
2248 
2249  ! Applying the viscous and capillary source fluxes from the Riemann solver
2250  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. (we_size > 0 .AND. we_riemann_flux)) THEN
2251  DO j = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
2252  IF (cyl_coord .AND. ((bc_y%beg == -2) .OR. (bc_y%beg == -13))) THEN
2253  IF (p > 0) THEN
2254  CALL s_compute_viscous_stress_tensor(q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
2255  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg:mom_idx%end), &
2256  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg:mom_idx%end), &
2257  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg:mom_idx%end) )
2258  ELSE
2259  CALL s_compute_viscous_stress_tensor(q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
2260  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg:mom_idx%end), &
2261  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg:mom_idx%end), &
2262  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg:mom_idx%end) )
2263  END IF
2264  DO k = 1, n
2265  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2266  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + 1d0/dy(k) * &
2267  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) &
2268  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) )
2269  END DO
2270  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,0,:) = &
2271  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,0,:) + 1d0/(y_cc(1) - y_cc(-1)) * &
2272  ( tau_re_vf(j)%sf(0:m,-1,0:p) &
2273  - tau_re_vf(j)%sf(0:m, 1,0:p) )
2274  ELSE
2275  DO k = 0, n
2276  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2277  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) + 1d0/dy(k) * &
2278  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) &
2279  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) )
2280  END DO
2281  END IF
2282  END DO
2283  ! Applying the geometrical viscous Riemann source fluxes calculated as average
2284  ! of values at cell boundaries
2285  IF (cyl_coord) THEN
2286  DO j = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
2287  IF ((bc_y%beg == -2) .OR. (bc_y%beg == -13)) THEN
2288  DO k = 1, n
2289  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2290  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) - 5d-1/y_cc(k) * &
2291  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) &
2292  + flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) )
2293  END DO
2294  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,0,:) = &
2295  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,0,:) - 1d0/y_cc(0) * &
2296  tau_re_vf(j)%sf(0:m,0,0:p)
2297  ELSE
2298  DO k = 0, n
2299  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2300  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) - 5d-1/y_cc(k) * &
2301  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) &
2302  + flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m, k ,0:p) )
2303  END DO
2304  END IF
2305  END DO
2306  END IF
2307  END IF
2308 
2309  ! Applying the capillary stress tensor calculated outside the Riemann solver
2310  IF (we_size > 0 .AND. we_rhs_flux) THEN
2311  IF (p > 0) THEN
2312  CALL s_compute_capillary_stress_tensor(i, q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
2313  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2314  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2315  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2316  gm_alpha_qp(0,0,0)%vf)
2317  ELSE
2318  CALL s_compute_capillary_stress_tensor(i, q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
2319  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2320  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2321  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2322  gm_alpha_qp(0,0,0)%vf)
2323  END IF
2324  ! Divergence of capillary stress tensor computed using finite differences
2325  DO j = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
2326  DO k = 0, n
2327  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2328  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) - 1d0/(y_cc(k+1) - y_cc(k-1)) * &
2329  ( tau_we_vf(j)%sf(0:m,k+1,0:p) &
2330  - tau_we_vf(j)%sf(0:m,k-1,0:p) )
2331  END DO
2332  END DO
2333  ! Applying the capillary contribution to geometric source term
2334  IF (cyl_coord) THEN
2335  DO j = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
2336  DO k = 0, n
2337  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) = &
2338  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,k,:) - tau_we_vf(j)%sf(0:m,k,0:p)/y_cc(k)
2339  END DO
2340  END DO
2341  END IF
2342  END IF
2343 
2344  ! Applying capillary source terms in momentum and energy equations
2345  IF (we_size > 0 .AND. we_src) THEN
2346  CALL s_compute_capillary_source(i,q_prim_vf)
2347  rhs_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(:,:,:) + we_mtm_src(:,:,:)
2348  rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) + we_nrg_src(:,:,:)
2349  END IF
2350 
2351  ! Applying interface sharpening regularization source terms
2352  IF (regularization .AND. num_dims == 2) THEN
2353  CALL s_compute_regularization_source(i,q_prim_vf)
2354  DO j = cont_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
2355  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,:) + reg_src_vf(j)%sf(:,:,:)
2356  END DO
2357  END IF
2358 
2359 
2360  ! ===============================================================
2361 
2362  ! RHS Contribution in z-direction ===============================
2363  ELSE
2364  ! Compute upwind slope and flux limiter function value if TVD
2365  ! flux limiter is chosen
2366  IF (tvd_rhs_flux) CALL s_get_tvd_flux(q_cons_vf, q_prim_vf, rhs_vf,i)
2367 
2368  ! Applying characteristic boundary conditions
2369  IF(bc_z%beg <= -5) THEN
2370  CALL s_cbc( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, &
2371  flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, i, -1, ix,iy,iz )
2372  END IF
2373 
2374  IF(bc_z%end <= -5) THEN
2375  CALL s_cbc( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, &
2376  flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf, i, 1, ix,iy,iz )
2377  END IF
2378 
2379  ! Applying the Riemann fluxes
2380  DO j = 1, sys_size
2381  IF (grid_geometry == 3) THEN
2382  DO l = 0, n
2383  DO k = 0, p
2384  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) = &
2385  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) + 1d0/dz(k)/y_cc(l) * &
2386  ( flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k-1) &
2387  - flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l, k ) )
2388  END DO
2389  END DO
2390  ELSE
2391  DO k = 0, p
2392  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2393  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) + 1d0/dz(k) * &
2394  ( flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) &
2395  - flux_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) )
2396  END DO
2397  END IF
2398  END DO
2399 
2400  ! Applying source terms to the RHS of the advection equations
2401  IF(riemann_solver == 1) THEN
2402  DO j = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
2403  IF (grid_geometry == 3) THEN
2404  DO l = 0, n
2405  DO k = 0, p
2406  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) = &
2407  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) + 1d0/dz(k)/y_cc(l) * &
2408  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(0:m,l,k) * &
2409  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k-1) &
2410  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l, k ) )
2411  END DO
2412  END DO
2413  ELSE
2414  DO k = 0, p
2415  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2416  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) + 1d0/dz(k) * &
2417  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(0:m,0:n,k) * &
2418  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) &
2419  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) )
2420  END DO
2421  END IF
2422  END DO
2423  ELSE
2424  DO j = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
2425  IF (grid_geometry == 3) THEN
2426  DO l = 0, n
2427  DO k = 0, p
2428  IF (alt_soundspeed .OR. regularization) THEN
2429  IF (adv_alphan .AND. j == adv_idx%end) THEN
2430  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) = &
2431  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) + 1d0/dz(k)/y_cc(l) * &
2432  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k) - kterm(:,l,k)) * &
2433  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l, k ) &
2434  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k-1) )
2435  ELSE
2436  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) = &
2437  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) + 1d0/dz(k)/y_cc(l) * &
2438  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k) + kterm(:,l,k)) * &
2439  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l, k ) &
2440  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k-1) )
2441  END IF
2442  ELSE
2443  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) = &
2444  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) + 1d0/dz(k)/y_cc(l) * &
2445  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k) * &
2446  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l, k ) &
2447  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k-1) )
2448  END IF
2449  END DO
2450  END DO
2451  ELSE
2452  DO k = 0, p
2453  IF (alt_soundspeed .OR. regularization) THEN
2454  IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == adv_idx%beg) .AND. bubbles) THEN
2455  !liquid part, +k div(u)
2456  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2457  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) + 1d0/dz(k) * &
2458  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k) + kterm(:,:,k)) * &
2459  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) &
2460  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) )
2461 
2462  ELSE IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == alf_idx-1) .AND. bubbles) THEN
2463  !resolved gas, -k div(u)
2464  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2465  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) + 1d0/dz(k) * &
2466  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k) - kterm(:,:,k)) * &
2467  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) &
2468  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) )
2469  ELSE IF ( adv_alphan .AND. (j == alf_idx) .AND. bubbles) THEN
2470  !bubble part, no k div(u)
2471  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2472  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) + 1d0/dz(k) * &
2473  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k) * &
2474  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) &
2475  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) )
2476  ELSE IF (adv_alphan .AND. j == adv_idx%end) THEN
2477  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2478  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) + 1d0/dz(k) * &
2479  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k) - kterm(:,:,k)) * &
2480  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) &
2481  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) )
2482  ELSE
2483  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2484  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) + 1d0/dz(k) * &
2485  (q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k) + kterm(:,:,k)) * &
2486  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) &
2487  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) )
2488  END IF
2489  ELSE
2490  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2491  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) + 1d0/dz(k) * &
2492  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k) * &
2493  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) &
2494  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) )
2495  END IF
2496  END DO
2497  END IF
2498  END DO
2499  END IF
2500 
2501  IF (bubbles) THEN
2502  CALL s_get_divergence(i,q_prim_vf,divu)
2503  CALL s_compute_bubble_source(i,q_prim_vf,q_cons_vf,divu, &
2504  bub_adv_src, bub_r_src, bub_v_src, bub_p_src, bub_m_src)
2505 
2506  rhs_vf( alf_idx )%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf( alf_idx )%sf(:,:,:) + bub_adv_src(:,:,:)
2507  IF ( num_fluids > 1) rhs_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(:,:,:) - bub_adv_src(:,:,:)
2508 
2509  DO k = 1,nb
2510  rhs_vf(bub_idx%rs(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%rs(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_r_src(k,:,:,:)
2511  rhs_vf(bub_idx%vs(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%vs(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_v_src(k,:,:,:)
2512  IF (polytropic .NEQV. .true.) THEN
2513  rhs_vf(bub_idx%ps(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%ps(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_p_src(k,:,:,:)
2514  rhs_vf(bub_idx%ms(k))%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(bub_idx%ms(k))%sf(:,:,:) + bub_m_src(k,:,:,:)
2515  END IF
2516  END DO
2517  END IF
2518 
2519  IF (monopole) THEN
2520  mono_mass_src = 0d0; mono_mom_src = 0d0; mono_e_src = 0d0;
2521  DO j = 1,num_mono
2522  CALL s_get_monopole(i,q_prim_vf,t_step,mono(j))
2523  END DO
2524  DO k = cont_idx%beg,cont_idx%end
2525  rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) + mono_mass_src(:,:,:)
2526  END DO
2527  DO k = mom_idx%beg,mom_idx%end
2528  rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(k)%sf(:,:,:) + mono_mom_src(k-cont_idx%end,:,:,:)
2529  END DO
2530  rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) + mono_e_src(:,:,:)
2531  END IF
2532 
2533  ! Applying source terms to the RHS of the internal energy equations
2534  IF(model_eqns == 3) THEN
2535  DO j = 1, num_fluids
2536  DO k = 0, p
2537  rhs_vf(j+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2538  rhs_vf(j+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(:,:,k) - 1d0/dz(k) * &
2539  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(j+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(0:m,0:n,k) * &
2540  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(e_idx)%sf(0:m,0:n,k) * &
2541  (flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) - &
2542  flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1))
2543  END DO
2544  END DO
2545  END IF
2546 
2547  ! Applying the geometrical inviscid Riemann source fluxes calculated as average
2548  ! of values at cell boundaries
2549  IF(grid_geometry == 3) THEN
2550  DO j = 1, sys_size
2551  DO l = 0, n
2552  DO k = 0, p
2553  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) = &
2554  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) - 5d-1/y_cc(l) * &
2555  ( flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k-1) &
2556  + flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,l, k ) )
2557  END DO
2558  END DO
2559  END DO
2560  END IF
2561 
2562  ! Applying the viscous and capillary source fluxes from the Riemann solver
2563  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. (we_size > 0 .AND. we_riemann_flux)) THEN
2564  DO j = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
2565  DO k = 0, p
2566  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2567  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) + 1d0/dz(k) * &
2568  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) &
2569  - flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) )
2570  END DO
2571  END DO
2572  ! Modifying momentum components of geometric source term
2573  IF (grid_geometry == 3) THEN
2574  DO k = 0, p
2575  rhs_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2576  rhs_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,:,k) + 5d-1 * &
2577  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) &
2578  + flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) )
2579 
2580  rhs_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2581  rhs_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,:,k) - 5d-1 * &
2582  ( flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) &
2583  + flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(0:m,0:n, k ) )
2584  END DO
2585  END IF
2586  END IF
2587 
2588  ! Applying the capillary stress tensor calculated outside the Riemann solver
2589  IF (we_size > 0 .AND. we_rhs_flux) THEN
2590  IF (p > 0) THEN
2591  CALL s_compute_capillary_stress_tensor(i, q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
2592  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2593  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2594  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2595  gm_alpha_qp(0,0,0)%vf)
2596  ELSE
2597  CALL s_compute_capillary_stress_tensor(i, q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf, &
2598  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2599  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2600  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg:adv_idx%end), &
2601  gm_alpha_qp(0,0,0)%vf)
2602  END IF
2603  ! Divergence of capillary stress tensor computed using finite differences
2604  DO j = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
2605  IF (grid_geometry == 3) THEN
2606  DO l = 0, n
2607  DO k = 0, p
2608  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) = &
2609  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,l,k) - 1d0/(z_cc(k+1) - z_cc(k-1))/y_cc(l) * &
