2610  ( tau_we_vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k+1) &
2611  - tau_we_vf(j)%sf(0:m,l,k-1) )
2612  END DO
2613  END DO
2614  ELSE
2615  DO k = 0, p
2616  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) = &
2617  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,k) - 1d0/(z_cc(k+1) - z_cc(k-1)) * &
2618  ( tau_we_vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k+1) &
2619  - tau_we_vf(j)%sf(0:m,0:n,k-1) )
2620  END DO
2621  END IF
2622  END DO
2623  END IF
2624 
2625  ! Applying capillary source terms in momentum and energy equations
2626  IF (we_size > 0 .AND. we_src) THEN
2627  CALL s_compute_capillary_source(i,q_prim_vf)
2628  rhs_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(:,:,:) + we_mtm_src(:,:,:)
2629  rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) + we_nrg_src(:,:,:)
2630  END IF
2631 
2632  ! Applying interface sharpening regularization source terms
2633  IF (regularization .AND. num_dims == 3) THEN
2634  CALL s_compute_regularization_source(i,q_prim_vf)
2635  DO j = cont_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
2636  rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,:) = rhs_vf(j)%sf(:,:,:) + reg_src_vf(j)%sf(:,:,:)
2637  END DO
2638  END IF
2639 
2640  END IF
2641  ! ===============================================================
2642 
2643  END DO
2644  ! END: Dimensional Splitting Loop ==================================
2645 
2646 
2647  ! Disassociation of Working Variables ==============================
2648  DO i = 1, sys_size
2649  NULLIFY(q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf, q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf)
2650  END DO
2651  ! ==================================================================
2652 
2653 
2654  END SUBROUTINE s_compute_rhs ! -----------------------------------------
2655 
2656 
2657 
2664  SUBROUTINE s_compute_flux_lim(top,bottom,flux_lim_func) ! ---------------
2665 
2666 
2667  REAL(KIND(0d0)), INTENT(INOUT) :: top, bottom
2668  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: slope
2669  REAL(KIND(0d0)), INTENT(OUT) :: flux_lim_func
2670 
2671  ! Limit the flux limiter to be applied only where the change in
2672  ! volume fraction is greater than machine precision so that insignificant
2673  ! fluctuations do not trip the limiter
2674  IF (abs(top) < 1d-8) top = 0d0
2675  IF (abs(bottom) < 1d-8) bottom = 0d0
2676  ! If top = bottom, then cell is in a smooth region of the flow
2677  ! and the high order flux should be used. Also ensures that areas
2678  ! of no change in volume fraction (0/0) use the high order flux
2679  IF (top == bottom) THEN
2680  slope = 1d0
2681  ELSE
2682  slope = (top*bottom)/max(bottom**2d0,sgm_eps)
2683  END IF
2684 
2685  ! Flux limiter function
2686  IF (flux_lim == 1) THEN ! MINMOD (MM)
2687  flux_lim_func = max(0d0,min(1d0,slope))
2688  ELSEIF (flux_lim == 2) THEN ! MUSCL (MC)
2689  flux_lim_func = max(0d0,min(2d0*slope,5d-1*(1d0+slope),2d0))
2690  ELSEIF (flux_lim == 3) THEN ! OSPRE (OP)
2691  flux_lim_func = (15d-1*(slope**2d0+slope))/(slope**2d0+slope+1d0)
2692  ELSEIF (flux_lim == 4) THEN ! SUPERBEE (SB)
2693  flux_lim_func = max(0d0,min(1d0,2d0*slope),min(slope,2d0))
2694  ELSEIF (flux_lim == 5) THEN ! SWEBY (SW) (beta = 1.5)
2695  flux_lim_func = max(0d0,min(15d-1*slope,1d0),min(slope,15d-1))
2696  ELSEIF (flux_lim == 6) THEN ! VAN ALBADA (VA)
2697  flux_lim_func = (slope**2d0+slope)/(slope**2d0+1d0)
2698  ELSEIF (flux_lim == 7) THEN ! VAN LEER (VL)
2699  flux_lim_func = (abs(slope) + slope)/(1d0 + abs(slope))
2700  END IF
2701  END SUBROUTINE s_compute_flux_lim ! ------------------------------------
2702 
2703 
2704 
2714  SUBROUTINE s_compute_viscous_stress_tensor(q_prim_vf,grad_x_vf,grad_y_vf,grad_z_vf) ! ---
2715 
2716  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(IN) :: q_prim_vf
2717  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(num_dims), INTENT(IN) :: grad_x_vf, grad_y_vf, grad_z_vf
2718 
2719 
2720  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: rho_visc, gamma_visc, pi_inf_visc
2721  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(2) :: Re_visc
2722  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(1:num_fluids,1:num_fluids) :: We_visc
2723 
2724 
2725  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(num_dims,num_dims) :: tau_Re
2726 
2727  TYPE(bounds_info) :: ix,iy,iz
2728 
2729 
2730  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l
2731 
2732  ix%beg = -buff_size; iy%beg = 0; iz%beg = 0
2733  IF(n > 0) iy%beg = -buff_size; IF(p > 0) iz%beg = -buff_size
2734  ix%end = m - ix%beg; iy%end = n - iy%beg; iz%end = p - iz%beg
2735 
2736  DO i = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
2737  tau_re_vf(i)%sf = 0d0
2738  END DO
2739 
2740  IF (re_size(1) > 0) THEN ! Shear stresses
2741  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
2742  DO k = -1, 1
2743  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
2744 
2745  CALL s_convert_to_mixture_variables( q_prim_vf, rho_visc, &
2746  gamma_visc, pi_inf_visc, &
2747  re_visc, we_visc, j,k,l )
2748 
2749  tau_re(2,1) = (grad_y_vf(1)%sf(j,k,l) + &
2750  grad_x_vf(2)%sf(j,k,l))/ &
2751  re_visc(1)
2752 
2753  tau_re(2,2) = ( 4d0*grad_y_vf(2)%sf(j,k,l) &
2754  - 2d0*grad_x_vf(1)%sf(j,k,l) &
2755  - 2d0*q_prim_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(j,k,l)/y_cc(k) ) / &
2756  ( 3d0*re_visc(1) )
2757 
2758  DO i = 1,2
2759  tau_re_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2760  tau_re_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2761  tau_re(2,i)
2762 
2763  tau_re_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2764  tau_re_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2765  q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(j,k,l) * tau_re(2,i)
2766  END DO
2767 
2768  END DO
2769  END DO
2770  END DO
2771  END IF
2772 
2773  IF (re_size(2) > 0) THEN ! Bulk stresses
2774  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
2775  DO k = -1, 1
2776  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
2777 
2778  CALL s_convert_to_mixture_variables( q_prim_vf, rho_visc, &
2779  gamma_visc, pi_inf_visc, &
2780  re_visc, we_visc, j,k,l )
2781 
2782  tau_re(2,2) = (grad_x_vf(1)%sf(j,k,l) + &
2783  grad_y_vf(2)%sf(j,k,l) + &
2784  q_prim_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(j,k,l)/y_cc(k) ) / &
2785  re_visc(2)
2786 
2787  tau_re_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2788  tau_re_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2789  tau_re(2,2)
2790 
2791  tau_re_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2792  tau_re_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2793  q_prim_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(j,k,l) * tau_re(2,2)
2794 
2795  END DO
2796  END DO
2797  END DO
2798  END IF
2799 
2800  IF (p == 0) RETURN
2801 
2802  IF (re_size(1) > 0) THEN ! Shear stresses
2803  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
2804  DO k = -1, 1
2805  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
2806 
2807  CALL s_convert_to_mixture_variables( q_prim_vf, rho_visc, &
2808  gamma_visc, pi_inf_visc, &
2809  re_visc, we_visc, j,k,l )
2810 
2811  tau_re(2,2) = -(2d0/3d0)*grad_z_vf(3)%sf(j,k,l) / y_cc(k) / &
2812  re_visc(1)
2813 
2814  tau_re(2,3) = ((grad_z_vf(2)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2815  q_prim_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(j,k,l)) / &
2816  y_cc(k) + grad_y_vf(3)%sf(j,k,l) ) / &
2817  re_visc(1)
2818 
2819  DO i = 2,3
2820  tau_re_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2821  tau_re_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2822  tau_re(2,i)
2823 
2824  tau_re_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2825  tau_re_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2826  q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(j,k,l) * tau_re(2,i)
2827  END DO
2828 
2829  END DO
2830  END DO
2831  END DO
2832  END IF
2833 
2834  IF (re_size(2) > 0) THEN ! Bulk stresses
2835  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
2836  DO k = -1, 1
2837  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
2838 
2839  tau_re(2,2) = grad_z_vf(3)%sf(j,k,l) / y_cc(k) / &
2840  re_visc(2)
2841 
2842  tau_re_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2843  tau_re_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2844  tau_re(2,2)
2845 
2846  tau_re_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2847  tau_re_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2848  q_prim_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(j,k,l) * tau_re(2,2)
2849 
2850  END DO
2851  END DO
2852  END DO
2853  END IF
2854 
2855  END SUBROUTINE s_compute_viscous_stress_tensor ! ----------------------------------------
2856 
2857 
2858 
2859 
2869  SUBROUTINE s_compute_capillary_stress_tensor(norm_dir,q_prim_vf,grad_x_vf,grad_y_vf,grad_z_vf,norm_vf) ! -------
2870 
2871  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: norm_dir
2872  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(IN) :: q_prim_vf
2873  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(num_fluids), INTENT(IN) :: norm_vf, grad_x_vf, grad_y_vf, grad_z_vf
2874 
2875 
2876  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: rho_cap, gamma_cap, pi_inf_cap
2877  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(2) :: Re_cap
2878  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(1:num_fluids,1:num_fluids) :: We_cap
2879 
2880 
2881  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(num_dims,num_dims) :: tau_We
2882 
2883  TYPE(bounds_info) :: ix,iy,iz
2884 
2885 
2886  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l,r
2887 
2888  ix%beg = -buff_size; iy%beg = 0; iz%beg = 0
2889  IF(n > 0) iy%beg = -buff_size; IF(p > 0) iz%beg = -buff_size
2890  ix%end = m - ix%beg; iy%end = n - iy%beg; iz%end = p - iz%beg
2891 
2892  DO i = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
2893  tau_we_vf(i)%sf = 0d0
2894  END DO
2895 
2896  ! Capillary stresses in x-direction =============================
2897  IF (norm_dir == 1) THEN
2898  DO i = 1, we_size
2899  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
2900  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
2901  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
2902 
2903  CALL s_convert_to_mixture_variables( q_prim_vf, rho_cap, &
2904  gamma_cap, pi_inf_cap, &
2905  re_cap, we_cap, j,k,l )
2906 
2907  tau_we(1,1) = 1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
2908  ( norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) - &
2909  grad_x_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
2910  grad_x_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
2911  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps))
2912 
2913  tau_we(1,2) = -1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
2914  grad_x_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
2915  grad_y_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
2916  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps)
2917 
2918  DO r = 1,2
2919  tau_we_vf(cont_idx%end+r)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2920  tau_we_vf(cont_idx%end+r)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2921  tau_we(1,r)
2922  END DO
2923 
2924  tau_we(1,1) = -1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
2925  grad_x_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
2926  grad_x_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
2927  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps)
2928 
2929  DO r = 1,2
2930  tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2931  tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2932  q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+r)%sf(j,k,l) * tau_we(1,r)
2933  END DO
2934 
2935  END DO
2936  END DO
2937  END DO
2938  END DO
2939 
2940  IF (p > 0) THEN
2941  DO i = 1, we_size
2942  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
2943  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
2944  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
2945 
2946  CALL s_convert_to_mixture_variables( q_prim_vf, rho_cap, &
2947  gamma_cap, pi_inf_cap, &
2948  re_cap, we_cap, j,k,l )
2949 
2950  tau_we(1,3) = -1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
2951  grad_x_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
2952  grad_z_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
2953  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps)
2954 
2955  tau_we_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2956  tau_we_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2957  tau_we(1,3)
2958 
2959  tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2960  tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2961  q_prim_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(j,k,l) * tau_we(1,3)
2962 
2963  END DO
2964  END DO
2965  END DO
2966  END DO
2967  END IF
2968 
2969  ! End capillary stresses in x-direction =============================
2970 
2971  ! Capillary stresses in y-direction =============================
2972  ELSEIF (norm_dir == 2) THEN
2973  DO i = 1, we_size
2974  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
2975  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
2976  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
2977 
2978  CALL s_convert_to_mixture_variables( q_prim_vf, rho_cap, &
2979  gamma_cap, pi_inf_cap, &
2980  re_cap, we_cap, j,k,l )
2981 
2982  tau_we(2,1) = -1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
2983  grad_y_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
2984  grad_x_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
2985  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps)
2986 
2987  tau_we(2,2) = 1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
2988  ( norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) - &
2989  grad_y_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
2990  grad_y_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
2991  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps))
2992 
2993  DO r = 1,2
2994  tau_we_vf(cont_idx%end+r)%sf(j,k,l) = &
2995  tau_we_vf(cont_idx%end+r)%sf(j,k,l) - &
2996  tau_we(2,r)
2997  END DO
2998 
2999  tau_we(2,2) = -1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
3000  grad_y_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
3001  grad_y_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
3002  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps)
3003 
3004  DO r = 1,2
3005  tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) = &
3006  tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) - &
3007  q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+r)%sf(j,k,l) * tau_we(2,r)
3008  END DO
3009 
3010  END DO
3011  END DO
3012  END DO
3013  END DO
3014 
3015  IF (p > 0) THEN
3016  DO i = 1, we_size
3017  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
3018  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
3019  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
3020 
3021  CALL s_convert_to_mixture_variables( q_prim_vf, rho_cap, &
3022  gamma_cap, pi_inf_cap, &
3023  re_cap, we_cap, j,k,l )
3024 
3025  tau_we(2,3) = -1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
3026  grad_y_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
3027  grad_z_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
3028  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps)
3029 
3030  tau_we_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(j,k,l) = &
3031  tau_we_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(j,k,l) - &
3032  tau_we(2,3)
3033 
3034  tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) = &
3035  tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) - &
3036  q_prim_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(j,k,l) * tau_we(2,3)
3037 
3038  END DO
3039  END DO
3040  END DO
3041  END DO
3042  END IF
3043 
3044  ! End capillary stresses in y-direction =============================
3045 
3046  ! Capillary stresses in z-direction =============================
3047  ELSE
3048  DO i = 1, we_size
3049  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
3050  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
3051  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
3052 
3053  tau_we(3,1) = -1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
3054  grad_z_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
3055  grad_x_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
3056  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps)
3057 
3058  tau_we(3,2) = -1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
3059  grad_z_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
3060  grad_y_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
3061  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps)
3062 
3063  tau_we(3,3) = 1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
3064  ( norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) - &
3065  grad_z_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
3066  grad_z_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
3067  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps))
3068 
3069  DO r = 1,3
3070  tau_we_vf(cont_idx%end+r)%sf(j,k,l) = &
3071  tau_we_vf(cont_idx%end+r)%sf(j,k,l) - &
3072  tau_we(3,r)
3073  END DO
3074 
3075  tau_we(3,3) = -1d0/ we_cap(we_idx(i,1),we_idx(i,2)) * &
3076  grad_z_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) * &
3077  grad_z_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l) / &
3078  max(norm_vf(we_idx(i,2))%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps)
3079 
3080  DO r = 1,3
3081  tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) = &
3082  tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) - &
3083  q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+r)%sf(j,k,l) * tau_we(3,r)
3084  END DO
3085 
3086  END DO
3087  END DO
3088  END DO
3089  END DO
3090 
3091  END IF
3092  ! End capillary stresses in z-direction =============================
3093 
3094  END SUBROUTINE s_compute_capillary_stress_tensor ! ---------------------------------
3095 
3096 
3097 
3098 
3103  SUBROUTINE s_compute_capillary_source(i,q_prim_vf) ! ------------------------------
3104 
3105  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: i
3106  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(IN) :: q_prim_vf
3107 
3108 
3109  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: rho_cap, gamma_cap, pi_inf_cap
3110  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(2) :: Re_cap
3111  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(1:num_fluids,1:num_fluids) :: We_cap
3112  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(1:num_fluids) :: kappa_cap
3113 
3114  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: F_sv
3115 
3116 
3117  INTEGER :: j,k,l,r
3118 
3119  DO j = 0, m
3120  DO k = 0, n
3121  DO l = 0, p
3122  DO r = 1, crv_size
3123  IF (alt_crv .NEQV. .true.) THEN
3124  kappa_cap(crv_idx(r)) = kappa_vf(crv_idx(r))%sf(j,k,l)
3125  ELSE
3126  kappa_cap(crv_idx(r)) = alt_kappa_vf(crv_idx(r))%sf(j,k,l)
3127  END IF
3128  END DO
3129  CALL s_convert_to_mixture_variables( q_prim_vf, rho_cap, &
3130  gamma_cap, pi_inf_cap, &
3131  re_cap, we_cap, j,k,l )
3132  we_mtm_src(j,k,l) = 0d0
3133  we_nrg_src(j,k,l) = 0d0
3134 
3135  DO r = 1, we_size
3136  IF (i == 1) THEN
3137  f_sv = -1d0/we_cap(we_idx(r,1),we_idx(r,2)) * &
3138  kappa_cap(we_idx(r,2)) * &
3139  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l)
3140  ELSEIF (i == 2) THEN
3141  f_sv = -1d0/we_cap(we_idx(r,1),we_idx(r,2)) * &
3142  kappa_cap(we_idx(r,2)) * &
3143  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l)
3144  ELSEIF (i == 3) THEN
3145  f_sv = -1d0/we_cap(we_idx(r,1),we_idx(r,2)) * &
3146  kappa_cap(we_idx(r,2)) * &
3147  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l)
3148  END IF
3149 
3150  we_mtm_src(j,k,l) = we_mtm_src(j,k,l) + f_sv
3151  we_nrg_src(j,k,l) = we_nrg_src(j,k,l) + f_sv * &
3152  q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf(j,k,l)
3153  END DO
3154  END DO
3155  END DO
3156  END DO
3157  END SUBROUTINE s_compute_capillary_source ! ----------------------------------
3158 
3159 
3164  SUBROUTINE s_get_divergence(idir,q_prim_vf,mydivu)
3165 
3166  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(IN) :: q_prim_vf
3167  TYPE(scalar_field), INTENT(inout) :: mydivu
3168  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: idir
3169  INTEGER :: j,k,l
3170 
3171  !contribute to divergence computation \div(u)
3172  IF (idir == 1) mydivu%sf(:,:,:) = 0d0
3173 
3174  DO j = 0,m
3175  DO k = 0,n
3176  DO l = 0,p
3177  IF (idir == 1) THEN
3178  mydivu%sf(j,k,l) = 0.5d0/dx(j)*(q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+idir)%sf(j+1,k,l) - &
3179  q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+idir)%sf(j-1, k , l ))
3180  ELSE IF (idir == 2) THEN
3181  mydivu%sf(j,k,l) = mydivu%sf(j,k,l) + 0.5d0/dy(k)*(q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+idir)%sf(j,k+1,l) - &
3182  q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+idir)%sf( j ,k-1, l ))
3183  ELSE IF (idir == 3) THEN
3184  mydivu%sf(j,k,l) = mydivu%sf(j,k,l) + 0.5d0/dz(l)*(q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+idir)%sf(j,k,l+1) - &
3185  q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+idir)%sf( j , k ,l-1))
3186  END IF
3187  END DO
3188  END DO
3189  END DO
3190 
3191  END SUBROUTINE s_get_divergence
3192 
3199  SUBROUTINE s_get_monopole(idir, q_prim_vf,t_step,mymono) ! ------------------------------
3200 
3201 
3202  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(IN) :: q_prim_vf
3203  TYPE(mono_parameters), INTENT(IN) :: mymono
3204  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: idir, t_step
3205 
3206  INTEGER :: ndirs,j,k,l
3207 
3208  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: mytime, sound, n_tait, B_tait
3209  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: s2, myRho, const_sos
3210 
3211  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(2) :: Re
3212  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION( num_fluids, & num_fluids ) :: We
3213 
3214  ndirs = 1; IF (n > 0) ndirs = 2; IF (p > 0) ndirs = 3
3215 
3216 
3217 
3218  IF (idir == ndirs) THEN
3219  mytime = t_step*dt
3220 
3221  DO j = 0,m; DO k = 0,n; DO l=0,p
3222  CALL s_convert_to_mixture_variables( q_prim_vf, myrho, n_tait, b_tait, re, we, j, k, l )
3223  n_tait = 1.d0/n_tait + 1.d0 !make this the usual little 'gamma'
3224 
3225  sound = n_tait*(q_prim_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) + ((n_tait-1d0)/n_tait)*b_tait)/myrho
3226  sound = dsqrt(sound)
3227 
3228  const_sos = dsqrt( n_tait )
3229 
3230  s2 = f_g(mytime,sound,const_sos,mymono) * f_delta(j,k,l,mymono%loc,mymono%length,mymono)
3231 
3232  mono_mass_src(j,k,l) = mono_mass_src(j,k,l) + s2/sound
3233  IF (n ==0) THEN
3234 
3235  ! 1D
3236  IF (mymono%dir < -0.1d0) THEN
3237  !left-going wave
3238  mono_mom_src(1,j,k,l) = mono_mom_src(1,j,k,l) - s2
3239  ELSE
3240  !right-going wave
3241  mono_mom_src(1,j,k,l) = mono_mom_src(1,j,k,l) + s2
3242  END IF
3243  ELSE IF (p==0) THEN
3244  ! IF ( (j==1) .AND. (k==1) .AND. proc_rank == 0) &
3245  ! PRINT*, '====== Monopole magnitude: ', f_g(mytime,sound,const_sos,mymono)
3246 
3247  IF (mymono%dir .NE. dflt_real) THEN
3248  ! 2d
3249  !mono_mom_src(1,j,k,l) = s2
3250  !mono_mom_src(2,j,k,l) = s2
3251  mono_mom_src(1,j,k,l) = mono_mom_src(1,j,k,l) + s2*cos( mymono%dir )
3252  mono_mom_src(2,j,k,l) = mono_mom_src(2,j,k,l) + s2*sin( mymono%dir )
3253  END IF
3254  ELSE
3255  ! 3D
3256  IF (mymono%dir .NE. dflt_real) THEN
3257  mono_mom_src(1,j,k,l) = mono_mom_src(1,j,k,l) + s2*cos( mymono%dir )
3258  mono_mom_src(2,j,k,l) = mono_mom_src(2,j,k,l) + s2*sin( mymono%dir )
3259  END IF
3260  END IF
3261 
3262  IF (model_eqns .NE. 4) THEN
3263  mono_e_src(j,k,l) = mono_e_src(j,k,l) + s2*sound/(n_tait - 1.d0)
3264  END IF
3265  END DO; END DO; END do
3266  END IF
3267 
3268  END SUBROUTINE s_get_monopole
3269 
3270 
3276  FUNCTION f_g(mytime,sos,mysos,mymono)
3277 
3278  REAL(KIND(0d0)), INTENT(IN) :: mytime, sos, mysos
3279  TYPE(mono_parameters), INTENT(IN) :: mymono
3280  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: period, t0, sigt, pa
3281  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: f_g
3282 
3283  IF (mymono%pulse == 1) THEN
3284  ! Sine wave
3285  period = mymono%length/sos
3286  IF (mytime .le. mymono%npulse*period) THEN
3287  f_g = mymono%mag*sin(mytime*2.d0*pi/period)
3288  ELSE
3289  f_g = 0d0
3290  END IF
3291  ELSE IF (mymono%pulse == 2) THEN
3292  ! Gaussian pulse
3293  sigt = mymono%length/sos/7.d0
3294  t0 = 3.5d0*sigt
3295  f_g = mymono%mag/(dsqrt(2.d0*pi) * sigt) * &
3296  dexp( -0.5d0 * ((mytime-t0)**2.d0)/(sigt**2.d0) )
3297  ELSE IF (mymono%pulse == 3) THEN
3298  ! Square wave
3299  sigt = mymono%length/sos
3300  t0 = 0d0
3301  IF (mytime > t0 .AND. mytime < sigt) THEN
3302  f_g = mymono%mag
3303  ELSE
3304  f_g = 0d0
3305  END IF
3306  ELSE
3307  print '(A)', 'No pulse type detected. Exiting ...'
3308  CALL s_mpi_abort()
3309  END IF
3310 
3311  END FUNCTION f_g
3312 
3320  FUNCTION f_delta(j,k,l,mono_loc,mono_leng,mymono)
3321 
3322  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(3), INTENT(IN) :: mono_loc
3323  TYPE(mono_parameters), INTENT(IN) :: mymono
3324  REAL(KIND(0d0)), INTENT(IN) :: mono_leng
3325  INTEGER, INTENT(in) :: j,k,l
3326 
3327  INTEGER :: q
3328  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: h,hx,hy,hz
3329  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: hxnew,hynew
3330  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: sig
3331  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: f_delta
3332 
3333  IF (n==0) THEN
3334  sig = dx(j)
3335  sig = sig*2.5d0
3336  ELSE IF (p==0) THEN
3337  sig = maxval( (/ dx(j), dy(k) /) )
3338  sig = sig*2.5d0
3339  ELSE
3340  sig = maxval( (/ dx(j), dy(k), dz(l) /) )
3341  sig = sig*2.5d0
3342  END IF
3343 
3344  IF (n==0) THEN !1D
3345  IF (mymono%support == 1) THEN
3346  ! 1D delta function
3347  hx = abs(mono_loc(1) - x_cc(j))
3348 
3349  f_delta = 1.d0/(dsqrt(2.d0*pi)*sig/2.d0) * &
3350  dexp( -0.5d0 * (hx/(sig/2.d0))**2.d0 )
3351  ELSE IF (mymono%support == 0) THEN
3352  ! Support for all x
3353  f_delta = 1.d0
3354  END IF
3355  ELSE IF (p==0) THEN !2D
3356  hx = mono_loc(1) - x_cc(j)
3357  hy = mono_loc(2) - y_cc(k)
3358  IF (mymono%support == 1) THEN
3359  ! 2D delta function
3360  sig = mono_leng/20.d0
3361  h = dsqrt(hx**2.d0 + hy**2.d0)
3362 
3363  f_delta = 1.d0/(dsqrt(2.d0*pi)*sig/2.d0) * &
3364  dexp( -0.5d0 * ((h/(sig/2.d0))**2.d0) )
3365  ELSE IF (mymono%support == 2) THEN
3366  !only support for y \pm some value
3367  IF ( abs(hy) < mymono%length ) THEN
3368  f_delta = 1.d0/(dsqrt(2.d0*pi)*sig/2.d0) * &
3369  dexp( -0.5d0 * (hx/(sig/2.d0))**2.d0 )
3370  ELSE
3371  f_delta = 0d0
3372  END IF
3373  ELSE IF (mymono%support == 3) THEN
3374  ! Only support along some line
3375  hx = x_cc(j) - mono_loc(1)
3376  hy = y_cc(k) - mono_loc(2)
3377 
3378  ! Rotate actual point by -theta
3379  hxnew = cos( mymono%dir)*hx + sin( mymono%dir)*hy
3380  hynew = -1.d0*sin(mymono%dir)*hx + cos( mymono%dir)*hy
3381  IF ( abs(hynew) < mymono%loc(3)/2.d0 ) THEN
3382  f_delta = 1.d0/(dsqrt(2.d0*pi)*sig/2.d0) * &
3383  dexp( -0.5d0 * (hxnew/(sig/2.d0))**2.d0 )
3384  ELSE
3385  f_delta = 0d0
3386  END IF
3387  ELSE IF (mymono%support == 4) THEN
3388  ! Support for all y
3389  f_delta = 1.d0/(dsqrt(2.d0*pi)*sig) * &
3390  dexp( -0.5d0 * (hx/sig)**2.d0 )
3391  END IF
3392  ELSE !3D
3393  IF (mymono%support == 3) THEN
3394  ! Only support along some patch
3395 
3396  hx = x_cc(j) - mono_loc(1)
3397  hy = y_cc(k) - mono_loc(2)
3398  hz = z_cc(l) - mono_loc(3)
3399 
3400  ! Rotate actual point by -theta
3401  hxnew = cos( mymono%dir)*hx + sin( mymono%dir)*hy
3402  hynew = -1.d0*sin(mymono%dir)*hx + cos( mymono%dir)*hy
3403 
3404  IF ( abs(hynew) < mymono%length/2. .AND. &
3405  abs(hz) < mymono%length/2. ) THEN
3406  f_delta = 1.d0/(dsqrt(2.d0*pi)*sig/2.d0) * &
3407  dexp( -0.5d0 * (hxnew/(sig/2.d0))**2.d0 )
3408  ELSE
3409  f_delta = 0d0
3410  END IF
3411  ELSE
3412  print '(a)', 'Monopole support not properly defined'
3413  CALL s_mpi_abort()
3414  END IF
3415  END IF
3416 
3417  END FUNCTION f_delta
3418 
3419 
3425  SUBROUTINE s_compute_regularization_source(i,q_prim_vf) ! -----------------
3426 
3427  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: i
3428  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(IN) :: q_prim_vf
3429 
3430  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE :: var
3431  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE :: grad_x, grad_y, grad_z
3432  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE :: alpharho_grad_x, alpharho_grad_y, alpharho_grad_z
3433  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE :: norm
3434  TYPE(scalar_field), ALLOCATABLE :: un_alpha_x, un_alpha_y, un_alpha_z
3435 
3436  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(0:m,0:n,0:p) :: Lheaviside, U0, velmag
3437  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: U0_loc, U0_glb
3438  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(0:m,0:n,0:p) :: Rnohat, R1hat, R2hat
3439  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(num_dims) :: vel
3440 
3441  TYPE(bounds_info) :: ix,iy,iz
3442 
3443  INTEGER :: j,k,l,r
3444 
3445  ix%beg = -buff_size; iy%beg = -buff_size
3446  ix%end = m + buff_size; iy%end = n + buff_size
3447  IF (p > 0) THEN
3448  iz%beg = -buff_size; iz%end = p + buff_size
3449  ELSE
3450  iz%beg = 0; iz%end = 0
3451  END IF
3452  ALLOCATE( var%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3453  ALLOCATE( grad_x%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3454  ALLOCATE( grad_y%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3455  ALLOCATE( grad_z%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3456  ALLOCATE(alpharho_grad_x%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3457  ALLOCATE(alpharho_grad_y%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3458  ALLOCATE(alpharho_grad_z%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3459  ALLOCATE( norm%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3460  ALLOCATE( un_alpha_x%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3461  ALLOCATE( un_alpha_y%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3462  ALLOCATE( un_alpha_z%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3463 
3464  DO j = 0, m
3465  DO k = 0, n
3466  DO l = 0, p
3467  IF ((q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l) > 1d-6) &
3468  .AND. &
3469  (q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l) < (1d0-1d-6))) THEN
3470  lheaviside(j,k,l) = 1d0
3471  ELSE
3472  lheaviside(j,k,l) = 0d0
3473  END IF
3474 
3475  DO r = 1, num_dims
3476  vel(r) = q_prim_vf(cont_idx%end+r)%sf(j,k,l)
3477  END DO
3478 
3479  velmag(j,k,l) = sqrt(dot_product(vel,vel))
3480 
3481  u0(j,k,l) = 4d0*q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l) * &
3482  (1d0-q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l)) * &
3483  velmag(j,k,l)
3484  END DO
3485  END DO
3486  END DO
3487 
3488  u0_loc = maxval(u0)
3489  IF (num_procs > 1) THEN
3490  CALL s_mpi_allreduce_max(u0_loc,u0_glb)
3491  ELSE
3492  u0_glb = u0_loc
3493  END IF
3494 
3495  var%sf(:,:,:) = q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(:,:,:)
3496  CALL s_compute_fd_gradient(var,grad_x,grad_y,grad_z,norm)
3497  un_alpha_x%sf(:,:,:) = grad_x%sf(:,:,:)/max(norm%sf(:,:,:),sgm_eps)
3498  un_alpha_y%sf(:,:,:) = grad_y%sf(:,:,:)/max(norm%sf(:,:,:),sgm_eps)
3499  un_alpha_z%sf(:,:,:) = grad_z%sf(:,:,:)/max(norm%sf(:,:,:),sgm_eps)
3500 
3501  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
3502  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
3503  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
3504  var%sf(j,k,l) = reg_eps*norm%sf(j,k,l) - q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l) * &
3505  (1d0 - q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l))
3506  END DO
3507  END DO
3508  END DO
3509  CALL s_compute_fd_gradient(var,grad_x,grad_y,grad_z,norm)
3510  DO j = 0, m
3511  DO k = 0, n
3512  DO l = 0, p
3513  IF (p > 0) THEN
3514  rnohat(j,k,l) = lheaviside(j,k,l)*u0_glb * &
3515  (un_alpha_x%sf(j,k,l)*grad_x%sf(j,k,l) + &
3516  un_alpha_y%sf(j,k,l)*grad_y%sf(j,k,l) + &
3517  un_alpha_z%sf(j,k,l)*grad_z%sf(j,k,l))
3518  ELSE
3519  rnohat(j,k,l) = lheaviside(j,k,l)*u0_glb * &
3520  (un_alpha_x%sf(j,k,l)*grad_x%sf(j,k,l) + &
3521  un_alpha_y%sf(j,k,l)*grad_y%sf(j,k,l))
3522  END IF
3523  END DO
3524  END DO
3525  END DO
3526 
3527  DO r = cont_idx%beg, cont_idx%end
3528  var%sf(:,:,:) = q_prim_vf(r)%sf(:,:,:)
3529  CALL s_compute_fd_gradient(var,alpharho_grad_x,alpharho_grad_y,alpharho_grad_z,norm)
3530  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
3531  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
3532  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
3533  IF (p > 0) THEN
3534  var%sf(j,k,l) = reg_eps * &
3535  (un_alpha_x%sf(j,k,l)*alpharho_grad_x%sf(j,k,l) + &
3536  un_alpha_y%sf(j,k,l)*alpharho_grad_y%sf(j,k,l) + &
3537  un_alpha_z%sf(j,k,l)*alpharho_grad_z%sf(j,k,l))
3538  ELSE
3539  var%sf(j,k,l) = reg_eps * &
3540  (un_alpha_x%sf(j,k,l)*alpharho_grad_x%sf(j,k,l) + &
3541  un_alpha_y%sf(j,k,l)*alpharho_grad_y%sf(j,k,l))
3542  END IF
3543  END DO
3544  END DO
3545  END DO
3546  CALL s_compute_fd_gradient(var,grad_x,grad_y,grad_z,norm)
3547  DO j = 0, m
3548  DO k = 0, n
3549  DO l = 0, p
3550  IF (p > 0) THEN
3551  var%sf(j,k,l) = lheaviside(j,k,l)*u0_glb * &
3552  (un_alpha_x%sf(j,k,l)*(grad_x%sf(j,k,l) - &
3553  (1d0-2d0*q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l))*alpharho_grad_x%sf(j,k,l)) + &
3554  un_alpha_y%sf(j,k,l)*(grad_y%sf(j,k,l) - &
3555  (1d0-2d0*q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l))*alpharho_grad_y%sf(j,k,l)) + &
3556  un_alpha_z%sf(j,k,l)*(grad_z%sf(j,k,l) - &
3557  (1d0-2d0*q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l))*alpharho_grad_z%sf(j,k,l)))
3558  ELSE
3559  var%sf(j,k,l) = lheaviside(j,k,l)*u0_glb * &
3560  (un_alpha_x%sf(j,k,l)*(grad_x%sf(j,k,l) - &
3561  (1d0-2d0*q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l))*alpharho_grad_x%sf(j,k,l)) + &
3562  un_alpha_y%sf(j,k,l)*(grad_y%sf(j,k,l) - &
3563  (1d0-2d0*q_prim_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l))*alpharho_grad_y%sf(j,k,l)))
3564  END IF
3565  END DO
3566  END DO
3567  END DO
3568  IF (r == cont_idx%beg) THEN
3569  r1hat(:,:,:) = var%sf(0:m,0:n,0:p)
3570  ELSEIF (r == cont_idx%end) THEN
3571  r2hat(:,:,:) = var%sf(0:m,0:n,0:p)
3572  END IF
3573  END DO
3574 
3575  reg_src_vf(cont_idx%beg)%sf(:,:,:) = r1hat(:,:,:)
3576  reg_src_vf(cont_idx%end)%sf(:,:,:) = r2hat(:,:,:)
3577  DO r = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
3578  reg_src_vf(r)%sf(:,:,:) = q_prim_vf(r)%sf(:,:,:)*(r1hat(:,:,:) + r2hat(:,:,:))
3579  END DO
3580  reg_src_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:) = 5d-1*velmag(:,:,:)**2d0*(r1hat(:,:,:) + r2hat(:,:,:)) + &
3581  (q_prim_vf(e_idx)%sf(:,:,:)*(fluid_pp(1)%gamma - fluid_pp(2)%gamma) + &
3582  fluid_pp(1)%pi_inf - fluid_pp(2)%pi_inf)*rnohat(:,:,:)
3583  reg_src_vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(:,:,:) = rnohat(:,:,:)
3584  IF (adv_alphan) THEN
3585  reg_src_vf(adv_idx%end)%sf(:,:,:) = -rnohat(:,:,:)
3586  END IF
3587 
3588  DEALLOCATE(var%sf, grad_x%sf, grad_y%sf, grad_z%sf, norm%sf)
3589  DEALLOCATE(un_alpha_x%sf, un_alpha_y%sf, un_alpha_z%sf)
3590  DEALLOCATE(alpharho_grad_x%sf, alpharho_grad_y%sf, alpharho_grad_z%sf)
3591 
3592  END SUBROUTINE s_compute_regularization_source ! ----------------------------------
3593 
3594 
3595 
3602  SUBROUTINE s_compute_fd_gradient(var,grad_x,grad_y,grad_z,norm)
3603 
3604  TYPE(scalar_field), INTENT(IN) :: var
3605  TYPE(scalar_field), INTENT(INOUT) :: grad_x
3606  TYPE(scalar_field), INTENT(INOUT) :: grad_y
3607  TYPE(scalar_field), INTENT(INOUT) :: grad_z
3608  TYPE(scalar_field), INTENT(INOUT) :: norm
3609 
3610  TYPE(bounds_info) :: ix,iy,iz
3611 
3612  INTEGER :: j,k,l
3613 
3614  ix%beg = -buff_size; ix%end = m + buff_size;
3615  IF (n > 0) THEN
3616  iy%beg = -buff_size; iy%end = n + buff_size
3617  IF (p > 0) THEN
3618  iz%beg = -buff_size; iz%end = p + buff_size
3619  ELSE
3620  iz%beg = -1; iz%end = 1
3621  END IF
3622  ELSE
3623  iy%beg = -1; iy%end = 1
3624  END IF
3625 
3626  DO j = ix%beg+1, ix%end-1
3627  DO k = iy%beg+1, iy%end-1
3628  DO l = iz%beg+1, iz%end-1
3629  grad_x%sf(j,k,l) = (var%sf(j+1,k,l) - var%sf(j-1,k,l))/(x_cc(j+1) - x_cc(j-1))
3630  IF (n > 0) THEN
3631  grad_y%sf(j,k,l) = (var%sf(j,k+1,l) - var%sf(j,k-1,l))/(y_cc(k+1) - y_cc(k-1))
3632  IF (p > 0) THEN
3633  grad_z%sf(j,k,l) = (var%sf(j,k,l+1) - var%sf(j,k,l-1))/(z_cc(l+1) - z_cc(l-1))
3634  END IF
3635  END IF
3636  END DO
3637  END DO
3638  END DO
3639  grad_x%sf(ix%beg,:,:) = (-3d0*var%sf(ix%beg,:,:) + 4d0*var%sf(ix%beg+1,:,:) - var%sf(ix%beg+2,:,:)) / &
3640  (x_cc(ix%beg+2) - x_cc(ix%beg))
3641  grad_x%sf(ix%end,:,:) = ( 3d0*var%sf(ix%end,:,:) - 4d0*var%sf(ix%end-1,:,:) + var%sf(ix%end-2,:,:)) / &
3642  (x_cc(ix%end) - x_cc(ix%end-2))
3643  IF (n > 0) THEN
3644  grad_y%sf(:,iy%beg,:) = (-3d0*var%sf(:,iy%beg,:) + 4d0*var%sf(:,iy%beg+1,:) - var%sf(:,iy%beg+2,:)) / &
3645  (y_cc(iy%beg+2) - y_cc(iy%beg))
3646  grad_y%sf(:,iy%end,:) = ( 3d0*var%sf(:,iy%end,:) - 4d0*var%sf(:,iy%end-1,:) + var%sf(:,iy%end-2,:)) / &
3647  (y_cc(iy%end) - y_cc(iy%end-2))
3648  IF (p > 0) THEN
3649  grad_z%sf(:,:,iz%beg) = (-3d0*var%sf(:,:,iz%beg) + 4d0*var%sf(:,:,iz%beg+1) - var%sf(:,:,iz%beg+2)) / &
3650  (z_cc(iz%beg+2) - z_cc(iz%beg))
3651  grad_z%sf(:,:,iz%end) = ( 3d0*var%sf(:,:,iz%end) - 4d0*var%sf(:,:,iz%end-1) + var%sf(:,:,iz%end-2)) / &
3652  (z_cc(iz%end) - z_cc(iz%end-2))
3653  END IF
3654  END IF
3655 
3656  IF (bc_x%beg <= -3) THEN
3657  grad_x%sf(0,:,:) = (-3d0*var%sf(0,:,:) + 4d0*var%sf(1,:,:) - var%sf(2,:,:)) / &
3658  (x_cc(2) - x_cc(0))
3659  END IF
3660  IF (bc_x%end <= -3) THEN
3661  grad_x%sf(m,:,:) = ( 3d0*var%sf(m,:,:) - 4d0*var%sf(m-1,:,:) + var%sf(m-2,:,:)) / &
3662  (x_cc(m) - x_cc(m-2))
3663  END IF
3664  IF (n > 0) THEN
3665  IF (bc_y%beg <= -3 .AND. bc_y%beg /= -13) THEN
3666  grad_y%sf(:,0,:) = (-3d0*var%sf(:,0,:) + 4d0*var%sf(:,1,:) - var%sf(:,2,:)) / &
3667  (y_cc(2) - y_cc(0))
3668  END IF
3669  IF (bc_y%end <= -3) THEN
3670  grad_y%sf(:,n,:) = ( 3d0*var%sf(:,n,:) - 4d0*var%sf(:,n-1,:) + var%sf(:,n-2,:)) / &
3671  (y_cc(n) - y_cc(n-2))
3672  END IF
3673  IF (p > 0) THEN
3674  IF (bc_z%beg <= -3) THEN
3675  grad_z%sf(:,:,0) = (-3d0*var%sf(:,:,0) + 4d0*var%sf(:,:,1) - var%sf(:,:,2)) / &
3676  (z_cc(2) - z_cc(0))
3677  END IF
3678  IF (bc_z%end <= -3) THEN
3679  grad_z%sf(:,:,p) = ( 3d0*var%sf(:,:,p) - 4d0*var%sf(:,:,p-1) + var%sf(:,:,p-2)) / &
3680  (z_cc(p) - z_cc(p-2))
3681  END IF
3682  END IF
3683  END IF
3684 
3685  IF (p == 0) THEN
3686  iz%beg = 0; iz%end = 0
3687  IF (n == 0) THEN
3688  iy%beg = 0; iy%end = 0
3689  END IF
3690  END IF
3691  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
3692  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
3693  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
3694  IF (p > 0) THEN
3695  norm%sf(j,k,l) = sqrt(grad_x%sf(j,k,l)**2d0 + &
3696  grad_y%sf(j,k,l)**2d0 + &
3697  grad_z%sf(j,k,l)**2d0)
3698  ELSEIF (n > 0) THEN
3699  norm%sf(j,k,l) = sqrt(grad_x%sf(j,k,l)**2d0 + &
3700  grad_y%sf(j,k,l)**2d0)
3701  ELSE
3702  norm%sf(j,k,l) = grad_x%sf(j,k,l)
3703  END IF
3704  END DO
3705  END DO
3706  END DO
3707 
3708  END SUBROUTINE s_compute_fd_gradient ! --------------------------------------
3709 
3710 
3711 
3719  SUBROUTINE s_pressure_relaxation_procedure(q_cons_vf) ! ----------------
3720 
3721  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: q_cons_vf
3722 
3729  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: pres_relax
3730  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(num_fluids) :: pres_k_init
3731  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: f_pres
3732  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: df_pres
3733  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(num_fluids) :: rho_k_s
3734  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: sum_alpha
3735  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: rho
3736  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: dyn_pres
3737  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: e_we
3738  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: gamma
3739  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: pi_inf
3740  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(num_fluids) :: gamma_min
3741  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(num_fluids) :: pres_inf
3742  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(2) :: re
3743  REAL(KIND(0d0)), DIMENSION(num_fluids,num_fluids) :: we
3745 
3746  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l,iter
3747  INTEGER :: relax
3748 
3749  DO i = 1, num_fluids
3750  gamma_min(i) = 1d0/fluid_pp(i)%gamma + 1d0
3751  pres_inf(i) = fluid_pp(i)%pi_inf / (1d0+fluid_pp(i)%gamma)
3752  END DO
3753 
3754  DO j = 0, m
3755  DO k = 0, n
3756  DO l = 0, p
3757 
3758  ! Numerical correction of the volume fractions
3759  IF (mpp_lim) THEN
3760  sum_alpha = 0d0
3761  DO i = 1, num_fluids
3762  IF ((q_cons_vf(i+cont_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) .LT. 0d0) .OR. &
3763  (q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) .LT. 0d0)) THEN
3764  q_cons_vf(i+cont_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) = 0d0
3765  q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) = 0d0
3766  q_cons_vf(i+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) = 0d0
3767  END IF
3768 
3769  IF (q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) .GT. 1d0) &
3770  q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) = 1d0
3771  sum_alpha = sum_alpha + q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l)
3772  END DO
3773  DO i = 1, num_fluids
3774  q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) = q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) / sum_alpha
3775  END DO
3776  END IF
3777 
3778 
3779  ! Pressures relaxation procedure ===================================
3780 
3781  ! Is the pressure relaxation procedure necessary?
3782  relax = 1
3783  DO i = 1, num_fluids
3784  IF (q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) .GT. (1d0-sgm_eps)) relax = 0
3785  END DO
3786 
3787  IF (relax == 1) THEN
3788  ! Initial state
3789  pres_relax = 0d0
3790  DO i = 1, num_fluids
3791  IF (q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) .GT. sgm_eps) THEN
3792  pres_k_init(i) = &
3793  (q_cons_vf(i+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) / &
3794  q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) &
3795  - fluid_pp(i)%pi_inf) / fluid_pp(i)%gamma
3796 
3797  IF (pres_k_init(i) .LE. -(1d0 - 1d-8)*pres_inf(i) + 1d-8) &
3798  pres_k_init(i) = -(1d0 - 1d-8)*pres_inf(i) + 1d-8
3799  ELSE
3800  pres_k_init(i) = 0d0
3801  END IF
3802  pres_relax = pres_relax + q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l)*pres_k_init(i)
3803  END DO
3804 
3805  ! Iterative process for relaxed pressure determination
3806  iter = 0
3807  f_pres = 1d-9
3808  df_pres = 1d9
3809  DO i = 1, num_fluids
3810  rho_k_s(i) = 0d0
3811  END DO
3812 
3813  DO WHILE (dabs(f_pres) .GT. 1d-10)
3814  pres_relax = pres_relax - f_pres / df_pres
3815 
3816  ! Convergence
3817  iter = iter + 1
3818  IF (iter == 50) THEN
3819  print '(A)', 'Pressure relaxation procedure failed to converge to a solution. Exiting ...'
3820  CALL s_mpi_abort()
3821  END IF
3822 
3823  ! Physical pressure
3824  DO i = 1, num_fluids
3825  IF (pres_relax .LE. -(1d0 - 1d-8)*pres_inf(i) + 1d-8) &
3826  pres_relax = -(1d0 - 1d-8)*pres_inf(i) + 1d0
3827  END DO
3828 
3829  ! Newton-Raphson method
3830  f_pres = -1d0
3831  df_pres = 0d0
3832  DO i = 1, num_fluids
3833  IF (q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) .GT. sgm_eps) THEN
3834  rho_k_s(i) = q_cons_vf(i+cont_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) / &
3835  max(q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l),sgm_eps) &
3836  * ((pres_relax+pres_inf(i)) / (pres_k_init(i) + &
3837  pres_inf(i)))**(1d0/gamma_min(i))
3838 
3839  f_pres = f_pres + q_cons_vf(i+cont_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) &
3840  / rho_k_s(i)
3841 
3842  df_pres = df_pres - q_cons_vf(i+cont_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) &
3843  / (gamma_min(i)*rho_k_s(i)*(pres_relax+pres_inf(i)))
3844  END IF
3845  END DO
3846 
3847  END DO
3848 
3849  ! Cell update of the volume fraction
3850  DO i = 1, num_fluids
3851  IF (q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) .GT. sgm_eps) &
3852  q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) = q_cons_vf(i+cont_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) &
3853  / rho_k_s(i)
3854  END DO
3855  END IF
3856 
3857  ! ==================================================================
3858 
3859 
3860  ! Mixture-total-energy correction ==================================
3861 
3862  ! The mixture-total-energy correction of the mixture pressure P is not necessary here
3863  ! because the primitive variables are directly recovered later on by the conservative
3864  ! variables (see s_convert_conservative_to_primitive_variables called in s_compute_rhs).
3865  ! However, the internal-energy equations should be reset with the corresponding mixture
3866  ! pressure from the correction. This step is carried out below.
3867 
3868 
3869  CALL s_convert_to_mixture_variables( q_cons_vf, rho, &
3870  gamma, pi_inf, &
3871  re, we, j,k,l )
3872 
3873  dyn_pres = 0d0
3874  DO i = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
3875  dyn_pres = dyn_pres + 5d-1*q_cons_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) * &
3876  q_cons_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) / max(rho,sgm_eps)
3877  END DO
3878 
3879  e_we = 0d0
3880 
3881  pres_relax = (q_cons_vf(e_idx)%sf(j,k,l) - dyn_pres - pi_inf - e_we) / gamma
3882 
3883  DO i = 1, num_fluids
3884  q_cons_vf(i+internalenergies_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) = &
3885  q_cons_vf(i+adv_idx%beg-1)%sf(j,k,l) * &
3886  (fluid_pp(i)%gamma*pres_relax + fluid_pp(i)%pi_inf)
3887  END DO
3888  ! ==================================================================
3889  END DO
3890  END DO
3891  END DO
3892 
3893  END SUBROUTINE s_pressure_relaxation_procedure ! -----------------------
3894 
3895 
3901  SUBROUTINE s_get_tvd_flux(q_cons_vf, q_prim_vf, rhs_vf,i) ! -------
3902 
3903  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: q_cons_vf
3904  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: q_prim_vf
3905  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: rhs_vf
3906  INTEGER, INTENT(in) :: i
3907 
3908  INTEGER :: j,k,l,r
3909 
3910  REAL(KIND(0d0)) :: top, bottom
3911 
3912  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
3913  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
3914  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
3915  ! Upwind direction for slope chosen based on contact velocity
3916  ! from Riemann solver (stored in adv_idx of flux_src). Slope
3917  ! is calculated using the first volume fraction.
3918  IF (hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j,k,l) >= 0d0) THEN
3919  top = q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf( j ,k,l) - &
3920  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j-1,k,l)
3921  bottom = q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j+1,k,l) - &
3922  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf( j ,k,l)
3923  ELSE
3924  top = q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j+2,k,l) - &
3925  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j+1,k,l)
3926  bottom = q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf(j+1,k,l) - &
3927  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf( j ,k,l)
3928  END IF
3929 
3930  CALL s_compute_flux_lim(top,bottom,flux_lim_func(j,k,l))
3931  END DO
3932  END DO
3933  END DO
3934 
3935  ! Compile final flux and flux source
3936  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end, 2
3937  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end, 2
3938  DO l = 1, sys_size
3939  flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) = &
3940  lo_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) + &
3941  flux_lim_func(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) * &
3942  (hi_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) - &
3943  lo_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3944  END DO
3945 
3946  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0) THEN
3947  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
3948  flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) = &
3949  lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) + &
3950  flux_lim_func(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) * &
3951  (hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) - &
3952  lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3953  END DO
3954  END IF
3955  DO l = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
3956  flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) = &
3957  lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) + &
3958  flux_lim_func(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) * &
3959  (hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) - &
3960  lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3961  END DO
3962  IF (cyl_coord) THEN
3963  DO l = 1, sys_size
3964  flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) = &
3965  lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) + &
3966  flux_lim_func(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) * &
3967  (hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end) - &
3968  lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end,iy%beg:iy%end,iz%beg:iz%end))
3969  END DO
3970  END IF
3971  END DO
3972  END DO
3973 
3974  iv%beg = 1; iv%end = adv_idx%end
3975 
3976  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(flux_ndqp(i,:,:))
3977 
3978  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0) THEN
3979  iv%beg = mom_idx%beg
3980  ELSE
3981  iv%beg = adv_idx%beg
3982  END IF
3983 
3984  IF(riemann_solver /= 1) iv%end = adv_idx%beg
3985 
3986  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(flux_src_ndqp(i,:,:))
3987  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,:,:))
3988  END SUBROUTINE s_get_tvd_flux
3989 
3990 
3995  SUBROUTINE s_get_viscous(q_cons_vf, q_prim_vf, rhs_vf) ! -------
3996 
3997  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: q_cons_vf
3998  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: q_prim_vf
3999  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: rhs_vf
4000 
4001  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l,r
4002 
4003  DO i = 1, num_dims
4004  ! WENO reconstruct variables to cell boundaries
4005  IF(weno_vars == 1) THEN
4006 
4007  iv%beg = 1; iv%end = mom_idx%end
4008 
4009  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
4010  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4011  ql_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4012  qr_cons_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4013  dflt_int, i )
4014 
4015  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end, 2
4016  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end, 2
4017  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
4018 
4019  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf = sgm_eps
4020  qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf = sgm_eps
4021 
4022  DO r = 1, cont_idx%end
4023  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf = &
4024  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf + &
4025  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(r)%sf
4026  qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf = &
4027  qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf + &
4028  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(r)%sf
4029  END DO
4030 
4031  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf = &
4032  ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf / &
4033  ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
4034  qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf = &
4035  qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf / &
4036  qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
4037 
4038  END DO
4039  END DO
4040  END DO
4041 
4042  ELSE
4043 
4044  iv%beg = mom_idx%beg; iv%end = mom_idx%end
4045 
4046  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
4047  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4048  ql_prim_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4049  qr_prim_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4050  dflt_int, i )
4051 
4052  END IF
4053 
4054  iv%beg = mom_idx%beg; iv%end = mom_idx%end
4055 
4056  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(ql_prim_ndqp(i,:,:))
4057  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(qr_prim_ndqp(i,:,:))
4058  END DO
4059 
4060  IF (weno_re_flux) THEN
4061  ! Compute velocity gradient at cell centers using scalar
4062  ! divergence theorem
4063  DO i = 1, num_dims
4064 
4065  IF(i == 1) THEN
4066  CALL s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem( &
4067  ql_prim_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4068  qr_prim_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4069  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), i )
4070  ELSEIF(i == 2) THEN
4071  CALL s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem( &
4072  ql_prim_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4073  qr_prim_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4074  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), i )
4075  ELSE
4076  CALL s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem( &
4077  ql_prim_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4078  qr_prim_ndqp(i,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4079  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), i )
4080  END IF
4081 
4082  END DO
4083 
4084  ELSE ! Compute velocity gradient at cell centers using finite differences
4085 
4086  iv%beg = mom_idx%beg; iv%end = mom_idx%end
4087 
4088  DO k = iv%beg, iv%end
4089 
4090  DO j = ix%beg+1, ix%end
4091  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,:,:) = &
4092  (q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,:,:) - &
4093  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(j-1,:,:))/ &
4094  (x_cc(j) - x_cc(j-1))
4095  END DO
4096  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end-1
4097  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,:,:) = &
4098  (q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(j+1,:,:) - &
4099  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,:,:))/ &
4100  (x_cc(j+1) - x_cc(j))
4101  END DO
4102 
4103  IF (n > 0) THEN
4104 
4105  DO j = iy%beg+1, iy%end
4106  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:, j ,:) = &
4107  (q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:, j ,:) - &
4108  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,j-1,:))/ &
4109  (y_cc(j) - y_cc(j-1))
4110  END DO
4111  DO j = iy%beg, iy%end-1
4112  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:, j ,:) = &
4113  (q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,j+1,:) - &
4114  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:, j ,:))/ &
4115  (y_cc(j+1) - y_cc(j))
4116  END DO
4117  DO j = iy%beg+1, iy%end
4118  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1, j ,:) = &
4119  (dql_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1, j ,:) + &
4120  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1, j ,:) + &
4121  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,j-1,:) + &
4122  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,j-1,:))
4123  END DO
4124  DO j = iy%beg, iy%end-1
4125  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1, j ,:) = &
4126  (dql_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,j+1,:) + &
4127  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,j+1,:) + &
4128  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1, j ,:) + &
4129  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1, j ,:))
4130  END DO
4131  DO j = ix%beg+1, ix%end
4132  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:) = &
4133  (dql_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:) + &
4134  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:) + &
4135  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(j-1,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:) + &
4136  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(j-1,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:))
4137  END DO
4138  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end-1
4139  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:) = &
4140  (dql_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(j+1,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:) + &
4141  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(j+1,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:) + &
4142  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:) + &
4143  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:))
4144  END DO
4145  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,iy%beg+1:iy%end,:) = 25d-2 * &
4146  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,iy%beg+1:iy%end,:)
4147  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,iy%beg:iy%end-1,:) = 25d-2 * &
4148  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,iy%beg:iy%end-1,:)
4149  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:) = 25d-2 * &
4150  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:)
4151  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end-1,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:) = 25d-2 * &
4152  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end-1,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,:)
4153 
4154  IF (p > 0) THEN
4155 
4156  DO j = iz%beg+1, iz%end
4157  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,:, j ) = &
4158  (q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,:, j ) - &
4159  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,:,j-1))/ &
4160  (z_cc(j) - z_cc(j-1))
4161  END DO
4162  DO j = iz%beg, iz%end-1
4163  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,:, j ) = &
4164  (q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,:,j+1) - &
4165  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,:, j ))/ &
4166  (z_cc(j+1) - z_cc(j))
4167  END DO
4168  DO j = ix%beg+1, ix%end
4169  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) = &
4170  (dql_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4171  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4172  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(j-1,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4173  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(j-1,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1))
4174  END DO
4175  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end-1
4176  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) = &
4177  (dql_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(j+1,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4178  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(j+1,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4179  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4180  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf( j ,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1))
4181  END DO
4182  DO j = iy%beg+1, iy%end
4183  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:, j ,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) = &
4184  (dql_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:, j ,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4185  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:, j ,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4186  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,j-1,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4187  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,j-1,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1))
4188  END DO
4189  DO j = iy%beg, iy%end-1
4190  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:, j ,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) = &
4191  (dql_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,j+1,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4192  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,j+1,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4193  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:, j ,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) + &
4194  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:, j ,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1))
4195  END DO
4196  DO j = iz%beg+1, iz%end
4197  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1, j ) = &
4198  (dql_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1, j ) + &
4199  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1, j ) + &
4200  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,j-1) + &
4201  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,j-1))
4202  END DO
4203  DO j = iz%beg, iz%end-1
4204  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1, j ) = &
4205  (dql_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,j+1) + &
4206  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,j+1) + &
4207  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1, j ) + &
4208  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1, j ))
4209  END DO
4210  DO j = iz%beg+1, iz%end
4211  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:, j ) = &
4212  (dql_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:, j ) + &
4213  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:, j ) + &
4214  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:,j-1) + &
4215  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:,j-1))
4216  END DO
4217  DO j = iz%beg, iz%end-1
4218  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:, j ) = &
4219  (dql_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:,j+1) + &
4220  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:,j+1) + &
4221  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:, j ) + &
4222  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:, j ))
4223  END DO
4224 
4225  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) = 25d-2 * &
4226  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1)
4227  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end-1,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) = 25d-2 * &
4228  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg:ix%end-1,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1)
4229  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) = 25d-2 * &
4230  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1)
4231  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg:iy%end-1,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1) = 25d-2 * &
4232  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg:iy%end-1,iz%beg+1:iz%end-1)
4233  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,iz%beg+1:iz%end) = 25d-2 * &
4234  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,iz%beg+1:iz%end)
4235  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,iz%beg:iz%end-1) = 25d-2 * &
4236  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(:,iy%beg+1:iy%end-1,iz%beg:iz%end-1)
4237  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end) = 25d-2 * &
4238  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:,iz%beg+1:iz%end)
4239  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:,iz%beg:iz%end-1) = 25d-2 * &
4240  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(k)%sf(ix%beg+1:ix%end-1,:,iz%beg:iz%end-1)
4241 
4242  CALL s_compute_fd_gradient( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4243  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4244  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4245  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4246  gm_vel_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k) )
4247 
4248  ELSE
4249 
4250  CALL s_compute_fd_gradient( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4251  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4252  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4253  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4254  gm_vel_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k) )
4255 
4256  END IF
4257 
4258  ELSE
4259 
4260  CALL s_compute_fd_gradient( q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4261  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4262  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4263  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k), &
4264  gm_vel_qp(0,0,0)%vf(k) )
4265 
4266  END IF
4267 
4268  END DO
4269 
4270  END IF
4271 
4272  END SUBROUTINE s_get_viscous
4273 
4274 
4279  SUBROUTINE s_get_crv(q_cons_vf, q_prim_vf, rhs_vf) ! -------
4280 
4281  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: q_cons_vf
4282  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: q_prim_vf
4283  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: rhs_vf
4284 
4285  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l,r
4286 
4287  DO l = 1, crv_size
4288 
4289  iv%beg = e_idx + crv_idx(l); iv%end = iv%beg
4290 
4291  ! ==================================================================
4292  DO i = 1, num_dims
4293 
4294  ! Reconstruct the volume fraction at the cell boundaries
4295  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
4296  q_prim_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4297  ql_prim_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4298  qr_prim_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4299  dflt_int, i )
4300  ! Average the quadrature points at the cell boundaries to
4301  ! obtain higher-order estimate of the volume fraction
4302  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(ql_prim_ndqp(i,:,:))
4303  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(qr_prim_ndqp(i,:,:))
4304 
4305  END DO
4306  ! ==================================================================
4307 
4308  IF (lsq_deriv) THEN
4309  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(dq_prim_dx_qp)
4310  IF (n > 0) THEN
4311  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(dq_prim_dy_qp)
4312  IF (p > 0) THEN
4313  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(dq_prim_dz_qp)
4314  END IF
4315  END IF
4316  ELSE
4317  ! Apply the scalar divergence theorem to compute the volume
4318  ! fraction gradient at the cell center
4319  CALL s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem( &
4320  ql_prim_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4321  qr_prim_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4322  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), 1 )
4323 
4324  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(dq_prim_dx_qp)
4325 
4326  IF (n > 0) THEN
4327  CALL s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem( &
4328  ql_prim_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4329  qr_prim_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4330  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), 2 )
4331 
4332  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(dq_prim_dy_qp)
4333 
4334  IF (p > 0) THEN
4335  CALL s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem( &
4336  ql_prim_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4337  qr_prim_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4338  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), 3 )
4339 
4340  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(dq_prim_dz_qp)
4341  END IF
4342  END IF
4343  END IF
4344 
4345  ! ==================================================================
4346 
4347  ! Compute the gradient magnitude at the cell center
4348  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end, 2
4349  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end, 2
4350  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end, 2
4351  CALL s_compute_gradient_magnitude( &
4352  dq_prim_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4353  dq_prim_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4354  dq_prim_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4355  gm_alpha_qp(i,j,k)%vf( crv_idx(l): &
4356  crv_idx(l) ) )
4357  END DO
4358  END DO
4359  END DO
4360 
4361  ! ==================================================================
4362 
4363  ! Reconstruct the volume fraction gradient at the cell
4364  ! boundaries
4365  DO i = 1, num_dims
4366 
4367  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
4368  dq_prim_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4369  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4370  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4371  dflt_int, i )
4372  IF (n > 0) THEN
4373  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
4374  dq_prim_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4375  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4376  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4377  dflt_int, i )
4378  IF (p > 0) THEN
4379  CALL s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( &
4380  dq_prim_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4381  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4382  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,:,:), &
4383  dflt_int, i )
4384  END IF
4385  END IF
4386 
4387  END DO
4388  ! ==================================================================
4389 
4390  ! Compute the gradient magnitude at the cell boundaries
4391  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end, 2
4392  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end, 2
4393  DO i = 1, num_dims
4394  CALL s_compute_gradient_magnitude( &
4395  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4396  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4397  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4398  gm_alphal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( crv_idx(l): &
4399  crv_idx(l) ) )
4400  CALL s_compute_gradient_magnitude( &
4401  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4402  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4403  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
4404  gm_alphar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( crv_idx(l): &
4405  crv_idx(l) ) )
4406  END DO
4407  END DO
4408  END DO
4409  ! ==================================================================
4410  IF (alt_crv) THEN
4411  ! ==================================================================
4412 
4413  ! Compute the normalized volume fraction gradient at the
4414  ! cell center
4415  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end, 2
4416  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end, 2
4417  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end, 2
4418  un_alpha_x_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = &
4419  dq_prim_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf(e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf / &
4420  max(gm_alpha_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf,sgm_eps)
4421  IF (n > 0) THEN
4422  un_alpha_y_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = &
4423  dq_prim_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf(e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf / &
4424  max(gm_alpha_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf,sgm_eps)
4425  IF (p > 0) THEN
4426  un_alpha_z_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = &
4427  dq_prim_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf(e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf / &
4428  max(gm_alpha_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf,sgm_eps)
4429  END IF
4430  END IF
4431  END DO
4432  END DO
4433  END DO
4434  ! ==================================================================
4435 
4436  ! Apply the scalar divergence theorem to compute the gradient
4437  ! of the gradient magnitude at the cell center
4438  CALL s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem( &
4439  gm_alphal_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l):crv_idx(l)),&
4440  gm_alphar_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l):crv_idx(l)),&
4441  dgm_alpha_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l):crv_idx(l)),1)
4442  ! CALL s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(dgm_alpha_dx_qp)
4443 
4444  IF (n > 0) THEN
4445  CALL s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem( &
4446  gm_alphal_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l):crv_idx(l)),&
4447  gm_alphar_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l):crv_idx(l)),&
4448  dgm_alpha_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l):crv_idx(l)),2)
4449  ! CALL s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(dgm_alpha_dy_qp)
4450  IF (p > 0) THEN
4451  CALL s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem( &
4452  gm_alphal_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l):crv_idx(l)),&
4453  gm_alphar_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l):crv_idx(l)),&
4454  dgm_alpha_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l):crv_idx(l)),3)
4455  ! CALL s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(dgm_alpha_dz_qp)
4456  END IF
4457  END IF
4458  ! ==================================================================
4459 
4460  !Apply the vector divergence theorem to compute the
4461  ! Laplacian of the volume fraction at the cell center
4462  CALL s_apply_vector_divergence_theorem( &
4463  dql_prim_dx_ndqp, &
4464  dql_prim_dy_ndqp, &
4465  dql_prim_dz_ndqp, &
4466  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp, &
4467  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp, &
4468  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp, &
4469  laplacian_vf(crv_idx(l):crv_idx(l)))
4470  ! ==================================================================
4471 
4472  ! Compute alternate volume fraction curvature
4473  alt_kappa_vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = ( un_alpha_x_qp(0,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf * &
4474  dgm_alpha_dx_qp(0,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf + &
4475  un_alpha_y_qp(0,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf * &
4476  dgm_alpha_dy_qp(0,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf + &
4477  un_alpha_z_qp(0,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf * &
4478  dgm_alpha_dz_qp(0,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf - &
4479  laplacian_vf(crv_idx(l))%sf ) / &
4480  max(gm_alpha_qp(0,0,0)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf,sgm_eps)
4481  ! ==================================================================
4482  ELSE
4483  ! ==================================================================
4484 
4485  ! Compute the normalized volume fraction gradient at the cell
4486  ! boundaries
4487  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end, 2
4488  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end, 2
4489  un_alphal_x_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = &
4490  dql_prim_dx_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf / &
4491  max(gm_alphal_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf,sgm_eps)
4492  un_alphar_x_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = &
4493  dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf / &
4494  max(gm_alphar_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf,sgm_eps)
4495  IF (n > 0) THEN
4496  un_alphal_y_ndqp(2,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = &
4497  dql_prim_dy_ndqp(2,j,k)%vf(e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf / &
4498  max(gm_alphal_ndqp(2,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf,sgm_eps)
4499  un_alphar_y_ndqp(2,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = &
4500  dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(2,j,k)%vf(e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf / &
4501  max(gm_alphar_ndqp(2,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf,sgm_eps)
4502  IF (p > 0) THEN
4503  un_alphal_z_ndqp(3,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = &
4504  dql_prim_dz_ndqp(3,j,k)%vf(e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf / &
4505  max(gm_alphal_ndqp(3,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf,sgm_eps)
4506  un_alphar_z_ndqp(3,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = &
4507  dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(3,j,k)%vf(e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf / &
4508  max(gm_alphar_ndqp(3,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf,sgm_eps)
4509  END IF
4510  END IF
4511  END DO
4512  END DO
4513  ! ==================================================================
4514 
4515  iv%beg = crv_idx(l); iv%end = iv%beg
4516  ! Average the quadrature points at the cell boundaries to
4517  ! obtain higher-order estimate of the normalized volume fraction
4518  ! gradient
4519  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(un_alphal_x_ndqp(1,:,:))
4520  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(un_alphar_x_ndqp(1,:,:))
4521  IF (n > 0) THEN
4522  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(un_alphal_y_ndqp(2,:,:))
4523  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(un_alphar_y_ndqp(2,:,:))
4524  IF(p > 0) THEN
4525  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(un_alphal_z_ndqp(3,:,:))
4526  CALL s_average_cell_boundary_values(un_alphar_z_ndqp(3,:,:))
4527  END IF
4528  END IF
4529  ! ==================================================================
4530  IF (lsq_deriv .NEQV. .true.) THEN
4531  ! Apply the vector divergence theorem to compute the divergence
4532  ! of the normalized volume fraction gradient
4533  CALL s_apply_vector_divergence_theorem( &
4534  un_alphal_x_ndqp, &
4535  un_alphal_y_ndqp, &
4536  un_alphal_z_ndqp, &
4537  un_alphar_x_ndqp, &
4538  un_alphar_y_ndqp, &
4539  un_alphar_z_ndqp, &
4540  kappa_vf(iv%beg:iv%end) )
4541 
4542  kappa_vf(crv_idx(l))%sf = -kappa_vf(crv_idx(l))%sf
4543  END IF
4544  ! ==================================================================
4545  END IF
4546  END DO
4547  ! END: Computing Volume Fraction Gradients and Curvatures ==========
4548 
4549 
4550  END SUBROUTINE s_get_crv
4551 
4552 
4557  SUBROUTINE s_populate_variables_buffers(v_vf) ! ---------------
4558 
4559  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(sys_size), INTENT(INOUT) :: v_vf
4560 
4561  INTEGER :: i,j,k
4562 
4563 
4564  ! Population of Buffers in x-direction =============================
4565  IF(bc_x%beg <= -3) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at beginning
4566 
4567  DO i = 1, sys_size
4568  DO j = 1, buff_size
4569  v_vf(i)%sf(-j,0:n,0:p) = &
4570  v_vf(i)%sf( 0,0:n,0:p)
4571  END DO
4572  END DO
4573 
4574  ELSEIF(bc_x%beg == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at beginning
4575 
4576  DO j = 1, buff_size
4577 
4578  DO i = 1, cont_idx%end
4579  v_vf(i)%sf(-j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4580  v_vf(i)%sf(j-1,0:n,0:p)
4581  END DO
4582 
4583  v_vf(mom_idx%beg)%sf(-j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4584  -v_vf(mom_idx%beg)%sf(j-1,0:n,0:p)
4585 
4586  DO i = mom_idx%beg+1, sys_size
4587  v_vf(i)%sf(-j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4588  v_vf(i)%sf(j-1,0:n,0:p)
4589  END DO
4590 
4591  END DO
4592 
4593  ELSEIF(bc_x%beg == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at beginning
4594 
4595  DO i = 1, sys_size
4596  DO j = 1, buff_size
4597  v_vf(i)%sf( -j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4598  v_vf(i)%sf(m-(j-1),0:n,0:p)
4599  END DO
4600  END DO
4601 
4602  ELSE ! Processor BC at beginning
4603 
4604  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
4605  v_vf, 1,-1 )
4606 
4607  END IF
4608 
4609  IF(bc_x%end <= -3) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at end
4610 
4611  DO i = 1, sys_size
4612  DO j = 1, buff_size
4613  v_vf(i)%sf(m+j,0:n,0:p) = &
4614  v_vf(i)%sf( m ,0:n,0:p)
4615  END DO
4616  END DO
4617 
4618  ELSEIF(bc_x%end == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at end
4619 
4620  DO j = 1, buff_size
4621 
4622  DO i = 1, cont_idx%end
4623  v_vf(i)%sf( m+j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4624  v_vf(i)%sf(m-(j-1),0:n,0:p)
4625  END DO
4626 
4627  v_vf(mom_idx%beg)%sf( m+j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4628  -v_vf(mom_idx%beg)%sf(m-(j-1),0:n,0:p)
4629 
4630  DO i = mom_idx%beg+1, sys_size
4631  v_vf(i)%sf( m+j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4632  v_vf(i)%sf(m-(j-1),0:n,0:p)
4633  END DO
4634 
4635  END DO
4636 
4637  ELSEIF(bc_x%end == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at end
4638 
4639  DO i = 1, sys_size
4640  DO j = 1, buff_size
4641  v_vf(i)%sf(m+j,0:n,0:p) = &
4642  v_vf(i)%sf(j-1,0:n,0:p)
4643  END DO
4644  END DO
4645 
4646  ELSE ! Processor BC at end
4647 
4648  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
4649  v_vf, 1, 1 )
4650 
4651  END IF
4652 
4653  ! END: Population of Buffers in x-direction ========================
4654 
4655 
4656  ! Population of Buffers in y-direction =============================
4657 
4658  IF(n == 0) THEN
4659 
4660  RETURN
4661 
4662  ELSEIF(bc_y%beg <= -3 .AND. bc_y%beg /= -13) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at beginning
4663 
4664  DO i = 1, sys_size
4665  DO j = 1, buff_size
4666  v_vf(i)%sf(:,-j,0:p) = &
4667  v_vf(i)%sf(:, 0,0:p)
4668  END DO
4669  END DO
4670 
4671  ELSEIF(bc_y%beg == -13) THEN ! Axis BC at beginning
4672 
4673  DO j = 1, buff_size
4674  DO k = 0, p
4675  IF (z_cc(k) < pi) THEN
4676  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg
4677  v_vf(i)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
4678  v_vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,k+((p+1)/2))
4679  END DO
4680 
4681  v_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
4682  -v_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,j-1,k+((p+1)/2))
4683 
4684  v_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
4685  -v_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,j-1,k+((p+1)/2))
4686 
4687  DO i = e_idx, sys_size
4688  v_vf(i)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
4689  v_vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,k+((p+1)/2))
4690  END DO
4691  ELSE
4692  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg
4693  v_vf(i)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
4694  v_vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,k-((p+1)/2))
4695  END DO
4696 
4697  v_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
4698  -v_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,j-1,k-((p+1)/2))
4699 
4700  v_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
4701  -v_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,j-1,k-((p+1)/2))
4702 
4703  DO i = e_idx, sys_size
4704  v_vf(i)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
4705  v_vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,k-((p+1)/2))
4706  END DO
4707  END IF
4708  END DO
4709  END DO
4710 
4711  ELSEIF(bc_y%beg == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at beginning
4712 
4713  DO j = 1, buff_size
4714 
4715  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg
4716  v_vf(i)%sf(:,-j ,0:p) = &
4717  v_vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,0:p)
4718  END DO
4719 
4720  v_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,-j ,0:p) = &
4721  -v_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,j-1,0:p)
4722 
4723  DO i = mom_idx%beg+2, sys_size
4724  v_vf(i)%sf(:,-j ,0:p) = &
4725  v_vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,0:p)
4726  END DO
4727 
4728  END DO
4729 
4730  ELSEIF(bc_y%beg == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at beginning
4731 
4732  DO i = 1, sys_size
4733  DO j = 1, buff_size
4734  v_vf(i)%sf(:, -j ,0:p) = &
4735  v_vf(i)%sf(:,n-(j-1),0:p)
4736  END DO
4737  END DO
4738 
4739  ELSE ! Processor BC at beginning
4740 
4741  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
4742  v_vf, 2,-1 )
4743 
4744  END IF
4745 
4746  IF(bc_y%end <= -3) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at end
4747 
4748  DO i = 1, sys_size
4749  DO j = 1, buff_size
4750  v_vf(i)%sf(:,n+j,0:p) = &
4751  v_vf(i)%sf(:, n ,0:p)
4752  END DO
4753  END DO
4754 
4755  ELSEIF(bc_y%end == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at end
4756 
4757  DO j = 1, buff_size
4758 
4759  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg
4760  v_vf(i)%sf(:, n+j ,0:p) = &
4761  v_vf(i)%sf(:,n-(j-1),0:p)
4762  END DO
4763 
4764  v_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:, n+j ,0:p) = &
4765  -v_vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,n-(j-1),0:p)
4766 
4767  DO i = mom_idx%beg+2, sys_size
4768  v_vf(i)%sf(:, n+j ,0:p) = &
4769  v_vf(i)%sf(:,n-(j-1),0:p)
4770  END DO
4771 
4772  END DO
4773 
4774  ELSEIF(bc_y%end == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at end
4775 
4776  DO i = 1, sys_size
4777  DO j = 1, buff_size
4778  v_vf(i)%sf(:,n+j,0:p) = &
4779  v_vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,0:p)
4780  END DO
4781  END DO
4782 
4783  ELSE ! Processor BC at end
4784 
4785  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
4786  v_vf, 2, 1 )
4787 
4788  END IF
4789 
4790  ! END: Population of Buffers in y-direction ========================
4791 
4792 
4793  ! Population of Buffers in z-direction =============================
4794 
4795  IF(p == 0) THEN
4796 
4797  RETURN
4798 
4799  ELSEIF(bc_z%beg <= -3) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at beginning
4800 
4801  DO i = 1, sys_size
4802  DO j = 1, buff_size
4803  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,-j) = &
4804  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:, 0)
4805  END DO
4806  END DO
4807 
4808  ELSEIF(bc_z%beg == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at beginning
4809 
4810  DO j = 1, buff_size
4811 
4812  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg+1
4813  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,-j ) = &
4814  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,j-1)
4815  END DO
4816 
4817  v_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,:,-j ) = &
4818  -v_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,:,j-1)
4819 
4820  DO i = e_idx, sys_size
4821  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,-j ) = &
4822  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,j-1)
4823  END DO
4824 
4825  END DO
4826 
4827  ELSEIF(bc_z%beg == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at beginning
4828 
4829  DO i = 1, sys_size
4830  DO j = 1, buff_size
4831  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:, -j ) = &
4832  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,p-(j-1))
4833  END DO
4834  END DO
4835 
4836  ELSE ! Processor BC at beginning
4837 
4838  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
4839  v_vf, 3,-1 )
4840 
4841  END IF
4842 
4843  IF(bc_z%end <= -3) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at end
4844 
4845  DO i = 1, sys_size
4846  DO j = 1, buff_size
4847  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,p+j) = &
4848  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:, p )
4849  END DO
4850  END DO
4851 
4852  ELSEIF(bc_z%end == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at end
4853 
4854  DO j = 1, buff_size
4855 
4856  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg+1
4857  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:, p+j ) = &
4858  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,p-(j-1))
4859  END DO
4860 
4861  v_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,:, p+j ) = &
4862  -v_vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,:,p-(j-1))
4863 
4864  DO i = e_idx, sys_size
4865  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:, p+j ) = &
4866  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,p-(j-1))
4867  END DO
4868 
4869  END DO
4870 
4871  ELSEIF(bc_z%end == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at end
4872 
4873  DO i = 1, sys_size
4874  DO j = 1, buff_size
4875  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,p+j) = &
4876  v_vf(i)%sf(:,:,j-1)
4877  END DO
4878  END DO
4879 
4880  ELSE ! Processor BC at end
4881 
4882  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
4883  v_vf, 3, 1 )
4884 
4885  END IF
4886 
4887  ! END: Population of Buffers in z-direction ========================
4888 
4889 
4890  END SUBROUTINE s_populate_variables_buffers ! -------------
4891 
4892 
4893 
4894 
4898  SUBROUTINE s_populate_conservative_variables_buffers() ! ---------------
4899 
4900  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l,r
4901 
4902  ! Population of Buffers in x-direction =============================
4903 
4904  IF(bc_x%beg <= -3) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at beginning
4905 
4906  DO i = 1, sys_size
4907  DO j = 1, buff_size
4908  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(-j,0:n,0:p) = &
4909  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( 0,0:n,0:p)
4910  END DO
4911  END DO
4912 
4913  ELSEIF(bc_x%beg == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at beginning
4914 
4915  DO j = 1, buff_size
4916 
4917  DO i = 1, cont_idx%end
4918  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(-j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4919  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j-1,0:n,0:p)
4920  END DO
4921 
4922  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg)%sf(-j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4923  -q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg)%sf(j-1,0:n,0:p)
4924 
4925  DO i = mom_idx%beg+1, sys_size
4926  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(-j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4927  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j-1,0:n,0:p)
4928  END DO
4929 
4930  END DO
4931 
4932  ELSEIF(bc_x%beg == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at beginning
4933 
4934  DO i = 1, sys_size
4935  DO j = 1, buff_size
4936  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( -j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4937  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(m-(j-1),0:n,0:p)
4938  END DO
4939  END DO
4940 
4941  ELSE ! Processor BC at beginning
4942 
4943  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
4944  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf, 1,-1 )
4945 
4946  END IF
4947 
4948  IF(bc_x%end <= -3) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at end
4949 
4950  DO i = 1, sys_size
4951  DO j = 1, buff_size
4952  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(m+j,0:n,0:p) = &
4953  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( m ,0:n,0:p)
4954  END DO
4955  END DO
4956 
4957  ELSEIF(bc_x%end == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at end
4958 
4959  DO j = 1, buff_size
4960 
4961  DO i = 1, cont_idx%end
4962  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( m+j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4963  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(m-(j-1),0:n,0:p)
4964  END DO
4965 
4966  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg)%sf( m+j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4967  -q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg)%sf(m-(j-1),0:n,0:p)
4968 
4969  DO i = mom_idx%beg+1, sys_size
4970  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( m+j ,0:n,0:p) = &
4971  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(m-(j-1),0:n,0:p)
4972  END DO
4973 
4974  END DO
4975 
4976  ELSEIF(bc_x%end == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at end
4977 
4978  DO i = 1, sys_size
4979  DO j = 1, buff_size
4980  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(m+j,0:n,0:p) = &
4981  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j-1,0:n,0:p)
4982  END DO
4983  END DO
4984 
4985  ELSE ! Processor BC at end
4986 
4987  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
4988  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf, 1, 1 )
4989 
4990  END IF
4991 
4992  IF(commute_err) THEN
4993  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end, 2
4994  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end, 2
4995  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end, 2
4996  DO l = 1, sys_size
4997  DO r = 1, buff_size
4998  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(-r ,0:n,0:p) = &
4999  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf(-r ,0:n,0:p)
5000  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(m+r,0:n,0:p) = &
5001  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf(m+r,0:n,0:p)
5002  END DO
5003  END DO
5004  END DO
5005  END DO
5006  END DO
5007  END IF
5008 
5009  ! END: Population of Buffers in x-direction ========================
5010 
5011 
5012  ! Population of Buffers in y-direction =============================
5013 
5014  IF(n == 0) THEN
5015 
5016  RETURN
5017 
5018  ELSEIF(bc_y%beg <= -3 .AND. bc_y%beg /= -13) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at beginning
5019 
5020  DO i = 1, sys_size
5021  DO j = 1, buff_size
5022  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,-j,0:p) = &
5023  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:, 0,0:p)
5024  END DO
5025  END DO
5026 
5027  ELSEIF(bc_y%beg == -13) THEN ! Axis BC at beginning
5028 
5029  DO j = 1, buff_size
5030  DO k = 0, p
5031  IF (z_cc(k) < pi) THEN
5032  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg
5033  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
5034  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,k+((p+1)/2))
5035  END DO
5036 
5037  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
5038  -q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,j-1,k+((p+1)/2))
5039 
5040  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
5041  -q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,j-1,k+((p+1)/2))
5042 
5043  DO i = e_idx, sys_size
5044  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
5045  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,k+((p+1)/2))
5046  END DO
5047  ELSE
5048  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg
5049  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
5050  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,k-((p+1)/2))
5051  END DO
5052 
5053  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
5054  -q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,j-1,k-((p+1)/2))
5055 
5056  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
5057  -q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,j-1,k-((p+1)/2))
5058 
5059  DO i = e_idx, sys_size
5060  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,-j , k ) = &
5061  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,k-((p+1)/2))
5062  END DO
5063  END IF
5064  END DO
5065  END DO
5066 
5067  ELSEIF(bc_y%beg == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at beginning
5068 
5069  DO j = 1, buff_size
5070 
5071  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg
5072  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,-j ,0:p) = &
5073  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,0:p)
5074  END DO
5075 
5076  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,-j ,0:p) = &
5077  -q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,j-1,0:p)
5078 
5079  DO i = mom_idx%beg+2, sys_size
5080  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,-j ,0:p) = &
5081  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,0:p)
5082  END DO
5083 
5084  END DO
5085 
5086  ELSEIF(bc_y%beg == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at beginning
5087 
5088  DO i = 1, sys_size
5089  DO j = 1, buff_size
5090  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:, -j ,0:p) = &
5091  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,n-(j-1),0:p)
5092  END DO
5093  END DO
5094 
5095  ELSE ! Processor BC at beginning
5096 
5097  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
5098  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf, 2,-1 )
5099 
5100  END IF
5101 
5102  IF(bc_y%end <= -3) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at end
5103 
5104  DO i = 1, sys_size
5105  DO j = 1, buff_size
5106  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,n+j,0:p) = &
5107  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:, n ,0:p)
5108  END DO
5109  END DO
5110 
5111  ELSEIF(bc_y%end == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at end
5112 
5113  DO j = 1, buff_size
5114
