5115  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg
5116  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:, n+j ,0:p) = &
5117  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,n-(j-1),0:p)
5118  END DO
5119 
5120  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:, n+j ,0:p) = &
5121  -q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%beg+1)%sf(:,n-(j-1),0:p)
5122 
5123  DO i = mom_idx%beg+2, sys_size
5124  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:, n+j ,0:p) = &
5125  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,n-(j-1),0:p)
5126  END DO
5127 
5128  END DO
5129 
5130  ELSEIF(bc_y%end == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at end
5131 
5132  DO i = 1, sys_size
5133  DO j = 1, buff_size
5134  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,n+j,0:p) = &
5135  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,j-1,0:p)
5136  END DO
5137  END DO
5138 
5139  ELSE ! Processor BC at end
5140 
5141  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
5142  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf, 2, 1 )
5143 
5144  END IF
5145 
5146  IF(commute_err) THEN
5147  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end, 2
5148  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end, 2
5149  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end, 2
5150  DO l = 1, sys_size
5151  DO r = 1, buff_size
5152  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(:,-r ,0:p) = &
5153  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf(:,-r ,0:p)
5154  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(:,n+r,0:p) = &
5155  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf(:,n+r,0:p)
5156  END DO
5157  END DO
5158  END DO
5159  END DO
5160  END DO
5161  END IF
5162 
5163  ! END: Population of Buffers in y-direction ========================
5164 
5165 
5166  ! Population of Buffers in z-direction =============================
5167 
5168  IF(p == 0) THEN
5169 
5170  RETURN
5171 
5172  ELSEIF(bc_z%beg <= -3) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at beginning
5173 
5174  DO i = 1, sys_size
5175  DO j = 1, buff_size
5176  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,-j) = &
5177  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:, 0)
5178  END DO
5179  END DO
5180 
5181  ELSEIF(bc_z%beg == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at beginning
5182 
5183  DO j = 1, buff_size
5184 
5185  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg+1
5186  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,-j ) = &
5187  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,j-1)
5188  END DO
5189 
5190  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,:,-j ) = &
5191  -q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,:,j-1)
5192 
5193  DO i = e_idx, sys_size
5194  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,-j ) = &
5195  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,j-1)
5196  END DO
5197 
5198  END DO
5199 
5200  ELSEIF(bc_z%beg == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at beginning
5201 
5202  DO i = 1, sys_size
5203  DO j = 1, buff_size
5204  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:, -j ) = &
5205  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,p-(j-1))
5206  END DO
5207  END DO
5208 
5209  ELSE ! Processor BC at beginning
5210 
5211  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
5212  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf, 3,-1 )
5213 
5214  END IF
5215 
5216  IF(bc_z%end <= -3) THEN ! Ghost-cell extrap. BC at end
5217 
5218  DO i = 1, sys_size
5219  DO j = 1, buff_size
5220  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,p+j) = &
5221  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:, p )
5222  END DO
5223  END DO
5224 
5225  ELSEIF(bc_z%end == -2) THEN ! Symmetry BC at end
5226 
5227  DO j = 1, buff_size
5228 
5229  DO i = 1, mom_idx%beg+1
5230  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:, p+j ) = &
5231  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,p-(j-1))
5232  END DO
5233 
5234  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,:, p+j ) = &
5235  -q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(mom_idx%end)%sf(:,:,p-(j-1))
5236 
5237  DO i = e_idx, sys_size
5238  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:, p+j ) = &
5239  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,p-(j-1))
5240  END DO
5241 
5242  END DO
5243 
5244  ELSEIF(bc_z%end == -1) THEN ! Periodic BC at end
5245 
5246  DO i = 1, sys_size
5247  DO j = 1, buff_size
5248  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,p+j) = &
5249  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(:,:,j-1)
5250  END DO
5251  END DO
5252 
5253  ELSE ! Processor BC at end
5254 
5255  CALL s_mpi_sendrecv_conservative_variables_buffers( &
5256  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf, 3, 1 )
5257 
5258  END IF
5259 
5260  IF(commute_err) THEN
5261  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end, 2
5262  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end, 2
5263  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end, 2
5264  DO l = 1, sys_size
5265  DO r = 1, buff_size
5266  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(:,:,-r ) = &
5267  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf(:,:,-r )
5268  q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf(:,:,p+r) = &
5269  q_cons_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf(:,:,p+r)
5270  END DO
5271  END DO
5272  END DO
5273  END DO
5274  END DO
5275  END IF
5276 
5277  ! END: Population of Buffers in z-direction ========================
5278 
5279 
5280  END SUBROUTINE s_populate_conservative_variables_buffers ! -------------
5281 
5282 
5283 
5289  SUBROUTINE s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values(v_qp) ! ------------------
5290 
5291 
5292  TYPE(vector_field), &
5293  DIMENSION( ieta%beg:ieta%end, & iksi%beg:iksi%end, & itau%beg:itau%end ), &
5294  INTENT(INOUT) :: v_qp
5295 
5296  TYPE(bounds_info) :: is1,is2,is3
5297 
5298  ! Reconstruction in x-direction ====================================
5299  IF(commute_err .NEQV. .true.) RETURN
5300 
5301  is1 = ix; is2 = iy; is3 = iz
5302 
5303  is1%beg = is1%beg + weno_polyn; is1%end = is1%end - weno_polyn
5304 
5305  CALL s_weno( v_qp( 0, 0, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5306  v_qp(-1, 0, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5307  v_qp( 1, 0, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5308  dflt_int, 1, 1, 2, is1,is2,is3 )
5309  ! ==================================================================
5310 
5311 
5312  ! Reconstruction in y-direction ====================================
5313  IF(n == 0) RETURN
5314 
5315  is2%beg = is2%beg + weno_polyn; is2%end = is2%end - weno_polyn
5316 
5317  CALL s_weno( v_qp(-1, 0, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5318  v_qp(-1,-1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5319  v_qp(-1, 1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5320  dflt_int, 1, 2, 2, is1,is2,is3 )
5321  CALL s_weno( v_qp( 1, 0, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5322  v_qp( 1,-1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5323  v_qp( 1, 1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5324  dflt_int, 1, 2, 2, is1,is2,is3 )
5325  ! ==================================================================
5326 
5327 
5328  ! Reconstruction in z-direction ====================================
5329  IF(p == 0) RETURN
5330 
5331  is3%beg = is3%beg + weno_polyn; is3%end = is3%end - weno_polyn
5332 
5333  CALL s_weno( v_qp(-1,-1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5334  v_qp(-1,-1,-1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5335  v_qp(-1,-1, 1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5336  dflt_int, 1, 3, 2, is1,is2,is3 )
5337  CALL s_weno( v_qp(-1, 1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5338  v_qp(-1, 1,-1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5339  v_qp(-1, 1, 1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5340  dflt_int, 1, 3, 2, is1,is2,is3 )
5341  CALL s_weno( v_qp( 1,-1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5342  v_qp( 1,-1,-1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5343  v_qp( 1,-1, 1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5344  dflt_int, 1, 3, 2, is1,is2,is3 )
5345  CALL s_weno( v_qp( 1, 1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5346  v_qp( 1, 1,-1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5347  v_qp( 1, 1, 1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5348  dflt_int, 1, 3, 2, is1,is2,is3 )
5349  ! ==================================================================
5350 
5351 
5352  END SUBROUTINE s_reconstruct_cell_interior_values ! --------------------
5353 
5354 
5355 
5363  SUBROUTINE s_average_cell_interior_values(v_qp) ! ----------------------
5364 
5365  TYPE(vector_field), &
5366  DIMENSION( ieta%beg:ieta%end, & iksi%beg:iksi%end, & itau%beg:itau%end ), &
5367  INTENT(INOUT) :: v_qp
5368 
5369  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l
5370 
5371 
5372  IF(commute_err .NEQV. .true.) RETURN
5373 
5374  DO l = iv%beg, iv%end
5375 
5376  v_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf = 0d0
5377 
5378  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end, 2
5379  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end, 2
5380  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end, 2
5381  v_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf = v_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf &
5382  + v_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf
5383  END DO
5384  END DO
5385  END DO
5386 
5387  v_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf = v_qp(0,0,0)%vf(l)%sf / (2**num_dims)
5388 
5389  END DO
5390 
5391 
5392  END SUBROUTINE s_average_cell_interior_values ! ------------------------
5393 
5394 
5395 
5396 
5408  SUBROUTINE s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values( v_vf, vL_qp, vR_qp, & ! -
5409  cd_vars, norm_dir )
5410 
5411  TYPE(scalar_field), DIMENSION(iv%beg:iv%end), INTENT(IN) :: v_vf
5412 
5413  TYPE(vector_field), &
5414  DIMENSION( ichi%beg:ichi%end, & ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ), &
5415  INTENT(INOUT) :: vL_qp, vR_qp
5416 
5417  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: cd_vars
5418  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: norm_dir
5419 
5420  INTEGER :: weno_dir
5421 
5422  TYPE(bounds_info) :: is1,is2,is3
5423 
5424  ! Reconstruction in s1-direction ===================================
5425  is1 = ix; is2 = iy; is3 = iz
5426 
5427  IF(norm_dir == 1) THEN
5428  weno_dir = 1; is1%beg = is1%beg + weno_polyn
5429  is1%end = is1%end - weno_polyn
5430  ELSEIF(norm_dir == 2) THEN
5431  weno_dir = 2; is2%beg = is2%beg + weno_polyn
5432  is2%end = is2%end - weno_polyn
5433  ELSE
5434  weno_dir = 3; is3%beg = is3%beg + weno_polyn
5435  is3%end = is3%end - weno_polyn
5436  END IF
5437 
5438  CALL s_weno( v_vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5439  vl_qp( 0, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5440  vr_qp( 0, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5441  cd_vars, norm_dir, weno_dir, 1, &
5442  is1,is2,is3 )
5443  ! ==================================================================
5444 
5445  ! Reconstruction in s2-direction ===================================
5446  IF(split_err .NEQV. .true.) RETURN
5447 
5448  IF(norm_dir /= 1) THEN
5449  weno_dir = 1; is1%beg = is1%beg + weno_polyn
5450  is1%end = is1%end - weno_polyn
5451  ELSE
5452  weno_dir = 2; is2%beg = is2%beg + weno_polyn
5453  is2%end = is2%end - weno_polyn
5454  END IF
5455 
5456  CALL s_weno( vl_qp( 0, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5457  vl_qp(-1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5458  vl_qp( 1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5459  dflt_int, norm_dir,weno_dir, 2, &
5460  is1,is2,is3 )
5461  CALL s_weno( vr_qp( 0, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5462  vr_qp(-1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5463  vr_qp( 1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5464  dflt_int, norm_dir,weno_dir, 2, &
5465  is1,is2,is3 )
5466  ! ==================================================================
5467 
5468 
5469  ! Reconstruction in s3-direction ===================================
5470  IF(p == 0) RETURN
5471 
5472  IF(norm_dir /= 3) THEN
5473  weno_dir = 3; is3%beg = is3%beg + weno_polyn
5474  is3%end = is3%end - weno_polyn
5475  ELSE
5476  weno_dir = 2; is2%beg = is2%beg + weno_polyn
5477  is2%end = is2%end - weno_polyn
5478  END IF
5479 
5480  CALL s_weno( vl_qp(-1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5481  vl_qp(-1,-1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5482  vl_qp(-1, 1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5483  dflt_int, norm_dir,weno_dir, 2, &
5484  is1,is2,is3 )
5485  CALL s_weno( vl_qp( 1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5486  vl_qp( 1,-1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5487  vl_qp( 1, 1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5488  dflt_int, norm_dir,weno_dir, 2, &
5489  is1,is2,is3 )
5490  CALL s_weno( vr_qp(-1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5491  vr_qp(-1,-1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5492  vr_qp(-1, 1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5493  dflt_int, norm_dir,weno_dir, 2, &
5494  is1,is2,is3 )
5495  CALL s_weno( vr_qp( 1, 0)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5496  vr_qp( 1,-1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5497  vr_qp( 1, 1)%vf(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5498  dflt_int, norm_dir,weno_dir, 2, &
5499  is1,is2,is3 )
5500  ! ==================================================================
5501 
5502 
5503  END SUBROUTINE s_reconstruct_cell_boundary_values ! --------------------
5504 
5505 
5506 
5515  SUBROUTINE s_average_cell_boundary_values(vK_qp) ! ---------------------
5516 
5517  TYPE(vector_field), &
5518  DIMENSION( ichi%beg:ichi%end, & ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ), &
5519  INTENT(INOUT) :: vK_qp
5520 
5521  INTEGER :: i,j,k
5522 
5523  IF(split_err .NEQV. .true.) RETURN
5524 
5525  DO k = iv%beg, iv%end
5526 
5527  vk_qp(0,0)%vf(k)%sf = 0d0
5528 
5529  DO j = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end, 2
5530  DO i = ichi%beg, ichi%end, 2
5531  vk_qp(0,0)%vf(k)%sf = vk_qp(0,0)%vf(k)%sf &
5532  + vk_qp(i,j)%vf(k)%sf
5533  END DO
5534  END DO
5535 
5536  vk_qp(0,0)%vf(k)%sf = vk_qp(0,0)%vf(k)%sf / (2**(num_dims - 1))
5537 
5538  END DO
5539 
5540 
5541  END SUBROUTINE s_average_cell_boundary_values ! ------------------------
5542 
5543 
5544 
5545 
5555  SUBROUTINE s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem( vL_vf, vR_vf, & ! --------
5556  dv_ds_vf, &
5557  norm_dir )
5558 
5559  TYPE(scalar_field), &
5560  DIMENSION(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5561  INTENT(IN) :: vL_vf, vR_vf
5562 
5563  TYPE(scalar_field), &
5564  DIMENSION(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5565  INTENT(INOUT) :: dv_ds_vf
5566 
5567  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: norm_dir
5568 
5569  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l
5570 
5571  ! First-Order Spatial Derivatives in x-direction ===================
5572  IF(norm_dir == 1) THEN
5573 
5574  ! A general application of the scalar divergence theorem that
5575  ! utilizes the left and right cell-boundary integral-averages,
5576  ! inside each cell, or an arithmetic mean of these two at the
5577  ! cell-boundaries, to calculate the cell-averaged first-order
5578  ! spatial derivatives inside the cell.
5579  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5580  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5581  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5582  DO j = ix%beg+1, ix%end-1
5583  dv_ds_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) = &
5584  1d0/((1d0+wa_flg)*dx(j)) &
5585  *( wa_flg*vl_vf(i)%sf(j+1,k,l) &
5586  + vr_vf(i)%sf( j ,k,l) &
5587  - vl_vf(i)%sf( j ,k,l) &
5588  - wa_flg*vr_vf(i)%sf(j-1,k,l) )
5589  END DO
5590  END DO
5591  END DO
5592  END DO
5593 
5594  ! Modifying the way the scalar divergence theorem is utilized
5595  ! near beginning and end Riemann state extrapolation boundary
5596  ! conditions, respectively, as to omit any contributions from
5597  ! outside the physical computational domain in the calculated
5598  ! cell-averaged first-order spatial derivatives
5599  IF(weno_avg .NEQV. .true.) RETURN
5600 
5601  IF(bc_x%beg == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at beg.
5602  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5603  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5604  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5605  dv_ds_vf(i)%sf(0,k,l) = 1d0/dx(0) &
5606  *( vr_vf(i)%sf(0,k,l) &
5607  - vl_vf(i)%sf(0,k,l) )
5608  END DO
5609  END DO
5610  END DO
5611  END IF
5612 
5613  IF(bc_x%end == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at end
5614  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5615  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5616  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5617  dv_ds_vf(i)%sf(m,k,l) = 1d0/dx(m) &
5618  *( vr_vf(i)%sf(m,k,l) &
5619  - vl_vf(i)%sf(m,k,l) )
5620  END DO
5621  END DO
5622  END DO
5623  END IF
5624  ! END: First-Order Spatial Derivatives in x-direction ==============
5625 
5626 
5627  ! First-Order Spatial Derivatives in y-direction ===================
5628  ELSEIF(norm_dir == 2) THEN
5629 
5630  ! A general application of the scalar divergence theorem that
5631  ! utilizes the left and right cell-boundary integral-averages,
5632  ! inside each cell, or an arithmetic mean of these two at the
5633  ! cell-boundaries, to calculate the cell-averaged first-order
5634  ! spatial derivatives inside the cell.
5635  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5636  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5637  DO k = iy%beg+1, iy%end-1
5638  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5639  dv_ds_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) = &
5640  1d0/((1d0+wa_flg)*dy(k)) &
5641  *( wa_flg*vl_vf(i)%sf(j,k+1,l) &
5642  + vr_vf(i)%sf(j, k ,l) &
5643  - vl_vf(i)%sf(j, k ,l) &
5644  - wa_flg*vr_vf(i)%sf(j,k-1,l) )
5645  END DO
5646  END DO
5647  END DO
5648  END DO
5649 
5650  ! Modifying the way the scalar divergence theorem is utilized
5651  ! near beginning and end Riemann state extrapolation boundary
5652  ! conditions, respectively, as to omit any contributions from
5653  ! outside the physical computational domain in the calculated
5654  ! cell-averaged first-order spatial derivatives
5655  IF(weno_avg .NEQV. .true.) RETURN
5656 
5657  IF(bc_y%beg == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at beg.
5658  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5659  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5660  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5661  dv_ds_vf(i)%sf(j,0,l) = 1d0/dy(0) &
5662  *( vr_vf(i)%sf(j,0,l) &
5663  - vl_vf(i)%sf(j,0,l) )
5664  END DO
5665  END DO
5666  END DO
5667  END IF
5668 
5669  IF(bc_y%end == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at end
5670  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5671  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5672  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5673  dv_ds_vf(i)%sf(j,n,l) = 1d0/dy(n) &
5674  *( vr_vf(i)%sf(j,n,l) &
5675  - vl_vf(i)%sf(j,n,l) )
5676  END DO
5677  END DO
5678  END DO
5679  END IF
5680  ! END: First-Order Spatial Derivatives in y-direction ==============
5681 
5682 
5683  ! First-Order Spatial Derivatives in z-direction ===================
5684  ELSE
5685 
5686  ! A general application of the scalar divergence theorem that
5687  ! utilizes the left and right cell-boundary integral-averages,
5688  ! inside each cell, or an arithmetic mean of these two at the
5689  ! cell-boundaries, to calculate the cell-averaged first-order
5690  ! spatial derivatives inside the cell.
5691  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5692  DO l = iz%beg+1, iz%end-1
5693  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5694  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5695  dv_ds_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) = &
5696  1d0/((1d0+wa_flg)*dz(l)) &
5697  *( wa_flg*vl_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l+1) &
5698  + vr_vf(i)%sf(j,k, l ) &
5699  - vl_vf(i)%sf(j,k, l ) &
5700  - wa_flg*vr_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l-1) )
5701  END DO
5702  END DO
5703  END DO
5704  END DO
5705 
5706  ! Modifying the way the scalar divergence theorem is utilized
5707  ! near beginning and end Riemann state extrapolation boundary
5708  ! conditions, respectively, as to omit any contributions from
5709  ! outside the physical computational domain in the calculated
5710  ! cell-averaged first-order spatial derivatives
5711  IF(weno_avg .NEQV. .true.) RETURN
5712 
5713  IF(bc_z%beg == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at beg.
5714  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5715  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5716  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5717  dv_ds_vf(i)%sf(j,k,0) = 1d0/dz(0) &
5718  *( vr_vf(i)%sf(j,k,0) &
5719  - vl_vf(i)%sf(j,k,0) )
5720  END DO
5721  END DO
5722  END DO
5723  END IF
5724 
5725  IF(bc_z%end == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at end
5726  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5727  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5728  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5729  dv_ds_vf(i)%sf(j,k,p) = 1d0/dz(p) &
5730  *( vr_vf(i)%sf(j,k,p) &
5731  - vl_vf(i)%sf(j,k,p) )
5732  END DO
5733  END DO
5734  END DO
5735  END IF
5736 
5737  END IF
5738  ! END: First-Order Spatial Derivatives in z-direction ==============
5739 
5740 
5741  END SUBROUTINE s_apply_scalar_divergence_theorem ! ---------------------
5742 
5743 
5744 
5756  SUBROUTINE s_apply_vector_divergence_theorem( & ! ----------------
5757  vL_x_ndqp, vL_y_ndqp, vL_z_ndqp, &
5758  vR_x_ndqp, vR_y_ndqp, vR_z_ndqp, &
5759  div_v_vf )
5760 
5761  TYPE(vector_field), &
5762  DIMENSION( 1 :num_dims, & ichi%beg:ichi%end, & ipsi%beg:ipsi%end ), &
5763  INTENT(IN) :: vL_x_ndqp, vR_x_ndqp, &
5764  vL_y_ndqp, vR_y_ndqp, &
5765  vL_z_ndqp, vR_z_ndqp
5766 
5767  TYPE(scalar_field), &
5768  DIMENSION(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5769  INTENT(INOUT) :: div_v_vf
5770 
5771 
5772  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l
5773 
5774 
5775  ! First-Order Spatial Derivatives in x-direction ===================
5776 
5777  ! General application of the vector divergence theorem which uses
5778  ! the left and right cell-boundary integral-averages, inside each
5779  ! cell, or an arithmetic mean of these two at the cell-boundaries,
5780  ! in order to obtain cell-average first-order spatial derivatives
5781  ! inside the cell
5782  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5783  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5784  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5785  DO j = ix%beg+1, ix%end-1
5786  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) = 1d0/((1d0+wa_flg)*dx(j)) &
5787  *( wa_flg*vl_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j+1,k,l) &
5788  + vr_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( j ,k,l) &
5789  - vl_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( j ,k,l) &
5790  - wa_flg*vr_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j-1,k,l) )
5791  END DO
5792  END DO
5793  END DO
5794  END DO
5795 
5796  ! Customizing the way the vector divergence theorem is applied near
5797  ! beginning and end Riemann state extrapolation boundary conditions,
5798  ! respectively, as to avoid contributions from outside the physical
5799  ! computational domain in the computation of the cell-average first-
5800  ! order spatial derivatives
5801  IF(weno_avg) THEN
5802 
5803  IF(bc_x%beg == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at beg.
5804  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5805  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5806  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5807  div_v_vf(i)%sf(0,k,l) = &
5808  div_v_vf(i)%sf(0,k,l) - 5d-1/dx(0) &
5809  *( vl_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( 1 ,k,l) &
5810  - vr_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( 0 ,k,l) &
5811  + vl_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( 0 ,k,l) &
5812  - vr_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(-1 ,k,l) )
5813  END DO
5814  END DO
5815  END DO
5816  END IF
5817 
5818  IF(bc_x%end == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at end
5819  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5820  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5821  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5822  div_v_vf(i)%sf(m,k,l) = &
5823  div_v_vf(i)%sf(m,k,l) - 5d-1/dx(m) &
5824  *( vl_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(m+1,k,l) &
5825  - vr_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( m ,k,l) &
5826  + vl_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf( m ,k,l) &
5827  - vr_x_ndqp(1,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(m-1,k,l) )
5828  END DO
5829  END DO
5830  END DO
5831  END IF
5832 
5833  END IF
5834 
5835  ! END: First-Order Spatial Derivatives in x-direction ==============
5836 
5837 
5838  ! First-Order Spatial Derivatives in y-direction ===================
5839 
5840  ! General application of the vector divergence theorem which uses
5841  ! the left and right cell-boundary integral-averages, inside each
5842  ! cell, or an arithmetic mean of these two at the cell-boundaries,
5843  ! in order to obtain cell-average first-order spatial derivatives
5844  ! inside the cell
5845  IF(n == 0) RETURN
5846 
5847  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5848  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5849  DO k = iy%beg+1, iy%end-1
5850  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5851  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) = div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) &
5852  + 1d0/((1d0+wa_flg)*dy(k)) &
5853  *( wa_flg*vl_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k+1,l) &
5854  + vr_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j, k ,l) &
5855  - vl_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j, k ,l) &
5856  - wa_flg*vr_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k-1,l) )
5857  END DO
5858  END DO
5859  END DO
5860  END DO
5861 
5862  ! Customizing the way the vector divergence theorem is applied near
5863  ! beginning and end Riemann state extrapolation boundary conditions,
5864  ! respectively, as to avoid contributions from outside the physical
5865  ! computational domain in the computation of the cell-average first-
5866  ! order spatial derivatives
5867  IF(weno_avg) THEN
5868 
5869  IF(bc_y%beg == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at beg.
5870  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5871  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5872  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5873  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,0,l) = &
5874  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,0,l) - 5d-1/dy(0) &
5875  *( vl_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j, 1 ,l) &
5876  - vr_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j, 0 ,l) &
5877  + vl_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j, 0 ,l) &
5878  - vr_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,-1 ,l) )
5879  END DO
5880  END DO
5881  END DO
5882  END IF
5883 
5884  IF(bc_y%end == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at end
5885  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5886  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
5887  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5888  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,n,l) = &
5889  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,n,l) - 5d-1/dy(n) &
5890  *( vl_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,n+1,l) &
5891  - vr_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j, n ,l) &
5892  + vl_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j, n ,l) &
5893  - vr_y_ndqp(2,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,n-1,l) )
5894  END DO
5895  END DO
5896  END DO
5897  END IF
5898 
5899  END IF
5900 
5901  ! END: First-Order Spatial Derivatives in y-direction ==============
5902 
5903 
5904  ! First-Order Spatial Derivatives in z-direction ===================
5905 
5906  ! General application of the vector divergence theorem which uses
5907  ! the left and right cell-boundary integral-averages, inside each
5908  ! cell, or an arithmetic mean of these two at the cell-boundaries,
5909  ! in order to obtain cell-average first-order spatial derivatives
5910  ! inside the cell
5911  IF(p == 0) RETURN
5912 
5913  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5914  DO l = iz%beg+1, iz%end-1
5915  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5916  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5917  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) = div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) &
5918  + 1d0/((1d0+wa_flg)*dz(l)) &
5919  *( wa_flg*vl_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k,l+1) &
5920  + vr_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k, l ) &
5921  - vl_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k, l ) &
5922  - wa_flg*vr_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k,l-1) )
5923  END DO
5924  END DO
5925  END DO
5926  END DO
5927 
5928  ! Customizing the way the vector divergence theorem is applied near
5929  ! beginning and end Riemann state extrapolation boundary conditions,
5930  ! respectively, as to avoid contributions from outside the physical
5931  ! computational domain in the computation of the cell-average first-
5932  ! order spatial derivatives
5933  IF(weno_avg) THEN
5934 
5935  IF(bc_z%beg == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at beg.
5936  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5937  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5938  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5939  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,0) = &
5940  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,0) - 5d-1/dz(0) &
5941  *( vl_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k, 1 ) &
5942  - vr_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k, 0 ) &
5943  + vl_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k, 0 ) &
5944  - vr_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k,-1 ) )
5945  END DO
5946  END DO
5947  END DO
5948  END IF
5949 
5950  IF(bc_z%end == -4) THEN ! Riemann state extrap. BC at end
5951  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
5952  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
5953  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
5954  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,p) = &
5955  div_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,p) - 5d-1/dz(p) &
5956  *( vl_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k,p+1) &
5957  - vr_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k, p ) &
5958  + vl_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k, p ) &
5959  - vr_z_ndqp(3,0,0)%vf(i)%sf(j,k,p-1) )
5960  END DO
5961  END DO
5962  END DO
5963  END IF
5964 
5965  END IF
5966 
5967  ! END: First-Order Spatial Derivatives in z-direction ==============
5968 
5969 
5970  END SUBROUTINE s_apply_vector_divergence_theorem ! ---------------------
5971 
5972 
5973 
5981  SUBROUTINE s_compute_gradient_magnitude( dv_dx_vf, & ! -----------------
5982  dv_dy_vf, &
5983  dv_dz_vf, &
5984  gm_v_vf )
5985 
5986  TYPE(scalar_field), &
5987  DIMENSION(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5988  INTENT(IN) :: dv_dx_vf, &
5989  dv_dy_vf, &
5990  dv_dz_vf
5991 
5992  TYPE(scalar_field), &
5993  DIMENSION(iv%beg:iv%end), &
5994  INTENT(INOUT) :: gm_v_vf
5995 
5996  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l
5997 
5998  ! Scalar Product Contribution in x-direction =======================
5999  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
6000  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
6001  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
6002  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
6003  gm_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) = dv_dx_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) &
6004  * dv_dx_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l)
6005  END DO
6006  END DO
6007  END DO
6008  END DO
6009  ! ==================================================================
6010 
6011 
6012  ! Scalar Product Contribution in y-direction =======================
6013  IF(n > 0) THEN
6014 
6015  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
6016  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
6017  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
6018  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
6019  gm_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) = gm_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) &
6020  + dv_dy_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) &
6021  * dv_dy_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l)
6022  END DO
6023  END DO
6024  END DO
6025  END DO
6026  ! ==================================================================
6027 
6028 
6029  ! Scalar Product Contribution in z-direction =======================
6030  IF(p > 0) THEN
6031  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
6032  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
6033  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
6034  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
6035  gm_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) = gm_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) &
6036  + dv_dz_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) &
6037  * dv_dz_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l)
6038  END DO
6039  END DO
6040  END DO
6041  END DO
6042  END IF
6043 
6044  END IF
6045  ! ==================================================================
6046 
6047 
6048  ! Square Root of the Scalar Product ================================
6049  DO i = iv%beg, iv%end
6050  DO l = iz%beg, iz%end
6051  DO k = iy%beg, iy%end
6052  DO j = ix%beg, ix%end
6053  gm_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l) = sqrt(gm_v_vf(i)%sf(j,k,l))
6054  END DO
6055  END DO
6056  END DO
6057  END DO
6058  ! ==================================================================
6059 
6060 
6061  END SUBROUTINE s_compute_gradient_magnitude ! --------------------------
6062 
6063 
6064 
6065 
6066 
6068  SUBROUTINE s_finalize_rhs_module() ! -----------------------------------
6069 
6070 
6071  INTEGER :: i,j,k,l
6072 
6073 
6074  ! Deallocation/Disassociation of q_cons_qp and q_prim_qp ===========
6075  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end
6076  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end
6077  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end
6078 
6079  IF(i /= 0 .AND. abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
6080 
6081  DO l = 1, sys_size
6082  DEALLOCATE(q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6083  END DO
6084 
6085  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
6086  DEALLOCATE(q_prim_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6087  END DO
6088 
6089  IF (model_eqns == 3) THEN
6090  DO l = internalenergies_idx%beg, internalenergies_idx%end
6091  DEALLOCATE(q_prim_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6092  END DO
6093  END IF
6094 
6095  DO l = 1, sys_size
6096  NULLIFY(q_prim_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6097  END DO
6098 
6099  END IF
6100 
6101  DEALLOCATE(q_cons_qp(i,j,k)%vf, q_prim_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6102 
6103  END DO
6104  END DO
6105  END DO
6106 
6107  DEALLOCATE(q_cons_qp, q_prim_qp)
6108  ! ==================================================================
6109 
6110 
6111  ! Deallocation/Disassociation of qK_cons_ndqp and qK_prim_ndqp =====
6112  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
6113  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
6114  DO i = num_dims, 1, -1
6115 
6116  IF(abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
6117 
6118  DO l = 1, cont_idx%end
6119  NULLIFY(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6120  NULLIFY(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6121  END DO
6122 
6123  DO l = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
6124  NULLIFY(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6125  NULLIFY(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6126  END DO
6127 
6128  IF(i /= 1) THEN
6129 
6130  IF( (char_decomp .NEQV. .true.) &
6131  .AND. &
6132  any(re_size > 0) ) THEN
6133  IF(weno_vars == 1) THEN
6134  DO l = 1, mom_idx%end
6135  DEALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6136  DEALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6137  END DO
6138  ELSE
6139  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
6140  DEALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6141  DEALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6142  END DO
6143  IF (model_eqns == 3) THEN
6144  DO l = internalenergies_idx%beg, internalenergies_idx%end
6145  DEALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6146  DEALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6147  END DO
6148  END IF
6149  END IF
6150  END IF
6151 
6152  DO l = 1, crv_size
6153  DEALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6154  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf )
6155  DEALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6156  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf )
6157  END DO
6158 
6159  DO l = 1, sys_size
6160  NULLIFY(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6161  NULLIFY(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6162  NULLIFY(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6163  NULLIFY(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6164  END DO
6165 
6166  ELSE
6167 
6168  DO l = 1, cont_idx%end
6169  DEALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6170  DEALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6171  END DO
6172 
6173  IF(weno_vars == 1) THEN
6174  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
6175  DEALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6176  DEALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6177  END DO
6178  END IF
6179 
6180  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
6181  DEALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6182  DEALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6183  END DO
6184  IF (model_eqns == 3) THEN
6185  DO l = internalenergies_idx%beg, internalenergies_idx%end
6186  DEALLOCATE(ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6187  DEALLOCATE(qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6188  END DO
6189  END IF
6190 
6191  DO l = adv_idx%beg, adv_idx%end
6192  DEALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6193  DEALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6194  END DO
6195 
6196  END IF
6197 
6198  END IF
6199 
6200  DEALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, ql_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6201  DEALLOCATE(qr_cons_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, qr_prim_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6202 
6203  END DO
6204  END DO
6205  END DO
6206 
6207  DEALLOCATE(ql_cons_ndqp, qr_cons_ndqp, ql_prim_ndqp, qr_prim_ndqp)
6208  ! END: Deallocation/Disassociation of qK_cons_ndqp and qK_prim_ndqp
6209 
6210 
6211  ! Deallocation of dq_prim_ds_qp ====================================
6212  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0) THEN
6213 
6214  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end
6215  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end
6216  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end
6217 
6218  IF(all((/i,j,k/) == 0) .AND. any(re_size > 0)) THEN
6219 
6220  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
6221  DEALLOCATE(dq_prim_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6222  DEALLOCATE(gm_vel_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6223  END DO
6224 
6225  IF(n > 0) THEN
6226 
6227  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
6228  DEALLOCATE(dq_prim_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6229  END DO
6230 
6231  IF(p > 0) THEN
6232  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
6233  DEALLOCATE(dq_prim_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6234  END DO
6235  END IF
6236 
6237  END IF
6238 
6239  END IF
6240 
6241  IF( (i /= 0 .AND. abs(j) >= abs(k)) &
6242  .OR. &
6243  all((/i,j,k/) == 0) ) THEN
6244  DO l = 1, crv_size
6245  DEALLOCATE(dq_prim_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6246  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf)
6247  IF (n > 0) THEN
6248  DEALLOCATE(dq_prim_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6249  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf)
6250  IF (p > 0) THEN
6251  DEALLOCATE(dq_prim_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6252  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf)
6253  END IF
6254  END IF
6255  END DO
6256  END IF
6257 
6258  DEALLOCATE(dq_prim_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6259  DEALLOCATE(dq_prim_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6260  DEALLOCATE(dq_prim_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6261  DEALLOCATE(gm_vel_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6262 
6263  END DO
6264  END DO
6265  END DO
6266 
6267  DEALLOCATE(dq_prim_dx_qp, dq_prim_dy_qp, dq_prim_dz_qp, gm_vel_qp)
6268 
6269  END IF
6270  ! END: Deallocation of dq_prim_ds_qp ===============================
6271 
6272 
6273  ! Deallocation/Disassociation of dqK_prim_ds_ndqp ==================
6274  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0) THEN
6275  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
6276  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
6277  DO i = num_dims, 1, -1
6278 
6279  IF(abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
6280 
6281  IF(any(re_size > 0)) THEN
6282 
6283  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
6284  DEALLOCATE(dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6285  DEALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6286  END DO
6287 
6288  IF(n > 0) THEN
6289  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
6290  DEALLOCATE(dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6291  DEALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6292  END DO
6293  END IF
6294 
6295  IF(p > 0) THEN
6296  DO l = mom_idx%beg, mom_idx%end
6297  DEALLOCATE(dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6298  DEALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6299  END DO
6300  END IF
6301 
6302  END IF
6303 
6304  DO l = 1, crv_size
6305  DEALLOCATE(dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6306  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf )
6307  DEALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6308  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf )
6309  IF (n > 0) THEN
6310  DEALLOCATE(dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6311  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf )
6312  DEALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6313  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf )
6314  END IF
6315  END DO
6316 
6317  IF(p > 0) THEN
6318  DO l = 1, crv_size
6319  DEALLOCATE(dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6320  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf )
6321  DEALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6322  e_idx+crv_idx(l))%sf )
6323  END DO
6324  END IF
6325 
6326  END IF
6327 
6328  DEALLOCATE(dql_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6329  DEALLOCATE(dql_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6330  DEALLOCATE(dql_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6331  DEALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dx_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6332  DEALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dy_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6333  DEALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dz_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6334 
6335  END DO
6336  END DO
6337  END DO
6338  END IF
6339 
6340  DEALLOCATE(dql_prim_dx_ndqp, dql_prim_dy_ndqp, dql_prim_dz_ndqp)
6341  DEALLOCATE(dqr_prim_dx_ndqp, dqr_prim_dy_ndqp, dqr_prim_dz_ndqp)
6342  ! END: Deallocation/Disassociation of dqK_prim_ds_ndqp =============
6343 
6344 
6345  ! Deallocation of gm_alpha_qp ======================================
6346  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
6347  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end
6348  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end
6349  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end
6350 
6351  IF(any(sum(abs((/i,j,k/))) == (/0,num_dims/))) THEN
6352  DO l = 1, crv_size
6353  DEALLOCATE(gm_alpha_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6354  END DO
6355  END IF
6356 
6357  DEALLOCATE(gm_alpha_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6358 
6359  END DO
6360  END DO
6361  END DO
6362  END IF
6363 
6364  DEALLOCATE(gm_alpha_qp)
6365  ! ==================================================================
6366 
6367 
6368  ! Deallocation of gm_alphaK_ndqp ===================================
6369  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
6370  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
6371  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
6372  DO i = 1, num_dims
6373 
6374  IF(any(sum(abs((/j,k/))) == (/0,num_dims/))) THEN
6375  DO l = 1, crv_size
6376  DEALLOCATE(gm_alphal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6377  crv_idx(l))%sf )
6378  DEALLOCATE(gm_alphar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6379  crv_idx(l))%sf )
6380  END DO
6381  END IF
6382 
6383  DEALLOCATE(gm_alphal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6384  DEALLOCATE(gm_alphar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6385 
6386  END DO
6387  END DO
6388  END DO
6389  END IF
6390 
6391  DEALLOCATE(gm_alphal_ndqp, gm_alphar_ndqp)
6392  ! ==================================================================
6393 
6394 
6395  ! Deallocation of un_alphaK_s_ndqp =================================
6396  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
6397 
6398  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
6399  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
6400 
6401  IF(abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
6402 
6403  DO l = 1, crv_size
6404  DEALLOCATE(un_alphal_x_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6405  DEALLOCATE(un_alphar_x_ndqp(1,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6406  IF (n > 0) THEN
6407  DEALLOCATE(un_alphal_y_ndqp(2,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6408  DEALLOCATE(un_alphar_y_ndqp(2,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6409  END IF
6410  END DO
6411 
6412  IF(p > 0) THEN
6413  DO l = 1, crv_size
6414  DEALLOCATE(un_alphal_z_ndqp(3,j,k)%vf( &
6415  crv_idx(l))%sf )
6416  DEALLOCATE(un_alphar_z_ndqp(3,j,k)%vf( &
6417  crv_idx(l))%sf )
6418  END DO
6419  END IF
6420 
6421  END IF
6422 
6423  DO i = 1, num_dims
6424  DEALLOCATE(un_alphal_x_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6425  DEALLOCATE(un_alphal_y_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6426  DEALLOCATE(un_alphal_z_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6427  DEALLOCATE(un_alphar_x_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6428  DEALLOCATE(un_alphar_y_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6429  DEALLOCATE(un_alphar_z_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6430  END DO
6431 
6432  END DO
6433  END DO
6434 
6435  DEALLOCATE(un_alphal_x_ndqp, un_alphal_y_ndqp, un_alphal_z_ndqp)
6436  DEALLOCATE(un_alphar_x_ndqp, un_alphar_y_ndqp, un_alphar_z_ndqp)
6437 
6438  END IF
6439  ! ==================================================================
6440 
6441 
6442  ! Deallocation of kappa_vf =========================================
6443  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
6444 
6445  DO i = 1, crv_size
6446  DEALLOCATE(kappa_vf(crv_idx(i))%sf)
6447  END DO
6448 
6449  DEALLOCATE(kappa_vf)
6450 
6451  END IF
6452  ! ==================================================================
6453 
6454 
6455  ! Deallocation/Disassociation of kappaK_ndqp =======================
6456  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
6457  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
6458  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
6459  DO i = num_dims, 1, -1
6460 
6461  IF(abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
6462  IF(i /= 1) THEN
6463  DO l = 1, crv_size
6464  NULLIFY(kappal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6465  NULLIFY(kappar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6466  END DO
6467  ELSE
6468  DO l = 1, crv_size
6469  DEALLOCATE(kappal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6470  crv_idx(l))%sf )
6471  DEALLOCATE(kappar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf( &
6472  crv_idx(l))%sf )
6473  END DO
6474  END IF
6475  END IF
6476 
6477  DEALLOCATE(kappal_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, kappar_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6478 
6479  END DO
6480  END DO
6481  END DO
6482  END IF
6483 
6484  DEALLOCATE(kappal_ndqp, kappar_ndqp)
6485  ! ==================================================================
6486 
6487  IF (alt_crv) THEN
6488  ! Deallocation of dgm_alpha_ds_qp & un_alpha_s_qp
6489  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
6490  DO k = itau%beg, itau%end
6491  DO j = iksi%beg, iksi%end
6492  DO i = ieta%beg, ieta%end
6493 
6494  IF(any(sum(abs((/i,j,k/))) == (/0,num_dims/))) THEN
6495  DO l = 1, crv_size
6496  DEALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6497  DEALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6498  DEALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6499  DEALLOCATE(un_alpha_x_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6500  DEALLOCATE(un_alpha_y_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6501  DEALLOCATE(un_alpha_z_qp(i,j,k)%vf(crv_idx(l))%sf)
6502  END DO
6503  END IF
6504 
6505  DEALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dx_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6506  DEALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dy_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6507  DEALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dz_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6508  DEALLOCATE(un_alpha_x_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6509  DEALLOCATE(un_alpha_y_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6510  DEALLOCATE(un_alpha_z_qp(i,j,k)%vf)
6511 
6512  END DO
6513  END DO
6514  END DO
6515  END IF
6516 
6517  DEALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dx_qp)
6518  DEALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dy_qp)
6519  DEALLOCATE(dgm_alpha_dz_qp)
6520  DEALLOCATE(un_alpha_x_qp)
6521  DEALLOCATE(un_alpha_y_qp)
6522  DEALLOCATE(un_alpha_z_qp)
6523  END IF
6524 
6525  ! Deallocation of alt_kappa_vf & laplacian_vf
6526  IF(we_size > 0) THEN
6527  IF (alt_crv) THEN
6528  DO i = 1, crv_size
6529  DEALLOCATE(alt_kappa_vf(crv_idx(i))%sf)
6530  DEALLOCATE(laplacian_vf(crv_idx(i))%sf)
6531  END DO
6532 
6533  DEALLOCATE(alt_kappa_vf)
6534  DEALLOCATE(laplacian_vf)
6535  END IF
6536 
6537  IF (we_src) THEN
6538  DEALLOCATE(we_mtm_src)
6539  DEALLOCATE(we_nrg_src)
6540  END IF
6541 
6542  END IF
6543 
6544  IF (we_size > 0 .AND. we_rhs_flux) THEN
6545  DO i = 1, num_dims
6546  DEALLOCATE(tau_we_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf)
6547  END DO
6548  DEALLOCATE(tau_we_vf(e_idx)%sf)
6549 
6550  DEALLOCATE(tau_we_vf)
6551  END IF
6552 
6553  IF (any(re_size > 0) .AND. cyl_coord) THEN
6554  DO i = 1, num_dims
6555  DEALLOCATE(tau_re_vf(cont_idx%end+i)%sf)
6556  END DO
6557  DEALLOCATE(tau_re_vf(e_idx)%sf)
6558 
6559  DEALLOCATE(tau_re_vf)
6560  END IF
6561 
6562  ! Deallocation of reg_src_vf
6563  IF (regularization) THEN
6564  DO i = 1, sys_size
6565  DEALLOCATE(reg_src_vf(i)%sf)
6566  END DO
6567  DEALLOCATE(reg_src_vf)
6568  END IF
6569 
6570  IF (tvd_rhs_flux) THEN
6571  ! Deallocation of flux limiter variables
6572  DEALLOCATE(flux_lim_func)
6573 
6574  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
6575  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
6576  DO i = num_dims, 1, -1
6577  IF (abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
6578  IF (i /= 1) THEN
6579  DO l = 1, sys_size
6580  NULLIFY( lo_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6581  NULLIFY( hi_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6582  NULLIFY(lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6583  NULLIFY(hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6584  NULLIFY(lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6585  NULLIFY(hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6586  END DO
6587  ELSE
6588  DO l = 1, sys_size
6589  DEALLOCATE(lo_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6590  DEALLOCATE(hi_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6591  DEALLOCATE(lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6592  DEALLOCATE(hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6593  END DO
6594 
6595  IF (any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0) THEN
6596  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
6597  DEALLOCATE(lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6598  DEALLOCATE(hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6599  END DO
6600  END IF
6601 
6602  IF (riemann_solver == 1) THEN
6603  DO l = adv_idx%beg+1, adv_idx%end
6604  DEALLOCATE(lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6605  DEALLOCATE(hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6606  END DO
6607  ELSE
6608  DO l = adv_idx%beg+1, adv_idx%end
6609  NULLIFY(lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6610  NULLIFY(hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6611  END DO
6612  END IF
6613 
6614  DEALLOCATE(lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf)
6615  DEALLOCATE(hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf)
6616  END IF
6617  END IF
6618 
6619  DEALLOCATE(lo_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, lo_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6620  DEALLOCATE(hi_flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, hi_flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6621  END DO
6622  END DO
6623  END DO
6624 
6625  DEALLOCATE(lo_flux_ndqp, lo_flux_src_ndqp, lo_flux_gsrc_ndqp)
6626  DEALLOCATE(hi_flux_ndqp, hi_flux_src_ndqp, hi_flux_gsrc_ndqp)
6627  END IF
6628 
6629  ! Deallocation/Disassociation of flux_ndqp, flux_src_ndqp, and flux_gsrc_ndqp ====
6630  DO k = ipsi%beg, ipsi%end
6631  DO j = ichi%beg, ichi%end
6632  DO i = num_dims, 1, -1
6633 
6634  IF(abs(j) >= abs(k)) THEN
6635  IF(i /= 1) THEN
6636 
6637  DO l = 1, sys_size
6638  NULLIFY( flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6639  NULLIFY(flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6640  NULLIFY(flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6641  END DO
6642 
6643  ELSE
6644 
6645  DO l = 1, sys_size
6646  DEALLOCATE(flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6647  DEALLOCATE(flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6648  END DO
6649 
6650  IF(any(re_size > 0) .OR. we_size > 0) THEN
6651  DO l = mom_idx%beg, e_idx
6652  DEALLOCATE(flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6653  END DO
6654  END IF
6655 
6656  IF(riemann_solver == 1) THEN
6657  DO l = adv_idx%beg+1, adv_idx%end
6658  DEALLOCATE(flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6659  END DO
6660  ELSE
6661  DO l = adv_idx%beg+1, adv_idx%end
6662  NULLIFY(flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(l)%sf)
6663  END DO
6664  END IF
6665 
6666  DEALLOCATE(flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf(adv_idx%beg)%sf)
6667 
6668  END IF
6669  END IF
6670 
6671  DEALLOCATE(flux_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, flux_src_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf, flux_gsrc_ndqp(i,j,k)%vf)
6672 
6673  END DO
6674  END DO
6675  END DO
6676 
6677  DEALLOCATE(flux_ndqp, flux_src_ndqp, flux_gsrc_ndqp)
6678 
6679  ! END: Deallocation/Disassociation of flux_ndqp, flux_src_ndqp, and flux_gsrc_ndqp ===
6680 
6681 
6682  ! Disassociating procedural pointer to the subroutine which was
6683  ! utilized to calculate the solution of a given Riemann problem
6684  s_riemann_solver => null()
6685 
6686  ! Disassociating the pointer to the procedure that was utilized to
6687  ! to convert mixture or species variables to the mixture variables
6688  s_convert_to_mixture_variables => null()
6689 
6690  END SUBROUTINE s_finalize_rhs_module ! ---------------------------------
6691 
6692 END MODULE m_rhs

m_riemann_solvers::s_exact_riemann_solver
subroutine, public s_exact_riemann_solver(qL_prim_vf, dqL_prim_dx_vf, dqL_prim_dy_vf, dqL_prim_dz_vf, gm_alphaL_vf, kappaL_vf, qR_prim_vf, dqR_prim_dx_vf, dqR_prim_dy_vf, dqR_prim_dz_vf, gm_alphaR_vf, kappaR_vf, q_prim_vf, flux_vf, flux_src_vf, flux_gsrc_vf, norm_dir, ix, iy, iz)
This procedure is the implementation of the exact Riemann solver, see Toro (1999). The effects of viscosity and the surface tension have been incorporated following the work of Perigaud and Saurel (2005).

m_cbc::s_cbc
subroutine, public s_cbc(q_prim_vf, flux_vf, flux_src_vf, cbc_dir, cbc_loc, ix, iy, iz)
The following is the implementation of the CBC based on the work of Thompson (1987, 1990) on hyperbolic systems. The CBC is indirectly applied in the computation of the right-hand-side (RHS) near the relevant domain boundary through the modification of the fluxes.
